name: Nella Domenici
subject: Boots on the ground at the border
body: Nella for Senate I am ready to get to work on DAY ONE with Pres. Trump to secure our borders and fix what the left has broken. Peter, I was just boots on the ground at the border in New Mexico, once again assessing the situation and reminding voters justhow bad Kamala Harris and Martin Heinrich have allowed it to become. Of course, “bad” is the understatement of the century. Words and phrases like “horrifying,” “deadly,” and “worst in history” get closer to appropriate descriptions of what has happened under their watch. And it’s not like they just allowed it to happen – they curated this disaster! There’s NO WAY we can allow Harris or Heinrich to continue failing us in Washington, D.C., and I need your help to defeat them and their radical agenda here in New Mexico. I am ready to get to work on DAY ONE with Pres. Trump to secure our borders and fix what the left has broken. We’re so close to the finish line, and I need your help to get across. Please rush $10 or more to help us keep fighting every minute all the way until the end, when we’ve flipped this seat, secured the Senate, and ensured we have the ability to get our country back on track. Thank you, Nella Domenici Help Elect Nella and Secure the Border » ABOUT NELLA New Mexico is Nella Domenici’s home. She was born in Albuquerque and lived for most of her childhood in a home near the intersection of Lomas and Monroe with her seven siblings, and her parents - Pete and Nancy Domenici. Nella began her education at Our Lady of Fatima, where she learned the values she holds today. Nella is a proud third-generation New Mexican, devoted mother of two, step-mom of four, and the wife of a Navy Veteran. Nella’s family’s roots run deep in New Mexico and she and her husband Pat enjoy their family home in New Mexico that they have owned for nearly twenty years. Like most New Mexicans, Nella Domenici understands the importance of hard work. She waited tables to help pay for her undergraduate degree from Georgetown University, and worked her way through night school at Georgetown Law while holding down a full time job. She then graduated from Harvard Business School as a Baker Scholar, top 5% of the class, while 9 months pregnant. Nella began her career at the bottom and worked her way up through the complex finance world, eventually serving as CFO for one of the world’s largest, most successful investment firms. In her career, Nella advised, invested in, grew, and led many companies, and served on public company boards. The industries she has worked in are vast and include areas such as health care, AI, food service, lodging, commercial real estate, mortgage lending, and consumer products. These companies have ranged from small family-owned businesses, to rapidly growing venture backed enterprises, to a Fortune 200 company. Several of these have been headquartered in New Mexico. Collectively, the companies Nella has been heavily involved with have employed thousands of Americans. Like her father and mother, Nella has been a warrior for those who most need an advocate: for women competing in academics or business, for families dealing with mental illness, and for those without access to quality healthcare or education. JOIN NELLA Follow Nella Online Checks can be made payable to Nella for Senate and mailed to PO Box 92918 | Albuquerque, NM 87199 Paid for by Nella for Senate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hate to see you go: unsubscribe .

name: Debbie [INTERNAL]
subject: Hope this reaches you
body: Friend, With just 5 days to go until Election Day, and early voting wellunderway, I wanted to give you an inside look at where we stand in our race toretire Rick Scott. While I usually wouldn't go into this much detail, I alsowouldn't have made it this far without you, so it's only right that you shouldhave full disclosure. But you also need to know that, in less than two hours,I am up against my last $10 million end-of-month goal before Election Day. Ican't afford to fall short of my biggest goal yet — can I count on you to rush$5 now and keep me on track to reach my midnight goal and flip Florida blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2474-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Date: Oct. 31, 2024 Subject: [INTERNAL MEMO] TheCase for Florida's Senate Race At this stage of the 2024 election, DebbieMucarsel-Powell's race in Florida is now the Democrats' BEST SENATE PICKUPOPPORTUNITY nationwide: * Florida Politics just reported on brand new pollingdata showing that Debbie is up 18 points with independent voters. * Despitepreviously self-funding his races at historic levels, Rick Scott has never wonan election in Florida by more than 1%. * Debbie's run a highly efficient adcampaign fueled by small-dollar donations, allowing her to reach 76% of votersacross Florida's four top media markets. * Recent polls by a GOP-allied firmshows Scott's popularity underwater by 11 points, and the race in a DEAD HEATat Scott 50 - Mucarsel-Powell 48. * Another advantage is the popular ballotinitiative for restoring abortion rights, which is expected to help driveturnout similar to that of the 2020 election. * With a personal story thateasily counters Scott's "socialism" attacks, and regular appearances onSpanish-language media, Debbie can rally Latino voters — nearly 1 in every 4voters in Florida — unlike any other Senate candidate this cycle. The onlything left that Debbie needs to win is a sizable grassroots cash infusion overthe last 5 days — especially before her last $10 million end-of-month deadlinetonight. With it, she can help retain the Senate for Democrats, and bring newleadership to the Sunshine State.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2474-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 ### So friend, now that you know where we standin the race, there's just one thing left for me to ask you: Will you pleasechip in $5, $25, or any amount you can spare now to help me reach my $10million end-of-month goal on time, retire Rick Scott, and flip Florida'sSenate seat blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2474-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thank you for all you do. Let's win this, Debbie-------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. VP Harris said it best:** ![Everything is at stake](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/109/872/original/2024_06_30_Harris_Callout_OFT's-Version.png) If you agree with VP Harris’ message, will you chip in a 5X-matched gift of $7 to help state Democrats go toe-to-toe with their Republican opponents? | If you've stored your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will process immediately.  --- | 5X-MATCH $7 --- | 5X-MATCH $25 --- | 5X-MATCH $50 --- | 5X-MATCH $100 --- | 5X-MATCH $250 --- | OTHER » ---  State legislative elections are frequently overlooked and underfunded – butmany key issues, like access to reproductive care, will be decided solely inthe states.And to make matters more frightening – the GOP raised $331 million in oursecond quarter this year, signaling that their right-wing backers will stop atnothing to advance the MAGA movement, ban abortion nationwide, and tear downour democracy.**That’s why we must elect Democrats who will build a better future in placeslike your community.**Vice President Harris named the stakes. name: Sherrod Brown
subject: last chance to reach our goal before the end-of-month deadline
body: I know it's late, but this is truly the last call, friend. We've got just onehour left before our end-of-month deadline – the final one before Election Day– and we're still $23,091 short. We say this a lot, but tonight it feelsparticularly true: The stakes couldn't be higher. Senate control. Down in thepolls. Being outspent 3-to-1. This really is our last chance, so please,before you go to bed, will you chip in $5 (or whatever you can) to help usreach our goal, win in Ohio, and keep the Senate blue? subject: Can’t sit on the sidelines
body: [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/67?t=1001&akid;=4393%2E35263%2EHre1yJ ]TAMMY BALDWIN FOR SENATE We're so close to reaching our 150,000 donation goal, Peter. The response from this email alone could be enough to put us over the top. We can’t sit on the sidelines while my opponent, Mitch McConnell, and their right-wing allies flood our airwaves with $100 million worth of deceptive attack ads — not when Eric Hovde has taken the lead in recent polling. But there are only 5 days left to stop the GOP’s momentum, defend Wisconsin’s Senate seat, and protect our Democratic Senate majority. So before our deadline at midnight, I’m coming directly to you, Peter: Will you pitch in anything you can to help us reach our very last end-of-month fundraising goal? name: Jon Tester
subject: no ifs, ands, or buts.
body: Hi. Sorry to bother you, Peter. I know you’ve been receiving a lot of emailslately but if you give me just a moment, I’ll explain why. Tim Sheehy and hisbackers have virtually unlimited resources to attack me. My opponents arespending nearly $90 million in ads. Sheehy has even poured $2.4 million of hisown fortune into his campaign trying to buy Montana’s Senate seat. To makematters worse, we’ve fallen way behind on our fundraising targets—which meanswe’ve got a lot of work to do if we want to catch back up. If we want to beatthem, we have to hit our goal tonight. No ifs, ands, or buts. There is nobetter way to make an impact on the outcome of this race than chipping in agrassroots donation today. I hate asking, but I need to: Will you make a splitcontribution between my campaign and UNITEDemocrats to help us catch up on ourgoal before time runs out? name: Arizona Democratic Party
subject: Republicans are outpacing Democrats at the polls
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/azd-em-header[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/azd-em-header] Team — Is there anything wecould say to convince you to pitch in ahead of our last end-of-monthfundraising deadline before this election? What if we told you that we’re lessthan one week away from Election Day when the final votes will be cast forthis extremely important election? What if we told you that millions ofArizonans are casting their votes right now? That means the clock is ticking,and our time to convince undecided voters to back our movement is quicklyrunning out. And what if we told you that more Republicans have cast theirballots than Democrats so far in Arizona? Or that Donald Trump and VicePresident Harris are neck and neck in the polls right now — making everyperson, every conversation, and every vote absolutely essential to securing awin for VP Harris and sending Trump packing for good? All of this is true, andit’s why we need to hit our fundraising goal tonight. Falling short puts allof the work we’ve done at risk. So please, will you pitch in anything you canspare ahead of our final monthly fundraising deadline? name: Jon Tester
subject: Anyone’s to win
body: Hello, sometimes you just need to make your coffee a double. And thanks to a generous group of donors, your contribution will be doubled too. Donors are matching gifts until our final end-of-month deadline tonight. This rare opportunity won’t last, so please don’t miss your chance to increase your impact. Click here to make a split donation of any amount—and have it matched—to help us win 2024’s most important race. https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_tester?refcode=jtk5605-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 We’re not the only ones doubling down their efforts to win this race. Mitch McConnell’s allies are spending nearly $90 million to help my out-of-stater opponent win. They’re flooding the airwaves and trying to drown out our message. Experts rank Montana’s Senate race a toss-up—which means this race could go either way. And with recent polls locked in a tie, it’s anyone’s to win. Look, the sky won’t fall if you don’t chip in, and I’ll never trick you into donating. That’s not how I do things. But I will tell you the truth: We need to raise another $2,000,000 by midnight tonight and we’re falling behind. We need to work twice as hard to catch up and compete. Will you make a matched donation today and have it split? I’m counting on you to step up. https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_tester?refcode=jtk5605-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 I appreciate your support. When we win this thing, it’ll be because of people like you. –Jon -------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: J. Carville
subject: are you seeing these numbers out of Nevada?!
body: %^@#! $%@&! %^@&#*@ Team, are you seeing these numbers out of Nevada?! I’m truly at aloss: WHY are we not doing more to protect this battleground? Are DemocratsREALLY taking Nevada – of all places – for granted?! I’ve been doing this workfor five decades, and I can tell you it’s THIS kind of complacency that makesDemocrats lose elections, team. That’s why Jacky’steam has set an urgent goal to raise $1 million before her end-of-monthdeadline tonight – and there are NO EXCUSES for Democrats like you to not rushevery bit of support you can afford to help her reach it. name: Bob Casey
subject: Asking one last time
body: [ https://go.bobcasey.com/go/182?t=1001&akid;=4740%2E552475%2EIkpQAv ]BobCasey for Senate Peter, I’ll keep this brief. body: I wanted to make sure you saw my earlier message. | | |                                                                                                                                    --- ![Harris forPresident](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/111/764/original/HFP-Walz-SingleColor-HarrisBlue.png) Peter, I wanted to make sure you saw my message earlier. Our final end-of-month deadline is in a few hours. These resources are critical to our effortsto counter Trump's attacks and reach undecided voters as they head to thepolls. **This is so important. Will you add a $47 gift before midnight so wehave the means to win this election in five short days?** We have built aremarkable movement. Let's keep fighting until the last polling place closeson Tuesday. Thank you and take care, Kamala \---------- Forwarded message---------  From: Kamala Harris Date: Thursday, October 31, 2024 Subject: Will you make your very first $47 contribution right away? Tonight isour final end-of-month deadline, and every dollar we raise will be putstraight to use turning out the voters we need to win. Peter, tonight marks the final end-of-month deadline of this election. The polls are tightening, the attack ads are intensifying, and Donald Trump and his allies are outspending us in key battleground states. **To get back on track, we set a goal to receive 236 more donations from Cresco in the next couple of hours.** So, I am turning to you, Peter. You and are among my most dedicated supporters, and you understand the stakes of this election. **Will you make your first contribution right away? Tonight is our final end-of-month deadline, and every dollar we raise will be put straight to use turning out the voters we need to win.** _If you've saved payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately:_ | | $47 >> --- | $75 >> --- | $100 >> --- | $250 >> --- | $500 >> --- | Other >> ---  I know it might seem like giving $5 or $50 with so little time left won't makea difference, but it will make a profound difference if enough of this teamgives what they can.Thank you for reading, and thank you for your generous support.KamalaKamala Harris Vice President of the United States![KamalaHarris](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/946/902/original/kamala_hopeful.jpg)           * * *| | DONATE --- | TAKE ACTION --- | SHOP ---  * * *This email was sent to **dpwillis67@gmail.com**. Thank you so much for being asupporter. But Peter, we don't want to bother you. If you’d like tounsubscribe from all Harris for President emails, you can **click here**. Wesincerely thank you for your help and support. Paid for by Harris forPresident. ---  ![](https://click.contact.kamalaharris.com/ss/o/u001.ZbNyqOfLYPaP-d23SgKjnQ/4b3/5cly7pVtS_aDEZyuUK3d4w/ho.gif)

name: Debbie Mucarsel-Powell
subject: Short and to the point message
body: Peter — I'm aiming to make this one of the shortest emails in your inboxbecause I know you're getting a lot of requests and your time is valuable. Solet me get straight to the point: I'm up against my final end-of-monthfundraising deadline before Election Day. It comes as polls show me tied withRick Scott, as Floridians begin voting, and as I'm up against $38 million inads to defeat me — courtesy of Scott's fraudulently-earned personal fortune.We've launched an audacious but necessary goal: Raise $10 million before theclock strikes midnight on Oct. 31 so we can fight Rick Scott's attacks, reachevery single voter, and win this seat to protect Democratic Senate control.Every dollar of this $10 million goal will be made up of contributions frompeople like you, which is why I'm counting on you in this moment: Will youplease donate $5, or whatever you can, to help me defeat Rick Scott? RUSH ADONATION — Debbie Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com . Don't want to receive these emails anymore?UnsubscribeDefeat Boebert PAC,

name: Kamala Harris
subject: I just stepped off the stage in Nevada
body: It is going to take all of us to win this November and create the future your community deserves. | | | |  ---  Friends, I just stepped off the stage in Nevada.We have the momentum, and we still have work to do to earn every vote in thiscritical battleground state so that we can elect Democrats down the ballot.Donald Trump, JD Vance, and their allies are going to throw everything at usfor the next few days – **and we cannot counter their attacks without yoursupport. So I have to ask:****_Will you directly power our efforts to win Nevada and the White House?Split a $20 donation between the Nevada Democratic Party and my campaigntoday:_**If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donationwill go through immediately: --- | $20 | $35 | $50 ---|---|--- $75 | $100 | Other  The work ahead will be hard. But hard work is good work. And it is joyful workwhen we do it together.Thanks and take care,KamalaKamala Harris![KamalaHarris](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/115/002/original/Kamala_Harris_Headshot.jpg) ---    Nevada is a critical battleground state for Democrats to keep the Senate andWhite House in 2024. subject: I'm supporting a President who's the most pro-life President.
body: Harrison Butker said it best.͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  | | | ![](https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/public/users/Integrators/669d5713-9b6a-46bb-bd7e-c542cff6dd6a/dacf945cc62b4e24a89a6062cde01b6e/UPRIGHT.png) --- | ---  ![](https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/public/users/Integrators/669d5713-9b6a-46bb-bd7e-c542cff6dd6a/dacf945cc62b4e24a89a6062cde01b6e/3Sequence%2001.00_00_00_07.Still001-02.jpeg) ---  _“I’m supporting a President who’s the most pro-life President—and I thinkthat’s Donald Trump.”_  Harrison Butker said it best.  We need a Presidentwho will stand **STRONG** and **FIGHT** for the unborn, _someone who willstand up for the most vulnerable in our society._  The other side has made itclear—** _they want to push their agenda of abortion on demand, and they willdo whatever it takes to silence the pro-life movement. _** But we won’t letthem. --- ![](https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/public/users/Integrators/669d5713-9b6a-46bb-bd7e-c542cff6dd6a/dacf945cc62b4e24a89a6062cde01b6e/HawleyButkerStLouis-20241010AH-9304559.jpg) --- **STAND WITH HARRISON BUTKER, DEFEND LIFE** ---  President Trump has been the strongest defender of the unborn we’ve ever seenin the White House.  **He’s not afraid to stand up for life, and that’sexactly what our country needs right now.**  We should be fighting for themost vulnerable, fighting for the unborn.  If you are going to donate to anyorganization this cycle, it should be ours, we are mobilizing Christians tovote for **LIFE** in 2024. **That’s the future we’re fighting for.**  We areworking to mobilize voters of faith, but we need your help to keep up thefight. Do you agree with Harrison Butker?  Will you stand with us andsupport the most pro-life President we’ve ever had? --- **STAND WITH HARRISON BUTKER, DEFEND LIFE** --- | --- | | **PAID FOR BY UPRIGHT PAC** --- | | 138 Conant St, Ste. 401Beverly, MA 01915 --- ---   The Republican Team --- _PO Box 2221 Fort Collins, CO 80522_ _**unsubscribe**_ | _manage data preferences_ ![](https://email.alerts.therepublicanteam.com/o/eJyUzkFuwyAQQNHThJ2tGTyGZMER0m2XaIBxggQJAtxev2pv0PWXvt7n3d85l_x6fHAVN_v0ffhj-LM1jss4W3v3ubQuw2vQtCAugH5TyZHVaTNKHNoNaDeEqJ7uMBzCYVjkBski6RCum3DcrdZJQ1TZ_X4QAeFKN4QVYwi7IEROBzDBhYCL9DnW-ZQu7QwlR35N4brGd1XdpfadS8nD2AvBo3Iuf2H-g__l9E8AAAD__zPLUD4)

name: Navy SEAL Ryan Zinke
subject: maybe I bit off more than I could chew
body: But I like to think Conservatives will come through in the end. ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏  Maybe I bit off more than I could chew. Maybethat’s just the way it is. Maybe the Democrat Machine is just too strong withtheir army of highfalutin mega-donors. But I like to think Conservatives willcome through in the end. My name is Ryan Zinke. Look, I served as PresidentTrump’s Secretary of the Interior and as commander at SEAL Team 6 – it takes alot to shake me. But the Democrat Machine has unloaded 322,000,000 dollars tobury House Conservatives and another 70,000,000 bucks to make Montana aDemocrat state. If we stay the course in terms of fundraising, not only willfolks in tight races (like me) lose, but Republicans may never controlCongress again. That’s why I’m going to be completely straightforward withyou, Friend: I’m personally asking you for one last contribution to savevulnerable Republicans before the Democrat Machine wipes us all out. This isso important that I’m partnering with Majority Leader Steve Scalise to helpraise one million dollars before Election Day. Think you could lend a hand?HELP A NAVY SEAL OUT >> A few million bucks won’t scare me off. I know that,Majority Leader Scalise knows that, and the Democrats are about to find outthe hard way when Conservatives everywhere come forward in droves. Our fundsare running DANGEROUSLY LOW so I’m really hoping that includes you. I’veserved this nation in Trump’s Cabinet and in uniform, now I’m humbly askingyou to join our fight to save the country. The election is next week. Pleasedonate now while there’s still to bring the Democrat Machine to its knees.HELP A NAVY SEAL OUT >> For God and Country, Ryan Zinke It's House MajorityLeader Steve Scalise. I’m respectfully asking you to fill out my ELECTION YEARCHECK-IN at your earliest convenience. It’s important. I want to have yourgoals, your concerns, and your priorities in mind before I do anything else.What would you like me to keep in mind when I'm taking on the RadicalDemocrats? START HERE >> Paid for by TEAM SCALISE, a joint fundraisingcommittee authorized by and to benefit SCALISE FOR CONGRESS and EYE OF THETIGER PAC. Team Scalise is committed to defending our Conservative Housemajority and electing Conservatives across the country. Thank you for being apart of our movement. Contributions to TEAM SCALISE, or any participatingcommittee, are not deductible as charitable contributions for federal incometax purposes. Contributions from corporations, national banks, labor unions,foreign nationals without “green cards,” and federal government contractorsare prohibited. Federal law requires us to use our best efforts to collect andreport the name, mailing address, occupation, and employer of each individualwho contributes over $200 in a calendar year. name: Chairman Richard Hudson
subject: Taking a break to say THANK YOU
body: I'm working to defend our House Majority, but I needed to take a minute justfor you͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  | --- | | | | ![](http://e.1600daily.com/rd/9z2zjhf66433rbspl3jf1aoagflmmfdbdvubk3kh2mg_rp22sh2s8i6epj0c5im8or2c9h2bs) ---  Dear Friend,  As we enter the final days before Election Day, I want to take a moment toreflect on the incredible journey we've shared. From the earliest days of thiselection cycle, you've been the driving force behind our efforts to grow theHouse Majority.  As Chairman of the National Republican Congressional Committee, I've had theprivilege of traveling the country, working with our candidates, and seeingyour impact firsthand. Your generosity has allowed us to build a top-notchteam, craft cutting-edge campaigns, and fight the Democrat machine.  But I know that our success isn't just about House Republicans - **it's aboutthe countless hours you've volunteered, your thoughtful survey responses, andthe contributions you've given to fuel our movement. You're the unsung hero ofour party, and I'm honored to stand alongside you in this fight.**  Now, as we sprint to the finish line, I need your help one more time if youcan spare a few dollars.  **We're facing a fierce battle in the final days of this election, and everydollar counts. That's why I'm humbly asking you to make a final contributionto help defend our razor-thin House Majority.**  Your donation will go directly towards our Get Out the Vote efforts,advertising, and other key pieces of our campaign operation. It will help usdefend our vulnerable incumbents, _flip key seats, and elect a new generationof conservative leaders._  If you can swing it, one last contribution would mean the world to me, but ifnot, please don't stress, you've done so much for us already.  Thank you and God Bless America,  **Richard Hudson ** _Chairman_ , National Republican Congressional Committee  --- | ![](https://www.myimgcloud.com/0d8b0490-e4fc-4393-8de6-5e67d4a702d9.png) --- | --- | Paid for by the NRCC and not authorized by any candidate or candidate'scommittee. NRCC.org --- NRCC 320 First St SE Washington, DC 20003     By providing your cell phone or mobile phone number you are consenting toreceive calls and texts, including autodialed and automated calls and texts,to that number with campaign notifications from the National RepublicanCongressional Committee (21818).  NRCC is happy to help at 888-606-1023. Reply HELP for help, STOP to end.MessFreqMayVary. Msg&DataRatesMayApply. Message frequency may vary. Terms andConditions here. name: Debbie [key race alert]
subject: this poll shows that this race is FAR from over >>>
body: Friend, I almost spilled my coffee when I got the news — did you see thispoll? A recent, A+ poll shows that we’re statistically tied with Rick Scott.He’s spent millions on TV ads attacking me, and he still can’t pull ahead.I’ve said it all along: Florida is in play. We can win this race. I know it,Floridians know it, and Rick Scott knows it too. That’s why he and his superPAC are spending millions of dollars every week attacking me and trying to buyhis Senate seat again. He spent $10.5 million on new ads, and he just infusedhis campaign with another $3 MILLION from his own corrupt fortune. This raceis so close — and with this grassroots movement, we can retire creepy Rick forgood. But I need you with me. My LAST fundraising deadline of the Election isjust days away, friend. Will you chip in $5 right now to help me close the gapon my FINAL $4 MILLION goal?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2461-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Every single dollar helps us put up more ads,knock more doors, call more voters, and make sure every Floridian knows thatthey have a choice this November — and that we can finally replace corruptRick Scott with a senator who will put Floridians first. name: Rudy Giuliani
subject: Now, my primary residence could be “seized”
body: BREAKING: A federal judge is now considering… ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏  Dear Friend, On October 22, a federal judge decreed that I had 7days to hand over my home in New York – as well as my only car and sentimentalkeepsakes and heartfelt gifts that I collected over the span of 80 years. Ithought that would be the end of the damage… But with the election rightaround the corner, Kamala’s Deep State truly wants to ruin me with all they’vegot. They’re now considering dealing one final blow to me. A judge may noworder me to give up my remaining home in Florida – my primary residence. As mylawyer inquired: do they truly want me homeless? Over the last few days, we’veheard ridiculous claims about President Trump being a “fascist.” Let me tellyou what fascism is… Fascism is weaponizing the legal system to punish yourpolitical opponents. Fascism is having your home taken from you. Fascism istaking the law license away from your opponent’s lawyer. Fascism is trying toturn your enemies into political prisoners. I am living through theDemocrats’ fascism right now. I sincerely pray that freedom, justice, and thetruth prevail on Tuesday, November 5 – or the damage done to me will spreadlike wildfire to the rest of our great Republic. But, as I wrote to you in anearlier letter, the Bible reminds us that our earthly possessions will alwaysfade, but greater “heavenly treasures” await us. The pursuit of truth,freedom, and justice are worth infinitely more than a car or a home.Possessions come and go, but I couldNEVER SURRENDER my fight for freedom andfor what I know to betrue. I would be tone deaf if I didn’t acknowledge thattimes are tough right now for all Americans, not just me, so please stopreading here if you cannot give at this time. But funding my Legal DefenseTrust is my last remaining hope of fighting for my freedom and for the libertyand justice of all Americans. So, if you can, and, seriously, only if you can,please make a contribution to my Legal Defense Trust – the Rudy GiulianiFreedom Fund – as I keep fighting for my freedom and justice as Kamala’s DeepState tries to JAIL me for life. CONTRIBUTE $25 CONTRIBUTE $50 CONTRIBUTE$100 CONTRIBUTE $250 CONTRIBUTE $500 CONTRIBUTE OTHER AMOUNT Thank you andGod bless you, Rudy Giuliani Rudy Giuliani Freedom Fund Paid for by RudyGiuliani Freedom Fund Legal Defense Trust Conservative Liberty Wire PO Box1188 Fort Collins, CO 80522 unsubscribe |manage data preferences

name: Chairman Richard Hudson
subject: Taking a break to say THANK YOU
body: I'm working to defend our House Majority, but I needed to take a minute justfor you͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  | --- | | | | ![](http://e.americanbriefing.com/rd/9z2zpihmmrf5ipoevv62fumj693tac3apg3q47oma2o_rp22sh2s8i6epj0c5imeo34c5h2bs) ---  Dear Friend,  As we enter the final days before Election Day, I want to take a moment toreflect on the incredible journey we've shared. From the earliest days of thiselection cycle, you've been the driving force behind our efforts to grow theHouse Majority.  As Chairman of the National Republican Congressional Committee, I've had theprivilege of traveling the country, working with our candidates, and seeingyour impact firsthand. Your generosity has allowed us to build a top-notchteam, craft cutting-edge campaigns, and fight the Democrat machine.  But I know that our success isn't just about House Republicans - **it's aboutthe countless hours you've volunteered, your thoughtful survey responses, andthe contributions you've given to fuel our movement. You're the unsung hero ofour party, and I'm honored to stand alongside you in this fight.**  Now, as we sprint to the finish line, I need your help one more time if youcan spare a few dollars.  **We're facing a fierce battle in the final days of this election, and everydollar counts. That's why I'm humbly asking you to make a final contributionto help defend our razor-thin House Majority.**  Your donation will go directly towards our Get Out the Vote efforts,advertising, and other key pieces of our campaign operation. It will help usdefend our vulnerable incumbents, _flip key seats, and elect a new generationof conservative leaders._  If you can swing it, one last contribution would mean the world to me, but ifnot, please don't stress, you've done so much for us already.  Thank you and God Bless America,  **Richard Hudson ** _Chairman_ , National Republican Congressional Committee  --- | ![](https://www.myimgcloud.com/0d8b0490-e4fc-4393-8de6-5e67d4a702d9.png) --- | --- | Paid for by the NRCC and not authorized by any candidate or candidate'scommittee. name: @Debbie
subject: What $10 — and a box of doughnuts — means to me
body: Debbie Mucarsel-Powellhttps://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk2462-fr-text Friend, You probably didn’t wake up this morning and think, “Today's theday I’m going to make a $10 donation to DMP's campaign!” — but ahead of myLAST deadline of the Election, it's what I’m about to ask you to do. UnlikeRick Scott, I don't have a massive fortune at my campaign's disposal. I comefrom a working-class family, so I know my eye-watering $4 million goal isnothing to shake a stick at. But it's the only way I'll be able to defeat him.If that's all you need to hear, please click here to chip in $10 now — but I'dlike to share what your hard-earned $10 means to me.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk2462-fr-text See, my family moved to the United States from Ecuador with big dreamsfor a better life when I was 14. But it didn't come easy, and despite my momworking back-to-back double shifts, we still struggled to afford rent on ourone room apartment. So once I turned 15, I began taking early morning shiftsat a doughnut shop before school. It wasn't much, but the extra cash gave myfamily room to breathe, and eventually, the life we dreamt of finally cametrue. But I'm not the only one who got their start in the doughnut business.When he was a young man, my opponent, Rick Scott, bought two doughnut shops.While I made minimum wage to help keep the lights on at home, he reaped thebenefits of his employees' hard work. For me, those $10 boxes of doughnutswere a lifeline that helped my family get by. For him, they kicked off acareer in penthouse C-suites. And with your $10, you can help me kick Rick outof the Senate on election night — so please, pitch in now.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk2462-fr-text I went on to graduate college, fight to improve life for working familieslike my own, and become the first South American immigrant elected toCongress. Rick Scott went on to enrich himself off U.S. taxpayers via thelargest Medicare fraud scheme in history, amass a nine-figure fortune, and buyhis way into the Senate. So I don't take your help toward reaching my $4million goal lightly. There's simply no way I could ever do it on my own. Myopponent, however, can spend $4 million to get his ads on screens withoutthinking twice — and he has already spent plenty more to stop me. So the onlyway we'll get him out and give working Floridians the Senate representation wedeserve is if we hit my $4 million goal. Please, friend: Will you give just$10 — about the cost of a dozen doughnuts — to help me retire Rick Scott?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk2462-fr-text This campaign is powered by small-dollar donations, so every cent makes abig difference. Thank you for everything, Debbie -------- This email was sentto dpwillis67@gmail.com. To unsubscribe from this email list, please clickhere:https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/7CGTHFDMeUWW_Wz2yFDujA2?unsubscribedata=1Qb%2Br%2BWtMjnh4gQGrZgmyI6y8OKFjyICyqjFq%2F3xMUzqI8BlnaKxWZkA7DDcOJP4O2qXwkXESfrs6r9SWqkTbTNxceWN9%2FPV%2BiRt5UIZd2mHeoDUYNFLP2Dv1%2FwzPsJvzABGWBWUMHTTGbT2VQBqUlYbTeTH%2FYsPEkC%2Bc79gL7HYnI7HoiDneTvk9gckFr5T1YmXfzkYxpTsmJmiNSYXpsIEHUNh2CeiTS%2B5dIc36Z%2FkeOUpy%2BVO73g26q%2F1tBD3IEcJuShdfTr1lGagFpFJmHdbeDSU12Vmr25G2FMOwEo8FMxRiZixq5thm7cdnbpdfsOAjyKHSVvKCpBVWndRYtFVPJmqqT0VNtSyjCK9afnj41xKnx1C7xhzrJF8zGDDL8DstIcNDYRXXlkJHOZZhji1c8tqSI2hkD%2BRk7wInOQhT2taseybF38w0XT4n1pSPaid for by Debbie for Florida. name: Colin Allred
subject: I have a big favor to ask:
body: Friend, I have a big favor to ask: If just 5% of folks reading this email chipped in $5, we would hit our $500,000 goal in no time. Can I count on you to step up with a split donation of $10 today to ensure my team and I have the resources we need to push back against the $40 million worth of attack ads Ted Cruz and his allies are running against us right now? https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gfs_colinallred?refcode=jtk5609-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Last time around, Ted Cruz won his race by just over 2% of the vote – that was a difference of about 215,000 votes, friend. I remember how it felt watching the results roll in on November 6, 2018, and let me tell you, it was a nail-biter. I have no doubts that this year will be when we finally send Ted Cruz packing. But despite being closer than ever to defeating Ted, we've still got a lot more work to do and only a handful of days left to do it. I know seeing a number like $500,000 can feel overwhelming, but if thousands of hardworking folks like you chip in $5 here, $25 there, and the occasional $100, we will be able to collectively reach this critical goal. So please, will you chip in a split donation between my campaign and Kirsten Gillibrand's of $10 or whatever you can afford now so I can hit my daily fundraising goal and flip Texas blue? We've got zero time left to go, so let's get it done, friend! https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gfs_colinallred?refcode=jtk5609-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thanks for being on my team, Colin Allred -------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Chairman Richard Hudson
subject: Taking a break to say THANK YOU
body: I'm working to defend our House Majority, but I needed to take a minute justfor you͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  | --- | | | | ![](http://e.goppresidential.com/rd/9z2z6abo820or8scivgh9ne7vl1gio1a9auhfsq0leo_rp22sh2s8i6epj0c5im1o71c1h2bs) ---  Dear Friend,  As we enter the final days before Election Day, I want to take a moment toreflect on the incredible journey we've shared. From the earliest days of thiselection cycle, you've been the driving force behind our efforts to grow theHouse Majority.  As Chairman of the National Republican Congressional Committee, I've had theprivilege of traveling the country, working with our candidates, and seeingyour impact firsthand. Your generosity has allowed us to build a top-notchteam, craft cutting-edge campaigns, and fight the Democrat machine.  But I know that our success isn't just about House Republicans - **it's aboutthe countless hours you've volunteered, your thoughtful survey responses, andthe contributions you've given to fuel our movement. You're the unsung hero ofour party, and I'm honored to stand alongside you in this fight.**  Now, as we sprint to the finish line, I need your help one more time if youcan spare a few dollars.  **We're facing a fierce battle in the final days of this election, and everydollar counts. That's why I'm humbly asking you to make a final contributionto help defend our razor-thin House Majority.**  Your donation will go directly towards our Get Out the Vote efforts,advertising, and other key pieces of our campaign operation. It will help usdefend our vulnerable incumbents, _flip key seats, and elect a new generationof conservative leaders._  If you can swing it, one last contribution would mean the world to me, but ifnot, please don't stress, you've done so much for us already.  Thank you and God Bless America,  **Richard Hudson ** _Chairman_ , National Republican Congressional Committee  --- | ![](https://www.myimgcloud.com/0d8b0490-e4fc-4393-8de6-5e67d4a702d9.png) --- | --- | Paid for by the NRCC and not authorized by any candidate or candidate'scommittee. subject: We can chase 200,000 more ballots
body: The ENTHUSIASM and ENERGY that the Turning Point Action team has seen fromhard-working, patriotic volunteers is incredible. ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏  Friend, I've got HUNDREDS of patriotic volunteers connectingwith Turning Point Action's CHASE THE VOTE efforts every single day. And forEACH new volunteer our Turning Point Action team can train and deploy, weexpect 200 MORE BALLOTS to be chased! name: Navy SEAL Ryan Zinke
subject: maybe I bit off more than I could chew
body: But I like to think Conservatives will come through in the end.͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  | |    --- | | | | ![Ryan Zinke](https://e.trumptrainnews.com/rd/9z2zl0f6i4fosf9ghpro1vusn5l35fg0j9udffd6lt8_rp22sh2s8i6epj0c5hm0or4cth2bs) ---  Maybe I bit off more than I could chew.  Maybe that's just the way it is.  Maybe the Democrat Machine is just too strong with their army of highfalutinmega-donors.  _**But I like to think Conservatives will come through in the end.**_  My name is Ryan Zinke. Look, I served as President Trump's Secretary of theInterior and as commander at SEAL Team 6 - it takes a lot to shake me. But theDemocrat Machine has unloaded 322,000,000 dollars to bury House Conservativesand another 70,000,000 bucks to make Montana a Democrat state.  _If we stay the course in terms of fundraising, not only will folks in tightraces (like me) lose, but Republicans may never control Congress again._  That's why I'm going to be completely straightforward with you, Friend:  _**I'm personally asking you for one last contribution to save vulnerableRepublicans before the Democrat Machine wipes us all out.**_ This is soimportant that I'm partnering with Majority Leader Steve Scalise to help raiseone million dollars before Election Day.  Think you could lend a hand? --- | | | HELP A NAVY SEAL OUT >> --- | ![RyanZinke](https://www.myimgcloud.com/20229a6f-ad93-4746-8379-6a8865427785.png) ---  A few million bucks won't scare me off. I know that, Majority Leader Scaliseknows that, and the Democrats are about to find out the hard way whenConservatives everywhere come forward in droves.  **Our funds are running DANGEROUSLY LOW so I 'm really hoping that includesyou.**  I've served this nation in Trump's Cabinet and in uniform, now I'm humblyasking you to join our fight to save the country.  _**The election is next week. Please donate now while there's still to bringthe Democrat Machine to its knees.**_ --- | | | HELP A NAVY SEAL OUT >> --- For God and Country, Ryan Zinke     --- | | * * *  --- | ![Please take my Election Year Check-In!](https://www.myimgcloud.com/436c781b-63ab-44e6-a6f9-23529b280a40.gif) ---  It's House Majority Leader Steve Scalise.  I'm respectfully asking you to fill out my _**ELECTION YEAR CHECK-IN**_ atyour earliest convenience. It's important. Thank you for being a part of ourmovement.  Contributions to TEAM SCALISE, or any participating committee, are notdeductible as charitable contributions for federal income tax purposes.Contributions from corporations, national banks, labor unions, foreignnationals without "green cards," and federal government contractors areprohibited. name: Tammy Baldwin
subject: Uphill battle
body: [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/67?t=1001&akid;=4398%2E35263%2ERUCvvc ]TAMMY BALDWIN FOR SENATE I wish I had better news to share with you, Peter. My team just let me know that we came up short of our October fundraising goal last night. This was always going to be an uphill battle. We had to raise our goals multiple times throughout the month to keep up with the tens of millions of dollars Republicans continue to spend on brutal attack ads against me. Now, I won’t tell you that the sky is falling because we missed this goal. But I will tell you the truth, which is that we’re starting November with a significant gap in our budget. That’s a problem because if we need to cut back on our campaign ads or get-out-the-vote efforts this late in the race, Republicans could easily flip this battleground seat. Staying competitive in this toss-up race isn’t as easy for me as tapping into a multimillion-dollar personal fortune like my opponent can. Instead, I rely on folks like you who pitch in what you can, when you can, to help power our campaign. [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2155?c0=tbe-em-nov24.ANyQo7&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_GEN_GEN_AC_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&t;=1004&akid;=4398%2E35263%2ERUCvvc ]So I’m humbly asking: Can I count on you to chip in today to help us defend Wisconsin’s Senate seat from my self-funding Republican opponent? name: Bernie Moreno
subject: Worse than garbage
body: Bernie Moreno for US Senate They think those of us who disagree with them –half the country – are deplorable, Nazi garbage... and worse! Fellow patriot,Biden thinks you’re “garbage” – but Sherrod Brown and his supporters thinkyou’re worse... This is one of the biggest elitist bankrollers of SherrodBrown, Kamala Harris, and the DNC. This is who Sherrod is beholden to and whohe has to comply with in order to continue having his campaign war chestpadded. Brown, Harris, and the radical left have shown us their true colors.They think those of us who disagree with them –half the country – aredeplorable, Nazi garbage... and worse! It’s time to put an end to theirhateful and destructive hold on our nation. We need to fight fiercer than everuntil this is over. Can you chip in another $10 today to keep our campaigncruising on the path to victory? For American Greatness! Bernie Moreno GOPNominee for Senate, Ohio Meet Bernie Moreno: Bernie Moreno fights for theAmerican Dream because he’s lived it. Bernie was born in Bogota, Colombia. Atage five, his American Dream began when he moved to the United States with hisfamily. Bernie became an American citizen at age 18. Through his relentlesswork ethic and untamable entrepreneurial spirit, he turned the first cardealership that he purchased in 2005 into one of the largest dealership groupsin America. In 2016, Bernie recognized the value and transformationalpotential of blockchain technology, before it received mainstream attention,and moved much of his volunteer time and investment dollars into the space. In2018 he co-founded ChampTitles, which grew to be quite successful as Bernieserved as Chairman of the Board. After a long, successful career, Bernie soldmost of his business to begin focusing on his calling: protecting the Americandream for another generation. Solving our country’s problems requires commonsense. In Washington, Bernie will fight to shrink government, protect ourfreedoms, stop the Chinese Communist party from taking our data and land, andalways put America First. Ohioans are done with politicians who talk a biggame and do nothing. Bernie wants to go to D.C. to get work done – just likehe always has. Join Bernie ➞ FOLLOW BERNIE ON SOCIAL MEDIA Paid for byBernie Moreno for Senate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hateto see you go: unsubscribe .

name: Dan Osborn
subject: my announcement
body: Click here to stop receiving emails about Dan Osborn's campaign in Nebraskafrom us. [https://secure.ngpvan.com/uB3EyayArUyKTBgRW_x--A2]https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]Hello,The system is rigged. We all know it. The only people who can afford to runfor Senate full-time are millionaires like my opponent, Republican DebFischer. That’s why they’re the only people who ever win. It’s why the Senateis just another country club full of Ivy League graduates, former businessexecs, and trust fund babies. Working people like me, we can’t afford to giveup our jobs to run for office. During this campaign, I’ve been working 40, 60,sometimes 90 hours a week as a steamfitter just to pay our bills and put foodon the table. How’s anybody with a real job supposed to campaign and win whenyour opponent is wealthy enough to not work at all? That’s why I announcedthat I was taking a leave from my job as a steamfitter to campaign full-timefor the U.S. Senate and keep up our momentum. And yes, that means I’m going toneed to take a salary from our campaign. Not a big one. Just enough to replacethe $48,000 I got paid last year and the cost of health care for me and myfamily. Politics shouldn’t only be for the rich, and this is the only way wecan change that. Five brand-new polls show me narrowly LEADING my opponent,Republican Deb Fischer – and according to FiveThirtyEight, this is now theCLOSEST Senate race in the country. With support from grassroots donors likeyou, we out-raised Fischer, but Mitch McConnell is spending over $13.1 millionon TV ads attacking me. Together, we are charting the path for how a bluecollar, union worker can run for U.S. Senate – and win. But I need grassrootsdonors like you to chip in to my campaign right now if we’re going to defeatRepublican Deb Fischer and flip this Senate seat: Please, will you make adonation to my campaign right now – no amount you can afford is too small – tohelp me defeat Republican Deb Fischer and flip this Senate seat in November?[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]Please use the links in this email to start a monthly donation throughActBlue: DONATE $10[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $25[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $35[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $50[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $100[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]Other Amount[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email_osborn?refcode=em20241101am-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=57e61702-4d98-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]I’m not rich. I’m not trying to become rich. I’m running for Senate becauseworking people like me deserve a seat at the table in Washington and someonewho will fight for us day in and day out. Your support – of any amount – meansmore to me than you will ever know. Thank you, Dan Osborn Paid for by Adam forColorado.Adam for Colorado PO Box 1240 Glenwood Springs, CO 81602 UnitedStates Contributions or gifts to Adam for Colorado are not tax deductible.This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Sherrod Brown
subject: we might have to cancel our final TV ads
body: Friend, I need you to hear this: I just talked to my campaign manager, and shesaid we may not be able to keep our TV ads on the air in this final stretch.We missed our end-of-month goal last night, so now we're facing a significantbudget gap. Unless we see a surge of support ahead of our extended deadline atmidnight, we'll have to make some serious cuts, and we could cede the airwavesto Republican attacks. With only four days to Election Day and a new pollshowing me trailing my MAGA opponent, this could not come at a worse time. Andwith FiveThirtyEight saying our race is the closest of the cycle, I mean itwhen I say we have zero room for error. That's why I'm personally asking,friend: Will you rush $5 to help us keep our final TV ads on the air, win inOhio, and keep the Senate blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/sherrod-brown-email-wr-24?refcode=jtk3753-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 We need to finishstrong, friend. name: Ruben Gallego
subject: If you knew your donation could win this race, wouldn’t you chip in?
body: If you knew a donation of $10 could defeat Kari Lake for good, wouldn’t youchip it in right away? If you knew that $10 could help defeat Trump in Arizona(and probably make sure he loses nationwide) wouldn’t that be some of the bestmoney you’ve ever spent? If that $10 donation could put an end to the lasteight years of MAGA Right politics and help us move forward, together, as acountry… Why wouldn’t you donate? It might not seem like your donation of $10could do all that. Up against millions of dollars from Lake and the outsidegroups who are trying to get her elected, I get that. But I’ve got to tellyou: Just about every dollar we’ve raised in this campaign has come fromsomeone like you, chipping in whatever they could, when the time was right forthem. Those donations have gotten us this far. 400,000 of them. And today, Ineed you to make one more. With Kari Lake outspending us on television, everydollar we raise goes towards narrowing the gap. Your $10 could determine theoutcome of this election. Really. So, please. I know you can’t donate to everyemail we send, but if you could dig deep and split that $10 donation withUpset the Setup, I would be incredibly grateful to you. name: Bob Casey
subject: Do you have a minute?
body: [ https://go.bobcasey.com/go/182?t=1001&akid;=4741%2E552475%2EqDX7Gc ]BobCasey for Senate Can I have a minute of your timePeter, ? We fell short of ourfinal end-of-month fundraising goal, so I’m reaching out because we need to doeverything possible in the final 4 days of this campaign to win. That’s whyI'm reaching out to ask for just $1. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241101-1?refcode=em20241101-1&amount;=1&refcode2;=4741_552475_qDX7Gc&akid;=4741%2E552475%2EqDX7Gc]Chip in $1 ›› I know $1 may not seem like much, but with enough peoplestepping up today, we can close our fundraising gap and fight back against the$150 million that out-of-state billionaires have spent trying to buy thisseat. name: Carville, J.
subject: sounding the alarm
body: Friend, I’ve got about half a century of politics under my belt, so you cantrust me when I say this: Rick Scott poses one of the single greatest threatsto our democracy and everything that we Democrats care about — full stop. NowI’m known for making some pretty bold statements, but this is no exaggeration:Rick Scott is pushing an agenda so extreme, even Mitch McConnell wants nothingto do with it. I’m talking about ending Social Security and Medicare, raisingtaxes on working families, a national ban on abortions, and so much more. I’mscared half to death thinking about what could happen if we give this guy 6more years in Washington — especially with MAGA extremists on the cusp ofretaking the Senate. But right now, Democrat Debbie Mucarsel-Powell is fallingdangerously short of her LAST $4 million fundraising goal ahead of ElectionDay. I’m asking you to take the gloves off and go on the offensive with me:Please, will you donate $5 or more to help Debbie flip Florida blue and saveour Senate majority?https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2463-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Listen, just about anyone can see that a bluewave is building in Florida. As folks from all across the state rally behindDebbie’s campaign, polling data shows that this race against extremist RickScott is a dead heat. And that barely scratches the surface: Even with theextreme abortion ban officially in effect, Florida Democrats secured areproductive rights ballot initiative this November and won a critical specialelection, flipping a pivotal state House district from red to blue. That’s whyDemocratic leaders like my friend Chuck Schumer, and even President Biden, areall in on Florida this year. They’ve announced HUGE investments to make surethat voters learn the truth about Rick Scott’s record. This state is ready toflip blue — but we’ve all got to have Debbie’s back in this fight. So I’masking one final time: PLEASE, will you donate $5 or as much as you can spareright now to make sure that Debbie has everything that she needs to take onRick Scott and defeat him?https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2463-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thank you for taking the time to read thisemail. Debbie can win, but only if folks like you believe in her and invest inher campaign. James Carville -------- This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Bernie Moreno
subject: Deplorable Nazi garbage
body: Bernie Moreno for US Senate It’s time to put an end to their hateful anddestructive hold on our nation. Peter, Biden thinks you’re “garbage” – butSherrod Brown and his supporters think you’re worse... This is one of thebiggest elitist bankrollers of Sherrod Brown, Kamala Harris, and the DNC. Thisis who Sherrod is beholden to and who he has to comply with in order tocontinue having his campaign war chest padded. Brown, Harris, and the radicalleft have shown us their true colors. They think those of us who disagree withthem –half the country – are deplorable, Nazi garbage... and worse! It’s timeto put an end to their hateful and destructive hold on our nation. We need tofight fiercer than ever until this is over. Can you chip in another $10 todayto keep our campaign cruising on the path to victory? For American Greatness!Bernie Moreno GOP Nominee for Senate, Ohio Meet Bernie Moreno: Bernie Morenofights for the American Dream because he’s lived it. Bernie was born inBogota, Colombia. At age five, his American Dream began when he moved to theUnited States with his family. Bernie became an American citizen at age 18.Through his relentless work ethic and untamable entrepreneurial spirit, heturned the first car dealership that he purchased in 2005 into one of thelargest dealership groups in America. In 2016, Bernie recognized the value andtransformational potential of blockchain technology, before it receivedmainstream attention, and moved much of his volunteer time and investmentdollars into the space. In 2018 he co-founded ChampTitles, which grew to bequite successful as Bernie served as Chairman of the Board. After a long,successful career, Bernie sold most of his business to begin focusing on hiscalling: protecting the American dream for another generation. Solving ourcountry’s problems requires common sense. In Washington, Bernie will fight toshrink government, protect our freedoms, stop the Chinese Communist party fromtaking our data and land, and always put America First. Ohioans are done withpoliticians who talk a big game and do nothing. Bernie wants to go to D.C. toget work done – just like he always has. Join Bernie ➞ FOLLOW BERNIE ONSOCIAL MEDIA Paid for by Bernie Moreno for Senate Don't want to receive anymore of our emails? We hate to see you go: unsubscribe .

name: Donald J. Trump
subject: I’m counting on you, Friend. MAGA is a people-powered movement.
body: Here’s what we’re up against over the final 4 days.                                    | | | | |  --- ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/c9/c9a6574a-eb28-4d0c-88ee-18e5c3b5334f/classic-blue-logo-.png) | --- **_WE’RE BEING OUTSPENT BY KAMALA’S BILLIONAIRES!_**  ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/7e/7ec2d3d1-a3bd-4948-87c5-d001f5c5cc29/4-days-until-election-day.png) They’re outpacing us by **$13M** in Wisconsin, **$36M** in Pennsylvania, and**$36M** in Michigan! We’ve got 4 days left to close the gap. 4 days left to **SAVE THE COUNTRY!** And if we can outraise Kamala by 11:59PM — our GOVERNMENT MANDATED DEADLINE —we’ll gain the upper hand. **_Will you please donate just $10 right now to make it happen?>_**  GIVE $10 **I’m counting on you.** But even if you can’t afford to give today, please know that **I will alwayslove you.** Thank you for your support, Friend, it really means the world to me. **So only if it won’t break the bank, please chip in $10 for a TRUMP LANDSLIDEVICTORY.>**  GIVE $10 **I also really hope you will pledge to donate again before the pollsclose.>** It would mean the world to me if you could pledge to give again. name: Jordan Zaslow
subject: 4 Days: The exam room isn’t big enough…
body: Hi there, Florida is one of 22 states in which Abortion is banned or extremelyrestricted. In just 4 days, voters in FL will have the chance to enshrineabortion in their constitution. We are proud to be supporting the work to passthat constitutional amendment as well as the woman who is running to unseatWebster Barnaby. As you may recall, Barnaby is responsible for introducing the6-week, Texas-style abortion ban in FL in the first place. We are excited toshare our endorsement of Rosemarie Latham for Florida House District 29.Polling shows that Rosemarie is closer to winning this race against herextremist, anti-choice opponent (within 3 points!!) than anyone could haveexpected. Let’s help her finish the job. Rush support to her campaign bypitching in a split $20.24 or more contribution today. →https://secure.actblue.com/donate/hbmfl-latham/?refcode=EM_F_241101introduced_N_JZ_90DO_10_G_N_PT From NPR: [ARepublican state lawmaker in Florida is proposing a bill that would ban mostabortions as early as around six weeks, allow members of the public to sueanyone who helps end a pregnancy beyond that point and fine physicians $10,000for each abortion they perform later in pregnancy. Republican state Rep.Webster Barnaby filed the 40-page proposal — called the "Florida HeartbeatAct" — on Wednesday. It would prevent physicians from performing abortions ifthere is a "detectable fetal heartbeat," effectively banning abortions afterabout six weeks into pregnancy, before many people even know they arepregnant. ] We have said it before and we’ll say it again: MEN SHOULD NOT BEMAKING LAWS ABOUT WOMEN’S BODIES! Rosemarie is a single mother of daughters.She has been a nurse for 43 years, and a nurse practitioner for 25 years. Shehas decades of experience caring for women 16 and over, including providingthem with reproductive healthcare. Through this experience, she has directlyengaged in the triumphs and challenges of our healthcare system and has seenthe ripple effect on people’s lives. “The exam room isn’t big enough to fitme, my patient, and Florida’s government.” This is why Rosemarie chose to runfor office. Because she is determined to do everything she can for women’shealth and safety. The same cannot be said about her opponent. We are sick andtired of men making dangerous laws about our bodies and our lives. We areworking hard to restore abortion access in Florida. A critical step in thatprocess will be to unseat the men who worked to pass abortion bans and replacethem with fiercely pro choice women. Help us ensure Rosemarie wins this seatby rushing a split $20.24 or more contribution between the Latham campaign andHer Bold Move today. → https://secure.actblue.com/donate/hbmfl-latham/?refcode=EM_F_241101introduced_N_JZ_90DO_10_G_N_PT Onward, JordanZaslow Founder & Executive Director of Her Bold Move Her Bold Move believesthat ambitious women will transform our country. We provide critical supportfor fiercely pro-choice women candidates and their campaign teams: financialsupport, endorsements, message amplification, campaign media, fundraisingsupport, and more. Will you support us with a contribution today?https://secure.actblue.com/donate/hbmfl-latham/?refcode=EM_F_241101introduced_N_JZ_90DO_10_G_N_PT Paid for by Her BoldMove Action. name: Maggie Goodlander
subject: let’s finish the job!
body: Peter, I’m absolutely amazed by the overwhelming support you’ve shown to myteam and me since launching this campaign. I just wanted to take a second tothank you from the bottom of my heart for your continued support. Over thecourse of this campaign, we’ve built an incredible network of grassrootssupporters united behind three simple but powerful values: freedom, democracy,and fairness. Election Day is next Tuesday, and I need your help to finish thejob. This is our last weekend to spread our message and turn out the voters weneed to keep this seat out of the hands of MAGA extremists and secure aDemocratic majority in the People’s House! name: Team Nikki
subject: They’re attacking the ACA again
body: Paid for by Nikki Budzinski for Congress [https://nvlupin.blob.core.windows.net/images/van/NGP/NGP12/1/92407/images/Budzinski_Logo_AAA.png] Republicans Once Again Have Their Sights Set on the Affordable Care Act — October 30, 2024 More than 50 million Americans have obtained health care through the ACA, and in 2024 enrollments saw a notable surge in red states. Efforts to repeal the law are effectively an electoral hot potato, and likely contributed to the GOP’s loss of the House in 2018. With Trump and congressional Republicans battling razor-thin margins in their bid to retake control of Congress and the White House, one would expect them to tread carefully. PITCH IN TO FLIP THE HOUSE [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/njb-em-nov2024] Team — the Affordable Care Act was monumental and provides millions of Americans with affordable healthcare coverage. Americans from all walks of life were able to afford the care they need to see doctors and stay healthy, yet Republicans have been trying for over a decade to repeal the ACA. We know that Donald Trump and the GOP don’t have a plan, and “concepts of a plan” aren’t going to keep our families safe and healthy. But to protect foundational policies like the ACA, we have to reelect frontline Democrats like Nikki and take back the House majority. name: Adam Schiff
subject: Thank you
body: [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/62?t=1001&akid;=8118%2E5257348%2Etplz8- ]Adam Schiff for Senate Hi Derek — It’s finally November, and we are just days away from determining the future of our nation at the ballot box. Everything we’ve worked toward comes down to these final moments — and I want to take a moment to say thank you for standing with me every step of the way. This journey has been full of challenges and hard work — from mobilizing voters and supporting Democratic candidates here in California and the rest of the country to the attacks from Trump and his MAGA allies. Through it all, I’ve been inspired by the way this team has rallied behind me and the issues that matter most to them and their families. Your unwavering support has made all of this possible — and now we’re just days away from the finish line. We have the opportunity to keep the Senate blue, flip the House, and ensure we can move forward together — every conversation, every volunteer, every dollar raised, and every vote counts in this work. It’s not just about what we’re fighting against — it’s about what we’re fighting for. So let’s make sure every voter knows what’s at stake and how much better our future can be. Thank you again for everything you’ve done so far. With your continued support, I know we’ll finish strong and win this race. All my best, Adam P.S. name: Gloria Johnson
subject: Freedom
body: It’s November 1st, y’all, which means we’re in the final stretch of one of themost critical elections in modern history. I want to take a moment to remindyou — this isn’t just another battle between Democrats and Republicans. It’s afight to protect a fundamental value that unites us all: Freedom. 💗 Thefreedom to love who you love. 🏥 The freedom to make decisions about your ownhealthcare. 🗳️ The freedom to cast your vote without unnecessary obstacles. ❌The freedom to live without fear of gun violence. I’ve fought for thesefreedoms every day in the state legislature, and I’m ready to take that fightto the U.S. Senate. But Marsha Blackburn and her special-interest allies aredoing everything they can to hold onto this seat and keep it working for therich and powerful. With only 4 days left, my team has set one final goal toclose this campaign in full force — $100,000. Every dollar goes straighttoward reaching voters, keeping our ads on the air, and making sure we leavenothing on the table in these final days. If everyone reading this chips injust a few dollars, we’ll be one step closer to victory on November 5th. Can Icount on you? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax] If you’ve savedyour payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go throughimmediately: DONATE $5[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?express_lane=true&amount;=5]DONATE $10[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?express_lane=true&amount;=10]DONATE $25[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?express_lane=true&amount;=25]DONATE $100[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?express_lane=true&amount;=100]DONATE $250[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?express_lane=true&amount;=250]OTHER AMOUNT [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax] Let’s do this forTennessee and for the future we all deserve. Gloria Johnson-------------------------- Gloria Johnson is running for the U.S. Senatebecause Tennesseans deserve leaders who care. For too long, elected officialslike Marsha Blackburn have done absolutely nothing to make Tennesseans’ livesbetter. The only interests they’ve cared about are special interests. The onlypeople they’ve championed are their donors. Gloria will advocate for realsolutions to protect our communities from gun violence, make health care moreaffordable and accessible for all of us, secure access to the ballot box, anddefend reproductive rights. There’s a movement afoot for change — join us.[https://www.votegloriajohnson.com/] DONATE TODAY[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?amount=25&refcode;=email_footer]DONATE MONTHLY[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?recurring=true&refcode;=email_footer]Follow along: Text GLORIA to 23299 FACEBOOK[https://www.facebook.com/VoteGloriaJohnson/] TWITTER[https://twitter.com/VoteGloriaJ] INSTAGRAM[https://www.instagram.com/votegloriaj/] Paid for by Gloria for TennesseeContributions or gifts to Gloria for Tennessee are not tax deductible. subject: Our rights are on the line
body: | ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/X45e0a77d-b3d0-4896-b6c7-fc1b02fe5cac/368d17ff-e836-4168-8049-c5f0900fbbf9) | | | ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/45e0a77d-b3d0-4896-b6c7-fc1b02fe5cac/a638be21-8513-42b1-9bfc-5f974022c80e.png) --- | | | | |  --- | _You're getting this message because you’ve supported good causes andDemocratic candidates. We need your support to continue fighting for ourdemocracy. We love having you in our network, but if you no longer wish tohear from us, you canunsubscribe here._ --- |![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXee9a8LgyWC0Dlkepz22x5X1ZlZp04FzVUs78WBOq3_LCKjcfXTnl27eF-649TgZnrgM-fTLs332ieix9S3gAzQkbpRriOFrAbenVcNhCEXNlg3dh665-ZJCrghiIr5GUXMmAEzUKMMjlaKn-t80bRpWT9U?key=Ftx-XL7zklmX6mYbDHFUqA) Peter, media tracking groups have found that Donald Trumpand his MAGA allies have spent more than $21 million to run ads that disparagethe LGBTQ community. It’s clear that the GOP wants to stoke fear about LGBTQ+Americans in hopes these anti-gay, anti-trans messages will win out withvoters and implement a red wave on November 5. But we have to push backagainst their dangerous, baseless narratives. Will you chip in $5 or moretoday to Blue Amp Action so we can support Democratic candidates who willprotect LGBTQ+ rights and make sure that MAGA Republicans can’t use theirpower to harm marginalized groups? --- | | DONATE --- | **Republicans are going mask off about** their desire to see protectionsfor LGBTQ+ people stripped away. Project 2025 – which will no doubt serve asthe blueprint for a Trump presidency – calls for eliminating sexualorientation and gender identity as protected classes which leaves LGBTQ+people without a legal safeguard from discrimination. We can’t let far-righthardliners win on Tuesday and implement their dangerous Project 2025 agenda –but we’re running out of time to guarantee Democrats will win big and keepLGBTQ+ rights SAFE. So please, Peter, can we count on you to make a gift toBlue Amp Action today so we can invest in Democrats before it’s too late? --- | --- | | | | | | DONATE --- | Thank you. \- Blue Amp Action --- | --- | | |  --- | --- | | |  --- | | | | |  --- | | | ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/45e0a77d-b3d0-4896-b6c7-fc1b02fe5cac/bdd7c5f5-7de1-4347-b64e-b4284329efec.png) | Cliff Schecter President, Blue Amp Action Amplify Good  ---|--- | | |  --- | | Follow Us | ![](https://blueampstrategies.salsalabs.org/public/images/icons/medium-auto_twitter2.png) | ![](https://blueampstrategies.salsalabs.org/public/images/icons/medium-auto_linkedin.png) ---|---  | **Blue Amp Action PAC** PO Box 8384, Cincinnati, OH 45208 --- | Having trouble viewing this email? View it in your web browser --- | | |  --- | | | About BlueAmp Action: We cannot sugarcoat the current situation. Right-wing authoritarianism, defeated by a worldwide coalition during WWII, was only in hibernation. Over the past decade it has infected democratic societies--including ours. It is as simple as it is terrifying: What we do now will define the future of our country and world. We at Blue Amp Action are dedicated to liberal, open societies, where reason and science are applied to solve our problems; where civil rights--including voting rights!--are protected for all. We fight for these values every day. Speaking up on our platforms, raising the voices and the political prospects of liberal pols and pundits. **And savvy grassroots activists like you know, just like we do, that we can’t stop watching the people we help elect:_ after the elections, we have to keep organizing support for the policies we like and pushing back against the ones we don’t._** **__When the public tunes out between elections and the only people our elected officials hear from are the paid lobbyists of wealthy corporations, our government stops being accountable to the needs of ordinary families.__** **Democracy never sleeps, and neither can we.** So we ask that you support our work, so we can continue to engage in this fight every moment of every day. So our kids grow up in democracy, not dystopia. Thank you for your support for all we do! Please follow Cliff Schecter on Twitter @cliffschecter, or subscribe to The Takedown with Cliff Schecter on YouTube, to keep up to date with this battle for the heart and soul of our country. — _You're getting this message because you’ve supported good causes and Democratic candidates. We need your support to continue fighting for our democracy. We love having you in our network, but if you no longer wish to hear from us, you canunsubscribe here._ --- | Paid for by Blue Amp Action PAC --- | | Unsubscribe or Manage Your Preferences ---

name: Christina (personal)
subject: We’re almost there
body: Peter, I want to take a moment to express my deepest gratitude – because ofyour amazing support, we hit our end-of-month goal! We couldn’t have done thiswithout you, and I’m so grateful for everything you’ve done to get us in thebest position to beat Mariannette Miller-Meeks on November 5. But with justfour days left until Election Day, the stakes couldn’t be higher. That’s whymy team has set a final GOTV (Get Out the Vote) goal of $75,000 – to ensure wehave the resources to reach every voter we need until the polls close. Everydollar raised in these final days is crucial. We know this race will likelycome down to a handful of votes – remember, Mariannette Miller-Meeks won byjust SIX VOTES in the last presidential election. Together, we can take backthis seat. Can I continue to count on you in these final days? name: Josh Hawley
subject: I didn’t expect this to happen
body: Peter, I didn’t expect this to happen. I thought we’d meet our finalfundraising goal, but I just got off the phone with my Finance Director, whotold me we’re$4k short of where we need to be. The good news is that we stillhave a few hours before we report our numbers, so we still have time to makeup the difference. It’s only $4,000 in an election when millions of dollarsare spent, but every dollar counts in a race like this one. RUSH SUPPORTThank you, Josh Hawley Paid for by Josh Hawley Victory Committee Click here tounsubscribe. Privacy Policy

body: |                                                                 | If you want to help The Collective PAC build Black political power up and down the ballot, and across the country, then you’re in the right place. That's why The CollectivePAC is working around the clock to provide voters a **_FREE_** ride to thepolls come Election Day, to make sure we don't leave a single voter behindthis November.  **Can you rush a $20 donation or chip in whatever you can to help us make sure we have what it takes to boost turnout, get voters to the polls on Election Day, and send Kamala Harris back to the White House?** | If you've stored your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will be processed immediately.  --- | DONATE $10 NOW » --- | DONATE $25 NOW » --- | DONATE $50 NOW » --- | DONATE $100 NOW » --- | DONATE $250 NOW » --- | OTHER » ---  — The Collective PAC* * *  ![](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/670/260/original/TCP_NBI_Stacked_Logo.png)The Collective PAC is strategically focused on creating a truly equitabledemocracy where our nation’s local, state and federal governments have diverseand talented elected leadership and Black people are fully represented inpositions of power to create the policies necessary to progress ourcommunities forward.
