name: Kevin Lincoln
subject: Worried you’re sleeping on this
body: Kevin Lincoln for Congress Our borders won’t be secured, inflation won’t godown, communities won’t get safer, and government overreach won’t be reeledin. I’m worried you’re sleeping on this, fellow American. Democrats have beenleading in the Generic Congressional Ballot for three months now, meaning moreAmericans would rather send a Democrat to represent them in Congress than aRepublican. We can take back the White House and the Senate, but if we losethe House – which we only hold by a handful of seats –we can’t get anythingdone. Our borders won’t be secured, inflation won’t go down, communities won’tget safer, and government overreach won’t be reeled in. That’s why yoursupport for Republican victories in target battleground seats is so critical.We can’t miss out on real chances to flip vulnerable Democrat-held seats likethis one in CA-9. SEND A MARINE TO CONGRESS ➞ I’m fighting tooth and naildown the home stretch, and I need your help to close the deal. As a MarineCorps veteran, former pastor, and current Mayor, I’m ready to bring serviceand leadership to Congress to get our country back on track. But I need yourhelp. Don’t sleep on this. Flip this seat, protect our Republican HouseMajority, and secure the future of our country by chipping in to support mycampaign today. For America, Kevin Lincoln Veteran, USMC SEND A MARINE TOCONGRESS ➞ Meet Kevin Lincoln My name is Kevin Lincoln, and my story, is theValley’s story. I am a 3rd generation Stocktonian, raising a 4th generation inthe city I love. I’m the grandson of Mexican immigrants, and my stepfather isan Army veteran. Like many Stocktonians, my family has overcome economicsetbacks. My own father struggled to survive on these streets, and was at onetime, homeless. But I never let adversity define me. I joined the Marines andserved in the White House Military Office, assigned to Marine One. I graduatedcollege while working full-time and raising a family. I’ve worked in corporateAmerica and served our community as a pastor, and as a non-profit leader. I’mblessed with a beautiful wife, Bonnie, and two amazing children. I’ve lived alife of service, but the greatest honor of my life has been giving back to mycommunity, through serving as Mayor of my hometown, Stockton. SEND A MARINE TOCONGRESS ➞ Like, Follow, and Subscribe! Kevin Lincoln is a former member ofthe U.S. Marine Corps. Use of his military rank, job titles, and photographsin uniform does not imply endorsement by the Marine Corps or the Department ofDefense. PAID FOR BY KEVIN LINCOLN FOR CONGRESS We'd hate to see you go but ifyou'd like to unsubscribe, click here.

name: Bernie Moreno
subject: “Garbage is an understatement”
body: Bernie Moreno for US Senate It’s time to put an end to their hateful anddestructive hold on our nation. Fellow patriot, Biden thinks you’re “garbage”– but Sherrod Brown and his supporters think you’re worse... This is one ofthe biggest elitist bankrollers of Sherrod Brown, Kamala Harris, and the DNC.This is who Sherrod is beholden to and who he has to comply with in order tocontinue having his campaign war chest padded. Brown, Harris, and the radicalleft have shown us their true colors. They think those of us who disagree withthem –half the country – are deplorable, Nazi garbage... and worse! It’s timeto put an end to their hateful and destructive hold on our nation. We need tofight fiercer than ever until this is over. Can you chip in another $10 todayto keep our campaign cruising on the path to victory? For American Greatness!Bernie Moreno GOP Nominee for Senate, Ohio Meet Bernie Moreno: Bernie Morenofights for the American Dream because he’s lived it. Bernie was born inBogota, Colombia. At age five, his American Dream began when he moved to theUnited States with his family. Bernie became an American citizen at age 18.Through his relentless work ethic and untamable entrepreneurial spirit, heturned the first car dealership that he purchased in 2005 into one of thelargest dealership groups in America. In 2016, Bernie recognized the value andtransformational potential of blockchain technology, before it receivedmainstream attention, and moved much of his volunteer time and investmentdollars into the space. In 2018 he co-founded ChampTitles, which grew to bequite successful as Bernie served as Chairman of the Board. After a long,successful career, Bernie sold most of his business to begin focusing on hiscalling: protecting the American dream for another generation. Solving ourcountry’s problems requires common sense. In Washington, Bernie will fight toshrink government, protect our freedoms, stop the Chinese Communist party fromtaking our data and land, and always put America First. Ohioans are done withpoliticians who talk a big game and do nothing. Bernie wants to go to D.C. toget work done – just like he always has. Join Bernie ➞ FOLLOW BERNIE ONSOCIAL MEDIA Paid for by Bernie Moreno for Senate Don't want to receive anymore of our emails? We hate to see you go: unsubscribe .

name: James Carville
subject: F*@%ING TERRIFIED
body: Peter, I am FUMING— I need Democrats to WAKE UP and take a look at what’shappening in Montana!! Mitch McConnell has handpicked a candidate to runagainst Jon Tester. Tim Sheehy is nothing but a wannabe cowboy who lies almostas much as he breathes. He’s a snake and we can’t trust him. Jon Tester is athird-generation dirt farmer with a proven track record of winning toughfights and trust me, he’ll do anything to deliver results for the folks backhome. But here’s what’s got me F*@%ING TERRIFIED: McConnell is slinging mud tothe tune of $90 MILLION. His slimy attacks against Jon are working and now thepolls are tightening. This race is wayyyyy too close for comfort! The Senatemajority will come down to Montana, so I need you to GET OFF YOUR YOU-KNOW-WHAT and help keep Jon Tester in the Senate. Jon told me that a generous groupof donors stepped up to match all grassroots contributions and help him closethe gap, but he’s STILL falling behind. WTF? He NEEDS a surge in grassrootsdonations RIGHT NOW to keep up with Mitch McConnell and his lame opponent. I’mcalling on 28 more folks in 18326: Peter, will you URGENTLY rush in $10 todouble your impact, help Jon Tester defy the odds, and win the most importantrace on the map? Split a donation before midnight >> If you've saved yourpayment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go throughimmediately: RUSH IN $25 RUSH IN $50 RUSH IN $100 RUSH IN $250 RUSH IN$500 OTHER AMOUNT Why are you still reading this? committee: Jocelyn Benson for Secretary of State
name: Jocelyn Benson
subject: Checking in on your plan
body: Friend, I can count the days left on one hand! I’ve been driving around thestate, checking in on operations county by county. Tuesday’s somewhat of aSuper Bowl for secretaries of state like me. I couldn’t be more excited to seeMichiganders make their voices heard. This will be the smoothest, safest, andmost secure election in Michigan history. Free and Fair Elections:Improvements Under Sec. Jocelyn Benson 🖥️ Modernized Voter Registration:Implemented online and automatic voter registration, plus same-dayregistration on Election Day. 👥 Recruited 30,000 New Election Workers: A newgeneration of poll workers is ready to assist you at the polls. 📮 InstalledSecure Drop Boxes: Over 1,000 secure drop boxes are available statewide forconvenient and safe ballot returns. 🏠 Enabled Voting from Home: Every voterhas the right to vote by absentee ballot, making it easy to vote from thecomfort of your home. ✉️ Mailed Absentee Ballot Applications: We sent absenteeballot applications to all registered voters to remind them of voting options.🌐 Launched Online Absentee Applications: You can easily download and submitabsentee ballot applications online. 📣 Engaged Underrepresented Voters: We'velaunched programs to increase voter participation in areas with historicallylow turnout. 🔍 Conducted Comprehensive Election Audits: We've workeddiligently to affirm the integrity and accuracy of our elections. I’m so proudof all we’ve accomplished together since my election in 2018. But this comingTuesday isn’t about me or the Secretary of State’s office. It’s about you!Now, I want you to take a moment to think about your vote in this election.Already voted? Think of three friends or family members. Send them a quicktext and ask, “Have you voted already? If not, do you have a plan to vote?”You can always refer them to Michigan.gov/Vote if they need help. Haven’tvoted yet? Take just two minutes to write down your plan. When are you voting?Do you know how you’re getting there? And, do you know where to go?Learn moreat IWillVote.com Your voice matters, and your participation is what makes ourdemocracy strong. Together, we can ensure that every vote is counted and everyvoice is heard. Democracy is a beautiful thing—thank you for being a part ofit. All my best, Jocelyn Benson Michigan Secretary of State Paid for byJocelyn Benson for Secretary of State Mailing Address: PO BOX 21368, Detroit,MI 48221. If you believe you received this message in error or wish to nolonger receive email from us, please unsubscribe:https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/fqSK2PQg_UCkKErG0V0_Ew2?unsubscribedata=IDPTAOALl4Bs30UB4QpbVllJ6P4WNpUONaTFn9tWvPuDjV%2BBbakwxZx8m4%2FCvWTsEEaBl%2FCVVeTJ1r9QCKS81PxZcPt8GNILH913p2bc3Zlnp1CvGh0Z6R9H16bmfUhYlHF9cnhusCbkItXhGq9lDMUrjXRBwmDqW1pFA7hRN4qumYHouLva7zECPWArloFkvl7gtM7yYpIc7%2FaKNsMdPenkBbF%2Be3kbSvOKCczRjl7gYooT90rOrmBOJe1%2BVAV2CVMFZlf0%2FGY5dQg6nWPWRyxR6UrP4J41GpnNlP3iwt%2BbuMTjhe47yhHvoEHA0fWsr5i%2Fv%2FqmDbkNxEpB98PzbNnq0wIDYwIIP76fYP%2B%2B5kA9gd4hPEDxqyUQxIsMA02n9zT3Jtp%2BR5MOHf8jhk39Lixmwb1ZdA7B27XDc4CtWPU%3D.

name: Sen. Jacky Rosen

body: We're losing crucial ground in Nevada at the worst possible moment, friend: Arecent poll now shows me TIED with my MAGA opponent. Election Day is nearly here, and we're running out of timeto secure the lead in this must-win race. If we don't close this fundraisinggap in time, I'm worried we'll lose here in Nevada – and lose our Senatemajority. View it in your web browser --- | | |  --- | | | About BlueAmp Action: We cannot sugarcoat the current situation. Right-wing authoritarianism, defeated by a worldwide coalition during WWII, was only in hibernation. Over the past decade it has infected democratic societies--including ours. It is as simple as it is terrifying: What we do now will define the future of our country and world. We at Blue Amp Action are dedicated to liberal, open societies, where reason and science are applied to solve our problems; where civil rights--including voting rights!--are protected for all. We fight for these values every day. Speaking up on our platforms, raising the voices and the political prospects of liberal pols and pundits. **And savvy grassroots activists like you know, just like we do, that we can’t stop watching the people we help elect:_ after the elections, we have to keep organizing support for the policies we like and pushing back against the ones we don’t._** **__When the public tunes out between elections and the only people our elected officials hear from are the paid lobbyists of wealthy corporations, our government stops being accountable to the needs of ordinary families.__** **Democracy never sleeps, and neither can we.** So we ask that you support our work, so we can continue to engage in this fight every moment of every day. So our kids grow up in democracy, not dystopia. Thank you for your support for all we do! Please follow Cliff Schecter on Twitter @cliffschecter, or subscribe to The Takedown with Cliff Schecter on YouTube, to keep up to date with this battle for the heart and soul of our country. — _You're getting this message because you’ve supported good causes and Democratic candidates. body: [https://prod.cdn.everyaction.com/images/van/NGP/NGP31/1/93809/images/coordcampaign.png]Dear Peter- we're SO CLOSE! The finish line of this election is just aroundthe corner, and now is NOT the time to let up! Just take it from ourCoordinated team. Last week they: * Knocked 10,000 doors * Made 100,000 phonecalls * And in the month of October they sent over 2 MILLION TEXTS! Ourincredible staff and volunteers are doing everything they can up until themoment the last polls close- and they need your help to finish strong. Thereare countless volunteer opportunities across Massachusetts as well as out ofstate in the last few days of this election. name: Brown, Sherrod
subject: I can only do this with your support, friend
body: I'm going to keep this brief, friend: We're just four days out from ElectionDay, so now more than ever, I need all hands on deck. I know I've got what ittakes to win on Tuesday, especially with such a strong grassroots movementbehind me. But I need to be honest: We fell short of our end-of-month goalyesterday – and worse, I'm locked in a statistical TIE with my MAGA opponent,Bernie Moreno. Friend: In a race this close, it's going to take an immenseamount of resources to reach every last voter – so we've extended our deadlineto midnight tonight, and I'm counting on you to help me close our budget gapbefore midnight. Here's the thing: If everyone reading this email gives just$5 right now, we can reach our goal, no problem. But I know not everyone will,so I'm counting on you, friend. name: Kamala Harris
subject: I am asking for your support one last time before Election Day:
body: I am asking for your support one last time before Election Day. | | |  --- | ![](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/097/354/original/2023_09_Email-Wrapper-Graphic_B_v2.png) |  ---|---  ![Kamala Harris](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/115/006/original/Kamala_Harris_Photo_20241101.jpg) Friend, we’ve gone through so much together these past few months. So I wanted to take a few minutes to tell you about my decision to run for president – and why your support for the DLCC and my campaign is so important to our success on Election Day in four days. Before I continue, if you’re short on time, will you split a donation between the DLCC and my campaign at my personal link below? https://dlcc.org/dlcc-hfp **The truth is: I am no stranger to unlikely journeys.** Where I grew up in the Bay, you either live in the hills or the flatlands. We lived in the flats. It was a working-class neighborhood of firefighters, nurses, and construction workers. I grew up immersed in the ideals of the civil rights movement, and at a young age I decided I wanted to be a lawyer. I wanted to protect people because I believe everyone has a right to safety, dignity, and justice. Today, my decision to run for president has everything to do with this opportunity to move past the bitterness, cynicism, and divisive battles of the past. We have the chance to chart a new way forward – not as members of any one party or faction, but as Americans. I want you to know that I will be a president who unites us around our highest aspirations. A president who leads and listens, who is realistic, practical, and has common sense. A president who always fights for the American people. I cannot do it alone. No one person could. It takes a team. It takes millions and millions of people coming together at once to shape the outcome of this election and elect Democrats up and down the ballot. If we are going to win this election and elect Democrats in swing districts across our country, I need you to step up and join this team. Millions of Americans have already voted, and millions more will vote on Election Day. And we need to do everything we can – and I mean everything – to reach every last voter to win the White House and elect Democrats to state legislatures across the country. **So, with time running out to make an impact before Election Day, I am asking for your support one last time:** Will you help us get out the vote over these final days by splitting $10, or whatever you can afford, between the DLCC and my campaign before our midnight deadline? Every dollar will help us reach more voters and elect Democrats in key swing districts before the polls close on Election Day. | If you've stored your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will process immediately and be split between DLCC PAC and the Harris-Walz campaign.  --- | $10 » --- | $25 » --- | $50 » --- | $100 » --- | $250 » --- | Other » ---  From the bottom of my heart: Thank you for everything. I am so proud to be onthis team with you.For The People,KamalaKamala Harris Vice President of the United States   **DONATE »**               | --- Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee 1225 Eye Street NW Suite 1250, Washington, DC 20005 Paid for by DLCC PAC. Dlcc.org. Not authorized by any candidate or candidate'scommittee.  Contributions or gifts to DLCC PAC are not tax deductible. | The Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee and DLCC PAC are dedicated to winning and defending Democratic majorities in state legislatures across the country. This message was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com because you are a part of our grassroots network.  Emails are a crucial way to stay in touch with our supporters. Please add usto your address book or safe senders list to ensure timely election updates.  We're fighting to elect Democrats and advance a progressive vision in thestates. Our success depends on grassroots donors like you. Ninety-eightpercent of our donors give less than $200, and two-thirds give less than $20.To make a contribution, please click here. To unsubscribe and stop receivingemails about our efforts, please click here. ---  | | Sent via ActionNetwork.org. name: Adam Frisch
subject: Fox News attacked my family
body: [http://adamforcolorado.com]http://adamforcolorado.com[http://adamforcolorado.com] Hello, The day before the anniversary of theSupreme Court’s disastrous Dobbs decision, I woke up to Fox News and LaurenBoebert attacking my sister and my 81-year-old father. For decades, Dad was anOB-GYN. He delivered thousands of babies and wrote books on how to getpregnant and to navigate menopause. Dad provided women with full access to allkinds of reproductive health care, including abortions, in the years rightafter Roe – and he has now had to watch as women’s reproductive rights aregutted in the aftermath of Dobbs . Dad and his clinic faced many threats overthe years. It’s no exaggeration to say that he put his own safety – and thatof his family – at risk in order to protect the rights of women to make theirown medical decisions. But I’m not sure he ever expected to see a sittingmember of Congress attacking him – or my sister who followed in his footsteps– in a national news outlet. It’s disgusting. These kinds of personal attacksagainst my family have no place in our politics and do nothing to serve thepeople of Western and Southern Colorado. If extremists like Lauren Boebert andmy new Republican opponent want to have a conversation about reproductiverights in this country, I am more than happy to have that debate. We can talkabout how I support freedom and liberty – and how they support big governmentintruding into the lives of women. We can talk about how they support anational ban on abortion – with no exceptions for rape, incest, or the life ofthe mother. And we can talk about how they are so extreme, they even want toban the pill that’s been used by women for decades. I am willing to talk allday about the fringe view that the government should be dictating women’smedical decisions. But what I won’t accept is extremists like Lauren Boebertand Fox News attacking my father and my sister. I am incredibly proud of myfather. He provided health care to women when they needed it during some ofthe happiest – and most devastating – moments of their lives. Beforeretirement, he would drive two hours to Planned Parenthood and help teach thenext generation of health care providers, like my sister. And no one – not FoxNews, and especially not extremists like Lauren Boebert or my new Republicanopponent – is going to stop my family from continuing to stand up for awoman’s right to choose. We already scared off Lauren Boebert. In 2022, I camejust 546 votes shy of winning this House seat. I’m ready to finish the job andreplace Boebert in Congress, but these are the kinds of ugly attacks that I’mup against. Please, if you can afford to, will you give $5 or more right nowto my campaign to help me win this critical House seat? Our race was theclosest in the entire country in 2022. But I’m not taking money from corporatePACs, so I’m counting on grassroots donors like you if I’m going to win.[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email?refcode=em20241101am2-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=4b3a77f9-6198-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]Please use the links in this email to start a monthly donation throughActBlue: DONATE $10[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email?refcode=em20241101am2-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&amount;=10&refcode2;=4b3a77f9-6198-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $25[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email?refcode=em20241101am2-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&amount;=25&refcode2;=4b3a77f9-6198-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $35[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email?refcode=em20241101am2-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&amount;=35&refcode2;=4b3a77f9-6198-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $50[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email?refcode=em20241101am2-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&amount;=50&refcode2;=4b3a77f9-6198-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $100[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email?refcode=em20241101am2-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&amount;=100&refcode2;=4b3a77f9-6198-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]Other Amount[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email?refcode=em20241101am2-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=4b3a77f9-6198-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]I knew this campaign was going to get nasty, but I never expected the otherside to go after my family. name: Ken Mitchell for Virginia
subject: T-Minus 4️⃣ Days
body: logo Four days. Four days are all that stand between us and victory for thesixth congressional district. After months of hard work, thousands of milestraveled, and hundreds of events we can see the finish line. But we cannotgive up yet – we have so much more ground to cover as things really heatup—and we need your support to make it happen!(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ken-mitchell-for-va-1?refcode=14days) Weneed to raise another $10,000 between now and Election Day. We have theopportunity to bolster our TV advertising during prime NFL and ACC footballgames. More than 50% of our congressional district still has not voted. Weneed to do everything to make sure voters know they have a better choice. Weare running a true grassroots campaign all thanks to your generosity, time,and dedication. We wouldn’t be where we are at without your help. Together, weare fighting for a better future for our community and nation. To ensure thatour message reaches every corner of our congressional district, we’ve launchedour billboard campaign, are releasing TV ads, and have been running radio adsleft and right. Our opponent doesn’t have what it takes to represent thepeople of the sixth congressional district. He is a proud Trump MAGA loyalist.My focus is revitalizing the economy, creating jobs, and ensuring fair wagesand protecting workers. I support women’s right to choose, workers and theirright to collectively bargain, increased funding for public schools, expandedand optimized broadband, equitable access to technology, and respect forpersonal privacy and healthcare choices. I am committed to transitioning torenewable energy, tackling climate change, and advocating for a diplomaticresolution to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict. My platform offers practicalsolutions and progressive leadership for a brighter future in Virginia’s vast,beautiful sixth congressional district. Do you know what my opponent brings tothe table? ❌ Voted against the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act ❌ Votedagainst the Infant Formula Supplemental Appropriations Act ❌ Voted against theAmerican Rescue Plan ❌ Voted against the Affordable Insulin Now Act ❌ Votedagainst the PAWS Act ❌ Voted against the Ending Forced Arbitration of SexualAssault and Sexual Harassment Act ❌ Voted against the Pregnant WorkersFairness Act ❌ Voted against the Protecting Older Workers from DiscriminationAct ❌ Voted against the Lower Drug Costs Now Act ❌ Voted against the EqualityAct As you can imagine, the list goes on and doesn’t get any better. Myopponent proudly stands with a convicted felon, Marjorie Taylor Greene, MattGaetz, and Speaker Mike Johnson. The sixth congressional district deserves somuch better. Donate Now! (https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ken-mitchell-for-va-1?refcode=14days) So, to make it to the finish line, we need your help.Every dollar counts, and with your generous support, we can make sure that ourcampaign is visible and impactful. Click the link below to contribute and be apart of this vital effort: CLICK HERE TO DONATE NOW!(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ken-mitchell-for-va-1?refcode=14days)https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ken-mitchell-for-va-1?refcode=14days Thankyou for your continued support towards our shared vision for the future.Together, we can make sure our message is seen, heard, and acted upon! Can youdonate $50, $100, or $250 dollars to help us defeat Ben Cline and reach morevoters? (https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ken-mitchell-for-va-1?refcode=14days) We should be in this fight together. Not pandering toparty loyalists and being bought by large corporations. If we don’t get backto pragmatic problem solving, mutual respect, and putting country beforeparty, our democracy will not survive. We can do better. Join me in defeatingBen Cline and bringing real representation to the sixth congressionaldistrict. —Ken Mitchell, Democratic Candidate for Virginia’s 6th CongressionalDistrict Donate Now! (https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ken-mitchell-for-va-1?refcode=14days) Authorized and Paid for by Ken Mitchell for Virginia POBox 1795 Harrisonburg, VA 22803 Facebook(https://www.facebook.com/kenmitchellforva/) This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com (mailto:dpwillis67@gmail.com) why did I get this?(https://kenmitchellforvirginia.us17.list-manage.com/about?u=435990a56c5fdf5272fa9ea86&id;=548b15aa7d&e;=0fced71d8c&c;=5385752ac3)unsubscribe from this list (https://kenmitchellforvirginia.us17.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=435990a56c5fdf5272fa9ea86&id;=548b15aa7d&t;=b&e;=0fced71d8c&c;=5385752ac3)update subscription preferences (https://kenmitchellforvirginia.us17.list-manage.com/profile?u=435990a56c5fdf5272fa9ea86&id;=548b15aa7d&e;=0fced71d8c&c;=5385752ac3)Ken Mitchell for Virginia . 850 W Market Street . It may not seem like much, but we calculated our $80,000 goalaround exactly what we need to succeed come November 5th, and we missed themark. We need to turn it around ASAP. If you can, consider chipping in here:secure.actblue.com/donate/bfm-em-fr-oct24[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bfm-em-fr-oct24?amount=] Falling behindthis close to Election Day is going to have major consequences at the polls,Peter. But, we do have some good news: We did the math, and we can still comeback from this if we raise an emergency $4,000 today to make up for the lostground. If you’re in a place to give in this critical moment for our Montanamovement, please consider chipping in $ or whatever you can today.secure.actblue.com/donate/bfm-em-fr-oct24[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bfm-em-fr-oct24?amount=] Our future, ourrights, and our home depend on us. RyanBusse https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61550979818697[https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61550979818697]https://www.instagram.com/ryandbusse/ [https://www.instagram.com/ryandbusse/]https://twitter.com/ryandbusse?s=20 [https://twitter.com/ryandbusse?s=20]https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bfm-em-footer-2023[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bfm-em-footer-2023] For more than 25 years,Ryan was a successful gun industry executive. Ryan chose RaphGraybill as his running mate because no Montanan has done more to protectconstitutional rights and freedoms from Greg Gianforte. Since Gianforte becamegovernor, Raph has blocked more than a dozen different unconstitutional lawsthat invaded Montanans’ constitutional rights. name: Team Baldwin
subject: Four quarters
body: [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/67?t=1001&akid;=4425%2E35263%2EFGsMu0 ]TAMMY BALDWIN FOR SENATE Today, we’re asking you to chip in $1, Peter. You might be asking yourself, “what can four quarters possibly do?” Well, here’s what your $1 can do: $1 can protect abortion rights, Social Security, and affordable health care from being dismantled by Tammy’s right-wing opponent. $1 can help defend our razor-thin Democratic majority in the Senate from Republicans and their extremist agenda. $1 can help our campaign fight back against the $100 million worth of ads Republicans and right-wing super PACs have poured into Wisconsin — turning this into the most expensive Senate race in our state’s history. We get it — $1 may not seem like it could make a difference, especially up against Republican dark money donors and a self-funding megamillionaire who has poured $20 million of his personal fortune toward flipping this seat red. But this close to Election Day in the most competitive Senate race in the country, every single dollar makes a real difference — especially when tens of thousands of supporters step up to support Tammy’s reelection campaign. name: California Dems
subject: Losing ground in Katie Porter’s seat
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-footer?refcode=header&amount;=5 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-footer?refcode=header&amount;=5] Ugh! New polling shows that Democrats have lost our lead in CA-47 and are now trailing within the margin of error . This was Katie Porter’s congressional seat, and we need to ensure we retain it if Democrats want a chance to regain control of the House of Representatives next Tuesday. With only days before Election Day, every second counts, and it’s going to be expensive to deploy more resources ASAP in this must-win seat. Sorry for being so blunt, but we could really use a donation of $ or more right now. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?refcode=&amount;=] CHIP IN $ >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?&refcode;=&amount;=] CHIP IN $ >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?&refcode;=&amount;=] CHIP IN $ >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?&refcode;=&amount;=] CHIP IN $ >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?&refcode;=&amount;=] CHIP IN $ >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?&refcode;=&amount;=]Aren’t sure whether this is a district worth investing in? Take a look at this polling trajectory: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?refcode=&amount= [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?refcode=&amount=]Katie Porter narrowly won this crucial swing seat in 2022, but recent polling indicates that Democrats are trailing by three points. Here’s the truth: We can still win this seat. 17% of all voters are undecided, and the polling is WELL within the margin of error. However, achieving this will require a surge of resources that we hadn’t planned for. And Democrats winning the U.S. House is going to require picking up seats in California. We can’t afford to lose a single blue seat . That all adds up to one thing. We need your help. We know so many of our supporters are getting *LOTS* of emails, and many have been generous already this election. But with control of the House Majority hanging in the balance, we can’t not ask. If you’re able, will you pitch in? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?refcode=&amount;=] CHIP IN $ >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?&refcode;=&amount;=]Thank you so much. Together we will do this. - CADEM DONATE » [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-footer?refcode=&amount;=20.24] Our Democratic leaders are working hard to make California a better place to live. From fighting for good-paying jobs, combating climate change, to expanding healthcare access so all Californians can lead safe, healthy, prosperous lives — California’s Democratic leaders turn progressive ideas into meaningful action. name: Dr. Prasanth Reddy
subject: Vote!
body: 96 November is here. Election Day is Tuesday. But you don’t have to waituntil then to vote — early voting continues until Monday at NOON! Find yourpolling location and make your plan to vote. If you’ve already voted, the workisn’t done. Make sure your friends and loved ones vote. And please talk to anyundecided voter you know about why it’s time for a change in Kansas’ 3rdDistrict. Sharice Davids has failed to do her job. She’s put her party’sinterests over your interests. We can hold her accountable at the ballot box,and then we can have new leadership in Congress. Thank you for all thecontinued support, let’s finish strong and flip this seat! Dr. Prasanth Reddyhttps://secure.winred.com/reddy-for-kansas-03/hf-footer-email?utm_source=rc&utm;_medium=email&utm;_campaign=2024nov01hf Meet Dr.Prasanth Reddy: Dr. Reddy is a cancer physician and immigrant who's lived theAmerican Dream. In the aftermath of 9/11, he answered his country's call. Hebecame a citizen, joined the U.S. Air Force Reserve, and still serves as Lt.Colonel today. Dr. Reddy is running for Congress against a Democrat who voteswith Joe Biden 100% of the time, in one of the most competitive Housedistricts in the country. Dr. Reddy is a different kind of candidate. He's anoutsider, a problem solver, and someone who's spent his career taking action.https://secure.winred.com/reddy-for-kansas-03/hf-footer-email?utm_source=rc&utm;_medium=email&utm;_campaign=2024nov01hf Let's flip Kansas' 3rdDistrict and send an independent voice to Congress. name: Jon Favreau
subject: We need to do everything we can to make sure Bob wins
body: Jon Favreau here. If you’re way too online like me, you’ve probably seen a tonof headlines about a bunch of rich guys running for Senate in states wherethey don't even live. Connecticut mega-millionaire David McCormick is one ofthose rich guys, and he’s running against beloved Pennsylvania Senator, BobCasey. So look, this will be a very close race, and we need to do everythingwe can to make sure Bob wins — [ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241101-2?refcode=em20241101-2&refcode2;=4745_552475_IPLfG2&akid;=4745%2E552475%2EIPLfG2]which is why I’m asking if you’ll contribute $5 towards his campaign today.David McCormick is a former Wall Street hedge-fund exec who wants you to thinkhe grew up on a Pennsylvania farm, which is only true if you think that livingin a mansion 10 minutes down the road from a farm where your family raisedArabian horses counts as “growing up on a farm.” But wait, Peter, there'smore: McCormick also thinks the most popular beer in Pennsylvania is called“YANG-ling,” which is like running for Senate in Massachusetts and saying youwant coffee from "DOON-kin’ Donuts." If it wasn’t obvious before, it’s crystalclear now: David McCormick is wrong for Pennsylvania. But this will be one ofthe toughest races of the year for Democrats. McCormick has millions uponmillions of dollars of his own to dump into this race, in addition to thebacking of Donald Trump and billionaire-funded super PACs. Pennsylvania is ascompetitive as it gets, and with the Senate majority and the White Housedepending on it, we can’t take anything for granted. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241101-2?refcode=em20241101-2&refcode2;=4745_552475_IPLfG2&akid;=4745%2E552475%2EIPLfG2]So please, will you chip in whatever you can to Bob’s campaign today? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241101-2?amount=15&refcode;=em20241101-2-el&refcode2;=4745_552475_IPLfG2&akid;=4745%2E552475%2EIPLfG2]Donate $15 » [ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241101-2?amount=25&refcode;=em20241101-2-el&refcode2;=4745_552475_IPLfG2&akid;=4745%2E552475%2EIPLfG2]Donate $25 » [ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241101-2?amount=50&refcode;=em20241101-2-el&refcode2;=4745_552475_IPLfG2&akid;=4745%2E552475%2EIPLfG2]Donate $50 » [ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241101-2?amount=100&refcode;=em20241101-2-el&refcode2;=4745_552475_IPLfG2&akid;=4745%2E552475%2EIPLfG2]Donate $100 » [ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241101-2?amount=250&refcode;=em20241101-2-el&refcode2;=4745_552475_IPLfG2&akid;=4745%2E552475%2EIPLfG2]Donate $250 » [ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241101-2?refcode=em20241101-2&refcode2;=4745_552475_IPLfG2&akid;=4745%2E552475%2EIPLfG2]Other amount » Thanks, Jon [ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241101-2?refcode=em20241101-2&refcode2;=4745_552475_IPLfG2&akid;=4745%2E552475%2EIPLfG2]Jon Favreau Jon Favreau Co-host of Pod Save America Former Speechwriter toPresident Obama To receive texts from Team Casey text TEAM to 51041. name: Andy Kim
subject: Turning energy into action
body: It's finally November, and Election Day is just four days away! It's anexciting time in our campaign, and we're ready to finish this race strong. Butright now, our opponent's millions of dollars are at work distorting the facts– and Bashaw is confident that his attack ads will crush our momentum in thefinal days of the election. We have to keep our campaign going strong to fightback and win in just four days. We're getting people fired up to turn energyinto action and get out and vote. We are in this together to deliver forpeople, families, and communities in every corner of New Jersey. So will youpitch in $3 or whatever you can give to help us fund the final weekend of ourstatewide voter outreach programs. name: Hakeem Jeffries
subject: just checked ActBlue:
body: Peter, I know you’re being bombarded by requests right now. Please let me take a second to explain why your support is so critical at this point: – Democrats are locked in a neck-and-neck battle with extreme MAGA Republicans for control of the House. – My team checked ActBlue and we’re still 12,167 donations short of what it will take to reach the remaining voters we need to win. I KNOW we can bring this win home. The simple truth is our message resonates with voters around the country. We must match extreme MAGA Republicans to ensure they do not drown out our message. This election is too close for us to let that happen, Peter. I know I can rely on supporters like you to step up in moments like this. So I’m urgently asking: Is there any way I can count on your very first and most important donation to help us fill the budget gap? >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jeffries-email-2024?amount=15] $15 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jeffries-email-2024?amount=15] $25 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jeffries-email-2024?amount=25] $50 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jeffries-email-2024?amount=50] $100 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jeffries-email-2024?amount=100] $250 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jeffries-email-2024?amount=250] OTHER [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jeffries-email-2024?amount=25] Peter, this election is going to be close. Our entire shot to reclaim a Democratic House majority rests on whether we can spread our message in time. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jeffries-email-2024?amount=15] So I’m asking: Can you rush $15 to replenish our bank account in time for this final push? name: Team Lizzie
subject: TEXAS: Today is the last day for early voting!
body: ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ELIZABETH PANNILL FLETCHER FOR CONGRESS[https://prod.cdn.everyaction.com/images/van/NGP/NGP10/1/82676/images/lizzie-reelect-logo-outlined.png] Today is the last day to vote early in Texas! Youcan find early voting sites here—please share with people you know need toknow. [https://teamrv-mvp.sos.texas.gov/MVP/mvp.do] https://teamrv-mvp.sos.texas.gov/MVP/mvp.do [https://teamrv-mvp.sos.texas.gov/MVP/mvp.do]There’s never been a better or more important time to help us talk withvoters—many people who haven’t voted are still making up their minds about whoto vote for or whether to vote at all. So, we hope you will join us for ourDay of Action tomorrow, November 2,[https://www.mobilize.us/fletcherforcongress/event/678074/] when we’ll bephone-banking, block-walking, and more to get out the vote for Lizzie, ColinAllred, and Democrats up and down the ballot.[https://www.mobilize.us/fletcherforcongress/event/678074/]https://www.mobilize.us/fletcherforcongress/event/678074/[https://www.mobilize.us/fletcherforcongress/event/678074/] (Can’t make ittomorrow? We have more block walks and phone banks planned on Sunday, Monday,and Election Day! [https://www.mobilize.us/fletcherforcongress/event/678074/]) More than 3 million Texans have voted, but that’s only a fraction of theregistered voters in our state! We know we have work to do to get voters outto the polls in #TX07 and across Harris and Fort Bend Counties. These countiesare critical in our efforts to re-elect Lizzie and send Ted Cruz back toCancun. We know you know the stakes in this election. Everyone needs to make aplan to vote—vote early and get others to do the same! We need as manyvolunteers as possible to help us knock on doors and mobilize voters. So, wehope to see you out there! name: Keith Ellison
subject: We're running out of time
body: Peter, Did you see the latest MinnPost-Embold Research poll, Peter? DonaldTrump is chipping away at Vice President Kamala Harris’s narrow lead inMinnesota, giving Republicans a chance to win the state for the first timesince 1972. With early voting already underway and just four days left untilElection Day, we’re running out of time to fight back against the lies andmisinformation that Trump and his MAGA Republican allies are spreading viaincessant attack ads. While we know our grassroots movement can cut throughthe noise, we need everyone to pitch in and help keep Minnesota blue. Withoutsupport from people like you, my team and I wouldn’t be able to Get Out theVote. That’s why I’m reaching out to you today. Our team has a plan to expandoutreach to Minnesotans—particularly undecided voters and people in hard-to-reach communities that other campaigns overlook—but we need to raise anadditional $10,000 to put it in action. Our records show that you’re stilleligible for Minnesota’s Political Contribution Refund (PCR) program, whichallows Minnesotans to make a $75 donation (or $150 for couples) and receive afull refund from the state of Minnesota. There’s no time to waste, Peter. Willyou contribute $10, $25, $50, or whatever you can afford right now to helpboost Democratic turnout in Minnesota? If you've saved your paymentinformation with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately:CHIP IN $10 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/em241101ke?express_lane=true&amount;=10&refcode;=express_lane_10]CHIP IN $25 NOW[http://secure.actblue.com/donate/em241101ke?express_lane=true&amount;=25&refcode;=express_lane_25]CHIP IN $75 NOW[http://secure.actblue.com/donate/em241101ke?express_lane=true&amount;=75&refcode;=express_lane_75]CHIP IN $150 NOW[http://secure.actblue.com/donate/em241101ke?express_lane=true&amount;=150&refcode;=express_lane_150]CHIP IN $250 NOW[http://secure.actblue.com/donate/em241101ke?express_lane=true&amount;=250&refcode;=express_lane_250]OTHER AMOUNT [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/em241101ke?refcode=other]Thank you, Keith Ellison Minnesota’s Political Contribution Refund (PCR)program reset and increased on January 1! You can now use your 2023 PCR tocontribute up to $75 (or $150 for couples) and receive a full refund from theState of Minnesota. Please take advantage of your PCR and make a REFUNDABLE$75 DONATION so Keith can continue fighting to help people afford their livesand live with safety, dignity, and respect. subject: How Senate polls have changed over time >>
body: Peter, Polls show that our swing state Senate women are losing their leads:WISCONSIN May 2024: Baldwin +12 Tammy Baldwin: 54% Eric Hovde: 42% [QuinnipiacUniversity, 5/06/24] September 2024: Baldwin +4 Tammy Baldwin: 51% Eric Hovde:47% [Quinnipiac University, 9/16/24] October 2024: Baldwin +1 Tammy Baldwin:49% Eric Hovde: 48% [Quinnipiac University, 10/21/24] NEVADA May 2024: Rosen+14 Jacky Rosen: 47% Sam Brown: 33% [The Tyson Group, 5/25/24] September 2024:Rosen +7 Jacky Rosen: 48% Sam Brown: 41% [Emerson College, 9/18/24] October2024: EVEN Jacky Rosen: 48% Sam Brown: 48% [On Message, 10/22/24] MICHIGANJune 2024: Slotkin +5 Elissa Slotkin: 43% Mike Rogers: 39% [Emerson College,6/18/24] September 2024: Slotkin +2 Elissa Slotkin: 45% Mike Rogers: 43%[Suffolk University, 9/18/24] October 2024: EVEN Elissa Slotkin: 48% MikeRogers: 48% [InsiderAdvantage, 10/27/24] If Tammy, Jacky, and Elissa can'tfinish strong, Democrats will lose control of the U.S. Senate. name: Sherrod Brown
subject: will you help me get my final ad on the air?
body: Hi Peter, Sherrod here with some big news: After a new Morning Consult pollshowed me trailing my MAGA opponent by a point, my team and I sat down anddecided to launch one more final ad before Election Day. So, if you've beenwaiting to give $25 to split between this grassroots campaign and Fight forProgress, right now is when it will have the greatest impact. Here's why: *Ohioans are already voting, and Election Day is next week – so the sooner wecan launch this final ad, the more voters we'll be able to reach before theysubmit their ballots. * We're getting drowned out on the airwaves –Republicans have outspent us 3-to-1, so this final ad will punch back at theirattacks. * This final ad is going to be expensive – and we're going to run iton as many TV stations across Ohio as possible, so the more we raise, thebetter the chance we have at reaching the voters we need before Election Day.So, my team and I have set an urgent goal to raise $500,000 before midnighttomorrow to help launch this ad – my last ad before Election Day. I need yourhelp now more than ever, Peter: Please, will you rush $25 to split between mycampaign and Fight for Progress now to help us get our ad on the air, win inOhio, and keep the Senate blue? name: Dan Goldman
subject: A second Trump presidency will actually be worse than you imagine
body: Dan Goldman for New York [https://nvlupin.blob.core.windows.net/images/van/NGP/NGP31/1/94087/images/dsg_logo.png] ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏Peter, I first ran for Congress two years ago to preserve and protect our democracy from an assault by Donald Trump and the Republican party he leads. As the lead counsel in Trump’s first impeachment in 2019, I saw first-hand that democratic ideals, values and institutions are perceived by Trump as an obstacle, not an asset. But I never imagined five years ago that he would go this far. And it is certain to get worse if he wins. Before I continue, please consider pitching in any amount in the final stretch of this election. Our vital work to defend our democracy and the rule of law is more important now than ever. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24] If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately: CHIP IN $10 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24?express_lane=true&amount;=10] CHIP IN $25 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24?express_lane=true&amount;=25] CHIP IN $50 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24?express_lane=true&amount;=50] CHIP IN $100 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24?express_lane=true&amount;=100] CHIP IN $250 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24?express_lane=true&amount;=250] ANOTHER AMOUNT [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24?express_lane=true] — In 2019, the House of Representatives voted to impeach then-President Donald Trump for abusing his power and obstructing Congress — an ultimate betrayal of the American people and the rule of law. As lead counsel for the Democrats during Trump’s first impeachment, I helped to expose Donald Trump and his lawlessness to the American people. We proved that a corrupt president had abused the power of his office to undermine our democratic process in a bid to stay in power. https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24 [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/dsg-em-nov24] But that abuse of power was just the tip of the iceberg. Since then, Trump has attempted to overturn a lawful election in 2020, been indicted four times and convicted of 34 felony counts for interfering in the 2016 election, used his office to make money from foreign countries, cozied up to dictators, and tried everything in his power to undermine checks and balances and the separation of powers. But his plans for a second presidency are so much more dangerous. He has stated that he’d like to be a dictator, that he will use the military and the Department of Justice against anyone who disagrees with him, that he will turn the federal government into his personal fiefdom, that he will take away our individual rights and personal freedoms, and that he will support dictators over democracies around the world. Peter, we have unfinished business to save our country from Trump’s authoritarian intentions. Our democracy barely survived the first Trump presidency, and it’s unlikely it would survive a second. I’m running for re-election because we must stop Donald Trump and the Republican Party he controls from tearing down our democracy. And I need your support. Please contribute anything you can to support my work in the last four days of this election. We cannot waste a single second in this existential fight for American democracy. This race is close, but we still haveground we need to make up. Beth Van Duyne has been running ads nonstopattacking Democrats. We are keeping our foot on the gas, making sure we turnout every single Democratic voter. On the final day of early voting, can yougive one more time? name: Senate Conservatives
subject: Four Neck-and-Neck Senate Races
body: Mitch McConnell is stepping down as the Republican Leader in November and it's time to build a conservative majority in the Senate ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ Mitch McConnell is stepping down as the Republican Leader in November and it's time to build a conservative majority in the Senate that will truly fight for our values without making excuses. The best way to send principled leaders to Washington is to donate to their campaigns through the Senate Conservatives Fund. You can contribute to multiple candidates with a single online transaction, and SCF will pay all expenses and processing fees. This will save these candidates a mountain of money, so they can use your contributions to win votes rather than to pay fundraising costs. Here are the Senate candidates who need your urgent support: ✓ Bernie Moreno (OH) ✓ Eric Hovde (WI) ✓ Sam Brown (NV) ✓ Kari Lake (AZ) Please take action right now by making a split contribution to their conservative Senate campaigns. These races are neck-and-neck, so these candidates will need funding until Election Day to broadcast their message and turn out their voters. SUPPORT SENATE CONSERVATIVES RUSH $250 → RUSH $100 → RUSH $25 → THE BEST WAY TO FUND CONSERVATIVES Did you know that candidates often have to pay fundraising expenses that are over 80 percent of your contribution? It's true. When you respond to marketing emails and text messages from candidates, the candidates often get less than 20 percent of your donation after expenses. That's why the Senate Conservatives Fund was founded – to give freedom-loving Americans an effective way to support the best Senate candidates across the nation. Please contribute to these four candidates today! We will combine your donations with those made by thousands of other patriots and transfer them directly to their campaigns. Working together, we can build a conservative Senate that will truly advance our freedom agenda. Thank you for considering this urgent request and for doing so much to help fight for America's future! ELECTION COUNTDOWN SUPPORT SENATE CONSERVATIVES DONATE NOW Change in Washington means changing the people we send there. Senate Conservatives Fund 300 Independence Ave SE Washington, DC 20003 Senate Conservatives Fund is a grassroots organization that promotes conservative policies and helps elect conservative candidates to the U.S. Senate. SCF was founded by former Senator Jim DeMint to help the grassroots change Washington. Contributions to the Senate Conservatives Fund are not deductible as charitable contributions. Contributions from corporations or foreign nationals lacking permanent resident status are not permitted. Federal law requires us to report the name, mailing address, occupation and employer for each individual whose contributions aggregate in excess of $200 in a calendar year. name: Gloria Witt
subject: Let’s Keep Building Momentum in the Final Days!
body: It’s About YOU! Dear Friends, As Election Day approaches, the choice inVirginia’s 5th District has never been clearer. My opponent has made hispriorities evident by fully embracing Trump and his extreme MAGA agenda.Meanwhile, I’m here to offer a platform rooted in unity, solutions, and thereal concerns of our communities. My opponent's campaign has centered onloyalty to the former president, anti-LGBTQ+ policies, and questioning theintegrity of our elections. He has called the pandemic a “plan-demic” andimplied that our voting system is flawed. This is not the leadership we need,nor is it reflective of the values that built this district. In contrast, myplatform is about strengthening democracy, supporting families, and promotingsmart economic growth. I believe in protecting Social Security, expandingaccess to healthcare, and creating vocational and educational opportunitiesfor our young people. These priorities are driven by my deep connection tothis district and my belief in the power of community. Let’s make sureeveryone understands the stakes in this election. I need your help to spreadthe word about what’s truly at risk in this race. Please share this messagewith your friends and family, and encourage them to join us in voting for avision of inclusion and progress for Virginia's 5th district. Thank you forstanding with me in this movement . Together, let’s create a future we canall be proud of. With determination, Gloria Witt Democratic Nominee Virginia’s5th Congressional District P.S. Please Join us for a Watch Party on ElectionDay! Support Gloria, a leader who will fight for “we the people.” DONATE StayConnected Facebook Paid for and authorized by Gloria Witt for Congress.Gloria Witt for Congress P.O. Box 2225, Lynchburg, Virignia 24505, UnitedStates Powered by Squarespace Unsubscribe

name: Team NDRC
subject: A.G. Holder: “North Carolina is now one of the most egregiously gerrymandered states in the country.”
body: Peter, As Attorney General Eric Holder put it, North Carolina is “one of themost egregiously gerrymandered states in the country.” Let’s talk about how wegot here and how we’re fighting back right now — as we work to win a NorthCarolina election that’s flying under the national radar. In October of lastyear, Republicans in the state legislature manipulated the maps to gainunearned power. And state supreme court justices acted as ideologues insteadof neutral arbiters of the law — reversing the court’s own very recentprecedent and allowing those maps to move forward. Shockingly, the currentgerrymandered maps allow Republicans to hold supermajorities in thelegislature even if Democrats win statewide elections. And it’s important toremember that even if Democrats hold the governor’s seat this year, aRepublican supermajority in the legislature can override his veto. You’veprobably heard a lot about the governor’s race in North Carolina thiselection, even if you don’t live there. But here’s the critical North Carolinarace not enough people are talking about: A state supreme court candidate hasopenly said he wants a Republican majority on the court for the upcomingredistricting cycle. He praised North Carolina’s extreme congressionalgerrymander. And he joined a deeply controversial ruling that would haveestablished precedent for so-called personhood laws in North Carolina — thefoundation for restricting abortion and banning IVF. We are working to defeatcandidates like him in races across the country. Peter, step up with adonation to help ensure the NDRC can do everything we can between today andNovember 5th to elect Democracy Defenders in battleground states.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ndrc-em-nov24?refcode=don_ndrc_tier1_email_NorthCarolina_email_20241101-NDRC-Tier1-NorthCarolina_&utm;_source=email&utm;_medium=email&utm;_term=don&utm;_content=20241101-NDRC-Tier1-NorthCarolina_&utm;_campaign=NorthCarolina] Theelection happening in just a few days will help shape the future of fair mapsfor North Carolinians. We’ve proudly endorsed Justice Allison Riggs for theNorth Carolina Supreme Court because she has proven to be a fair-minded andindependent voice on the court. She is a tenacious civil rights attorney whohas been a champion of every American’s fundamental rights, including votingrights. By re-electing Justice Riggs and getting new pro-democracy leaders onthe North Carolina Supreme Court, we can pave the way for fair maps that giveeveryone in the state a fair chance to make their voices heard. And we canstand against GOP gerrymanderers who will keep trying to dilute the will ofthe people. This election is just one of hundreds we’ve identified across thecountry where your support can make an outsized impact to defend ourdemocracy. State-level races often come down to thin margins, and so we needyour help to reach every voter we can between now and November 5th. Donatetoday to help us keep up the fight. name: Team Tina
subject: Trump is not a “protector” of women
body: Folks — Donald Trump and the GOP are absolutely fixated on controlling women’sbodies. From restricting abortion access to opposing in-vitro fertilization,it seems like Republican leaders think they know women’s bodies better thanwomen themselves. To that, Tina says: Mind your damn business. While Trumpclaims to be a “protector” of women, his policies and vicious rhetoric provethe opposite — he is standing in the way of women’s rights and freedoms.Tina’s had enough — that’s why she’s doing all she can to elect leaders whoare pro-women, like Vice President Kamala Harris and Governor Tim Walz. body: Democrat Eric Swalwellrepresents California's 14th Congressional District. https://ericswalwell.com/[https://ericswalwell.com/] Friend — November??? Wow. It's been one hell of aride. name: David Pan
subject: Changing our system one step at a time
body: Help me to transform our relation to government                           [1]Hopefully, you have learned about my plan to phase out our welfare andentitlement programs to replace them with a universal basic income of $16,000per year for everyone 21 and over. Even if you don’t agree with all thedetails, we need to start discussing solutions to the problems that my planwill solve: a dysfunctional welfare system, the looming insolvency of SocialSecurity and Medicare, and our mounting national debt. Right now, I am theonly one even attempting to think about these crucial issues and offering apossible plan. It is of course an ambitious plan, and things will obviouslynot change overnight, and if elected I would only be able to take the firststeps toward the discussions that would lead to such solutions. But with yoursupport, I can start on the work of turning our country around. Without it, wewill have to wait that much longer to have these discussions, and meanwhileour debts will keep increasing, making solutions that much more difficult toimplement. Please add your voice to mine so that we can start on the processof real transformation that will change all of our lives, returning to us ourfreedom and prosperity. If you have not voted, please do so. Please alsoconsider a donation to my campaign. My ads have begun running on southernCalifornia TV stations, on streaming video, through text messages, and throughsocial media. You can also see my ad on my website at DavidPanforCongress.com[2]. Now is the time that I need your help to achieve these goals for you andyour family. Help me by contributing $5, $10, $100, which can go directly intospreading my message more broadly on these platforms. With polls showing razorthin margins and Republicans doubling down on their efforts to suppress ourvoices, we must fight back to build historic momentum for Democrats. I’vededicated my career to defending voting rights because I believe everyonedeserves to be heard at the ballot box. That’s why I’m proud to stand with theDemocratic Party of Georgia as they launch their vital initiative to providefree rides to the polls for voters on Election Day. Your support will helpensure that no Georgian is left behind, and will fuel our fight against theGOP’s ongoing voter suppression tactics. That’s why Republicans are working overtime to preventus from voting – from limiting polling places to spreading dangerousmisinformation about the voting process. But we won’t back down. TheDemocratic Party of Georgia has a bold plan to confront these attacks head-on.By providing free rides to the polls, they’re dismantling barriers and makingit easier for every voter to participate in our democracy. However, they needto raise $20,000 to fund these efforts and ensure that everyone can reach thepolls on November 5th. Now is the time to take action, and I’m counting on youto stand with us. subject: The finish line is in sight
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/davids-email?refcode=email-header[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/davids-email?refcode=email-header] I oweyou a massive thank you. We just passed our last end-of-month fundraisingdeadline, and we hit our goal a few minutes before midnight. Every singlemember of this grassroots team has done incredible work to get us here — andthough we’re facing a tough fight, we’re in the best possible position, thanksto you. But we’re far from sitting back and relaxing in these next four days.The finish line is in sight. I don’t know about you, but when I see a finishline, I don’t slow down — I pick up speed and finish strong. And that’sexactly what we’re going to do with this campaign. In the next four days,we’re going to hit the ground running every single day. We’re going to bereaching out to voters all across this district to spread our message and getout the vote, so we can defend this vital battleground seat. But if we’regoing to do that, we need one last push from our grassroots coalition in thesefinal days of the race. Can you help us finish strong? name: Sen. Jon Tester
subject: the difference between winning and losing
body: Folks, getting a flat tire now would be disastrous for our campaign. Can Icount on you to split $10 to my campaign and Jacky Rosen’s in the next 24hours?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_tester?refcode=jtk5363-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Asking for money is one of the worst parts ofthe job – but with the election in four days, I hope you’ll understand why I’mreaching out. We have a major fundraising goal at midnight tonight, and it’scrucial that we reach our targets. Mitch McConnell and his buddies are lookingfor any signs of vulnerabilities. If we miss our fundraising goal, we’ll haveto pull down our ads and open the door for even more outside spending fromMcConnell’s super PACs. With the race so close, those ads could mean thedifference between winning and losing this race. I wouldn’t ask if it wasn’turgent, folks. Will you make a split donation of whatever you can give to helpus hit our goal and win Montana’s Senate race?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_tester?refcode=jtk5363-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Thank you, Jon -------- This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Jacky Rosen
subject: you there?
body: Are you there? I’m sorry to send another email, but my worst nightmare isbecoming a reality. Donald Trump just held another nasty rally in Nevadayesterday, and I have nowhere else to turn.Can you split $25 between mycampaign and Defeat Boebert PAC to help me combat the GOP’s attacks and getacross the finish line? Trump did not hold back. He directly attacked me onstage, saying I’m a “horrible person” and a “radical left lunatic.” And hegave my MAGA opponent a platform to lie about my record in front of thousandsof voters. Listen - I won’t let childish name-calling get under my skin. I’mthe most vulnerable woman in the Senate during a year where abortion rightsare on the line, so I know what it’s like to face an onslaught of GOP insults.But the truth is Trump and my opponent are ramping up their attacks against mein these final days and the GOP’s TOP super PAC just poured $6.2 million moreinto my race with one goal:to defeat me. If we can’t beat them to the punchand reach thousands of undecided voters as soon as possible, we risk losingthe Democratic Senate majority and the White House. So please, can you make a$25 donation split between my campaign and Defeat Boebert PAC before it’s toolate? I need *your* help to defeat Donald Trump and defend our DemocraticSenate and White House. If you've saved your payment information with ActBlueExpress, your donation will go through immediately: RUSH IN $25 RUSH IN $50RUSH IN $100 RUSH IN $250 RUSH IN $500 RUSH ANOTHER AMOUNT Thank you,Jacky Rosen DONATE Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com . name: Theresa Boisseau
subject: Second Chance - Free Viewing of Zurawski v Texas
body: I HIGHLY recommend you watch this documentary this weekend. View this email inyour browser (https://mailchi.mp/987033b5a265/amanda-zurawski-vs-texas-12709419?e=ebba716312) https://www.theresa4texas.com Hi Friend, ** Ifyou didn't get a chance to watch the documentary, Zurawski v Texas, I HIGHLYrecommend you watch it this weekend.------------------------------------------------------------ ** The Center forReproductive Rights sums it up:------------------------------------------------------------ "In the newdocumentary feature film Zurawski v Texas, independent filmmakers Maisie Crowand Abbie Perrault show the stark and terrifying reality of what it means tobe pregnant in a U.S. state that has banned abortion—and the bravery, grit anddetermination that it takes to speak out. Crow and Perrault followed threeTexas women who were denied medically necessary abortion care—Amanda Zurawski,Samantha Casiano, and Dr. Austin Dennard—as they brought their stories andbattled their case up to the Texas Supreme Court, with the help of the Centerfor Reproductive Rights’ Senior Staff Attorney Molly Duane." Watch Zurawski vTexas for free Nov 2 and 3 here(https://watch.eventive.org/togetherfilms/play/670db1d13a247100e803df13/670db1dc3f8905002cc42691)** If you are able to give, I am sure the Center for Reproductive Rights coulduse your donation.------------------------------------------------------------ Donate the theCenter for Reproductive Rights here (https://reproductiverights.org/) Theyhave cases across the country and could use our support while they fightagainst the extreme abortion bans that put women's lives in jeopardy. ** Ifyou haven't voted yet, today is the last day of early voting and Tuesday isElection Day. ------------------------------------------------------------Thanks for your help. ** Onwards,------------------------------------------------------------ ** Theresa------------------------------------------------------------ Donate(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/abrighterfuturefortexas) Volunteer(https://www.theresa4texas.com/get-involved) Issues(https://www.theresa4texas.com/what-theresa-stands-for) Shop(https://store.theresa4texas.com) https://www.theresa4texas.com Follow me onsocial media - and share with your friends and family!https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61552530122152https://www.instagram.com/theresa4texas https://www.twitter.com/theresa4texashttps://tiktok.com/theresa4texashttps://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyd_ZE7lgKTjDchvDRg4A9g Pol. Ad paid for byTheresa4Texas. Copyright (C) 2024 Theresa4Texas All rights reserved. Ourmailing address is: PO Box 200759, Austin, TX 78720 info@theresa4texas.com(mailto:info@theresa4texas.com?subject=&body;=) www.theresa4texas.com Want tochange how you receive these emails? name: Nella Domenici
subject: Fired up!
body: Nella for Senate We’re on the cusp of flipping New Mexico red and electing new leadership that will secure our border, lower our cost of living, get tough on crime, improve education, and unleash our abundant natural resources. I’m fired up, Peter! The energy at President Trump’s rally in Albuquerque today was palpable. I could feel it on stage while delivering my own remarks, and it was apparent to anyone who was there todaythat something special is happening in New Mexico. We’re on the cusp of flipping this state red and electing new leadership that will secure our border, lower our cost of living, get tough on crime, improve education, and unleash our abundant natural resources. I need you to keep fighting every single day, every single moment, until the polls close on Tuesday. Our campaign is working 24/7 to reach remaining undecided voters and get out the vote. We need to keep resources flowing into this campaign to ensure our funding for these operations doesn’t run dry. Your $5 or $10 contribution, in addition to your vote, is needed to help us secure more votes. Please chip in anything you can, and let’s win this thing! Let's Flip New Mexico RED! Thank you, Nella Domenici ABOUT NELLA New Mexico is Nella Domenici’s home. She was born in Albuquerque and lived for most of her childhood in a home near the intersection of Lomas and Monroe with her seven siblings, and her parents - Pete and Nancy Domenici. Nella began her education at Our Lady of Fatima, where she learned the values she holds today. Nella is a proud third-generation New Mexican, devoted mother of two, step-mom of four, and the wife of a Navy Veteran. Nella’s family’s roots run deep in New Mexico and she and her husband Pat enjoy their family home in New Mexico that they have owned for nearly twenty years. Like most New Mexicans, Nella Domenici understands the importance of hard work. She waited tables to help pay for her undergraduate degree from Georgetown University, and worked her way through night school at Georgetown Law while holding down a full time job. She then graduated from Harvard Business School as a Baker Scholar, top 5% of the class, while 9 months pregnant. Nella began her career at the bottom and worked her way up through the complex finance world, eventually serving as CFO for one of the world’s largest, most successful investment firms. In her career, Nella advised, invested in, grew, and led many companies, and served on public company boards. The industries she has worked in are vast and include areas such as health care, AI, food service, lodging, commercial real estate, mortgage lending, and consumer products. These companies have ranged from small family-owned businesses, to rapidly growing venture backed enterprises, to a Fortune 200 company. Several of these have been headquartered in New Mexico. Collectively, the companies Nella has been heavily involved with have employed thousands of Americans. Like her father and mother, Nella has been a warrior for those who most need an advocate: for women competing in academics or business, for families dealing with mental illness, and for those without access to quality healthcare or education. JOIN NELLA Follow Nella Online Checks can be made payable to Nella for Senate and mailed to PO Box 92918 | Albuquerque, NM 87199 Paid for by Nella for Senate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hate to see you go: unsubscribe .

Hitting every single daily fundraising goal is extremely important – and believe me, Ted Cruz and his extremist allies are watching. They've recently committed over $13 million to go live with attack ads against me, and let me be clear, there's a reason they're doing this. In just the past few weeks alone, not one, but TWO polls show me within 2 points of Ted Cruz. That's a HUGE testament to this grassroots team and our powerful voter outreach efforts. But now, millions of dollars are being spent against us because we really have a chance at a massive upset against Ted Cruz, the Senate's most vulnerable Republican this cycle. We've come so far, but we can't pull ahead in these last days before the election if we let them drown out our message. name: Team Kean
subject: RE: Shifting gears
body: Friend—Election month is HERE! We are now only FOUR short days away from oneof the most historic elections of our lifetime. This is THE final stretch…themoment we have been building and working toward… and we need your help ONELAST TIME to finish strong. HELP KEAN FINISH STRONG We are about to shift ourremaining resources into an ALL OUT Get Out The Vote Operation—will you pitchin one last time to magnify our efforts? This is our final push to keep Tom’sads running throughout the district, reach every single voter with Tom’sunifying message, and show the Radical Left that we are not letting up—noteven for a second. If you have anything left in the tank to give, please sendit in before midnight tonight and it will go DIRECTLY towards our final voteroutreach operation. SEND A FINAL SURGE OF SUPPORT Thank you in advance foryour generosity and action in these final days—it’s because of YOU that wewill win big on November 5th and get back to winning for the great people ofNew Jersey and America. name: Wes Moore
subject: What it means to make history
body: http://secure.actblue.com/donate/loc_lbr_fr_q42024 [http://secure.actblue.com/donate/loc_lbr_fr_q42024] Hey there, it’s Wes Moore. I wanted to talk about my friend, Lisa Blunt Rochester, who's currently running to be Delaware’s next senator. I’m so grateful to have the opportunity to talk about someone who will make meaningful change for everyday people like you. Take it from me, I understand the importance of having a people-powered campaign. Moreover, we’ve both come from humble beginnings. We know what it means to dig in deep to do the hard, meaningful work, and giving back to our communities is a value we both hold close to our hearts. And at a time when we’re more divided than ever, coming together to find common-sense solutions and leadership in the Senate is more important than ever. And with the Democratic Senate majority on the line in November, your grassroots support is crucial to making that a reality. So please, consider donating $25 or more today to help us make history again by helping me elect Lisa Blunt Rochester into the U.S. Senate as Delaware's first Black and woman Senator. subject: Heading out to vote
body: # [#] Election Day is just 4 days away. It’s hard to believe, but I wanted toreach out and ensure you’re prepared to head to the polls on Tuesday. Here’sall the information on same day registration, poll locations and additionalvoting information for California. [https://www.sos.ca.gov/elections?%5D=] .This is the most critical Election of our lives, which makes it more importantthan ever that we get out there to the polls and encourage the people aroundus to do the same. Your voice matters, and it’s important that you get outthere and exercise your right to vote! See you at the polls! — ZoeCongresswoman Zoe Lofgren is a strong fighter for California’s values inWashington. name: Senate Republicans
subject: We have the opportunity
body: NRSC Five winnable neck-and-neck races will be decided by undecided andindependent voters on Election Day, and Senate Republicans need your help tosecure victory. We are less than a week from Election Day, and Senate racesare SHIFTING in states like Montana, Ohio, Wisconsin, and Pennsylvania. FellowAmerican, we cannot take anything for granted, even if ratings favorRepublicans. But politics can be unpredictable, and this year is no exception.– Roll Call 10/29 Many of these critical Senate races are going to come downto thousands of votes. • In 2022, Adam Laxalt lost by only 7,902 votes. • In2020, Congresswoman Miller–Meeks won her election by just six votes. That'swhy it's so foolish when people say their votes do not count. They do! TheSenate majority will come down to the wire. We cannot afford to take anythingfor granted – especially with so many close races and the chance to retireDemocrat Senators inMontana, Ohio, Wisconsin, and Pennsylvania. It's up to usto help push them over the finish line. Please donate to help. Thank you,Senate Republicans FLIP THE SENATE >> If you want to help Republicans TAKEBACK THE SENATE, text WIN to 55404 to receive mobile alerts! Message and datarates may apply. subject: In 4 days, the election will be over.
body: Peter, it’s Emilia. We are just four days out from the election. Voters aremaking their plans to vote, heading to the polls, and returning their ballots.This is crunch time! Since we only have four days left, I want to give you abreakdown on where this race stands right now. I'll explain more, but we needall the help we can get. We only have four days left tomake sure this team is strong enough to go toe-to-toe with their deep pockets.Only four more days to combat the attack ads trying to hide my record ofworking across the aisle to deliver for Northeast Ohioans. Just four days toreach as many voters as possible in OH-13 to let them know what this movementis all about and that I am fighting for this hardworking community. Peter, wehave a lot of work to do, and any amount you can pitch in makes a hugedifference on this grassroots team.https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sykesq42024?&amount;=5&refcode;=em_fr_2024.11.01_b1_es_allI am working to bring jobs back to our communities, keep more money in thepockets of hardworking families, and protect reproductive freedoms. There isjust too much on the line, and we can't afford to fall short. name: Indiana Democrats
subject: One million Hoosiers (and Saturday voting)
body: [https://prod.cdn.everyaction.com/images/van/NGP/NGP03/1/67635/images/IDP%20logo.jpg]Peter, We have some good news for you on this Friday – as of this week, over1,000,000 Hoosiers have voted!
