name: April McClain Delaney
subject: 4 days to go!
body: Peter, We’re in the final stretch until Election Day with 4 days to go! Here’sthe deal: National Republicans are coming to Neil Parrott’s rescue–pouring inresources into attacks against me. Just last week, he was fundraisingalongside Stephen Moore, who infamously criticized the Violence Against WomenAct, labeling vital support for survivors as “pork.” That’s why we’re workingso hard to meet voters face to face. From now until Election Day, we need yoursupport to do so. That’s why we’re setting up a Get-Out-The-Vote fund to helpus with emergency expenses in the coming days. I know we have the power totake on Neil Parrott and his extremist agenda at the polls this Tuesday. Willyou chip in to our Get-Out-the-Vote fund today? $3(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-amdc-24q4-em?&refcode;=BLU_EM_AMDC_2024-11-01_1&amount;=3) $5(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-amdc-24q4-em?&refcode;=BLU_EM_AMDC_2024-11-01_1&amount;=5) $10(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-amdc-24q4-em?&refcode;=BLU_EM_AMDC_2024-11-01_1&amount;=10) $15(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-amdc-24q4-em?&refcode;=BLU_EM_AMDC_2024-11-01_1&amount;=15) $25(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-amdc-24q4-em?&refcode;=BLU_EM_AMDC_2024-11-01_1&amount;=25) $50(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-amdc-24q4-em?&refcode;=BLU_EM_AMDC_2024-11-01_1&amount;=50) OTHER AMOUNT(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-amdc-24q4-em?&refcode;=BLU_EM_AMDC_2024-11-01_1) Grateful, April------------------------------------------------------------ PAID FOR BY APRILMCCLAIN DELANEY FOR CONGRESS April McClain Delaney for Congress PO Box 83940Gaithersburg, MD 20883-83940 United States CONTRIBUTE TODAY(secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-amdc-24q4-em?&refcode;=BLU_EM_AMDC_2024-11-01_1&amount;=25) CONTRIBUTE WEEKLY(secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-amdc-24q4-em?&refcode;=BLU_EM_AMDC_2024-11-01_1&amount;=25&recurring;=1) Webelieve that emails are a crucial way to stay in touch with our topsupporters. name: Ashley Ehasz
subject: Thank you
body: First: I want to start off with a huge THANK YOU. I sign off every email with"thanks for being in this fight with me as my co-pilot" – and I MEAN IT. Justlike no one in the Army works alone, there's no way to run for office alone.It takes an entire team of volunteers, donors, and staff. I still can't fullygrasp that tens of thousands of people have my back every day. And I amgrateful for each and every one of you. Second: Even though we just closed thebooks on October, we have a goal of raising $20,000 from grassroots donorsbetween now and Election Day. So can you please pitch in – even if you'vealready done so recently? DONATE [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/eha-email-nov2024?refcode=em_fl_eha_20241101_fr_eomty_cand_mf_30da_s1_pt] I also want tomake sure that as my co-pilot, you know exactly what the campaign's been upto. Because we’ve been doing a LOT. Here's a quick run down: Organizing VoterTurnout Last weekend we… >> Broke our record for number of voters' doorsknocked >> Had so many volunteers that we had to turn our parking lot intooverflow space >> Gave out all of our walk packets for the whole weekend onDay 1 – so we've expanded the number of voters we're reaching out to >> Werejoined by Gov. Josh Shapiro And yesterday, Bucks County had a special visitfrom Tim Walz! Fundraising I'm proud to say that we reached our Octobergrassroots fundraising goal in the nick of time! A whopping 87% of ourfundraising comes from individual donations – NOT special interests likecorporate PACs. And we proved exactly how strong we are by outraising BrianFitzpatrick last quarter and setting a new record for Democratic fundraisingin PA-01. Ads The final case we're making to voters is Fitzpatrick's anti-choice record that has made women second-class citizens in this country. Andyes, I'm so fed up, I'm cursing in our ad.[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zdb-z9KJqV0] What's Next We have just 4 DAYSLEFT until Election Day. And this weekend is our last big Get Out The Votepush to turn out our friends and neighbors to the polls. Our goal is toshatter more records and welcome some big names to Pennsylvania in these finaldays! And of course, we need to raise that $20,000 to make sure we can keepour ads up and field offices resourced in these final days. Please rush $10 orwhatever you can afford to raise this last bit >>[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/eha-email-nov2024?refcode=em_fl_eha_20241101_fr_eomty_cand_mf_30da_s1_pt] Thanks forbeing in this fight with me as my co-pilot, Ashley 🚁 Paid for by Ehasz forCongress Ehasz for Congress 1800 Byberry Road #1336 Bensalem, PA 19020 UnitedStates Ashley Ehasz is a former member of the U.S. Army. Use of her militaryrank, job titles, and photographs in uniform does not imply endorsement fromthe Department of Defense or the Department of the Army. Inbox overcrowded butwant to stay updated on big news? Get less email – we'll send you about 2emails per week [https://secure.ngpvan.com/jpXqs-3mz0a7WjAoIC5fRw2]. If youbelieve you received this message in error or wish to no longer receive emailfrom us, please unsubscribe:https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/N74Qrv5Ook2N-EzrRAGGpg2?unsubscribedata=2FtCEAVBI6r3PlcnLMZ%2BoQgMl6%2FgM2hcIy0SfrDMxhmOpep5jRY%2FxlhJw7O07bK%2FJoYVigQR9CXK9g4tKZVPEozYOct%2FiRBstNSU7mdYx0DngbadsmDiQDQHS2bIKue%2Fnla2VcKLHK6V2QLU7Qf3ibVQLjAHkUmdI9DAU9Nj71gC%2BNc7UdxFthc6eYXQPIGL%2FC2iQvIsYTnRjIbp3sU0eaxOV6nOVbz%2Blbam9DVjSlb26Dls9pHEMD9rcF9CdueF3yHykHAYsZxFpwcz%2FVTSkDd4i2RF3eC%2BKj4rrX7QPWvPKrvjScNOI5EWT23GcfO6VzqCaGE1su2jXGkZgO6VLwLvhY1n%2F%2FxqmS02tUOf9l4T9yg2znz2WOi36h%2BtPIhvg1HcFhwOud5EMifyUG%2FD1fVUAEuZcg7e35lUsdWDPv4%3D.

name: Donald Trump Jr.
subject: Speaker Johnson’s request
body: Peter, If you’re like me, you know that the most important thing we can dothis year for our country is sending my father back to the White House. Butwhat’s equally important is ensuring that he has an army of America Firstwarriors in Congress to back him up! Help build our strategy! SpeakerJohnson and I are working tirelessly with just 4 days remaining to make surethat we win theFULL TRIFECTA this November. Can you take a few minutes torespond to the Speaker’s 2024 Election Survey and share your thoughts with usso we can build the ultimate operation? RESPOND NOW This isn’t just any oldsurvey. It’s a CRUCIAL factor in ensuring we have all the information we needto build our final strategy. So, Peter, can I count on you to respond? Thanks,Donald Trump Jr. Paid for by Mike Johnson for Louisiana Unsubscribe |Mark asJunk

name: OKGOP
subject: It’s
body: Peter, early voting is continuing in Oklahoma today & tomorrow. And we needall Republicans to get out & vote. The times early voting is available today(Friday) is 8:00 am to 6:00 pm & tomorrow you can early vote during the hoursof 8:00 am to 2:00 pm. If you aren’t sure where early voting happens in yourcounty, you can find out here . One of the most impactful votes you will castis on the THREE State Supreme Court judges on the ballot for retention. Thevoters in Oklahoma are being asked “should these judges be retained on theOklahoma Supreme Court?” And the answer is NO, they should not be retained!You’ve heard plenty about the Presidential Election, and voting straight partyRepublican will restore our economy, but we MUST get rid of these liberaljudges. All three judges are very liberal (check out the score card made byOCPA scoring their liberal records ) by clicking here , and they were allappointed by Democrat Governors. They’ve constantly legislated from the benchwith their decisions in order to force their liberal agenda on the people ofOklahoma. For more information on these judges & the other judges on theballot please visit OKGOP.com/judges/ . There you can download a pdf to printat home, email to your family & friends, or distribute however you choose.Other groups have now engaged as well encouraging their people to vote NO onthese judges. We can’t afford more years of liberal activist judges forcingtheir leftist agenda on our State. Tell everyone you know to VOTE NO on allthree Oklahoma Supreme Court judges. The easiest way to remember it is: thesethree liberal Supreme Court judges MUST go, so we all must vote NO! Say NO toEdmondson, Gurich, & Kauger. -Team OKGOP -=-=- Paid for by OKGOP and notauthorized by any candidate or candidate's committee. www.OKGOP.com - (405)528-3501. 4031 N. Linconln Blvd., Oklahoma City, OK 73105 This email was sentto dpwillis67@gmail.com. To stop receiving emails:https://okgop.nationbuilder.com/unsubscribe -=-=- Created with NationBuilder -https://nationbuilder.com/

name: Liz Walters, ODP Chair
subject: Tuesday will be here before we know it.
body: I want to say thank you, team. Every time we’ve sent out the call for help tothis grassroots movement, you’ve answered. You’ve donated. You’ve knocked ondoors and made phone calls to voters in your free time. You’ve helped usregister Ohioans all across the state. You’ve talked to your friends andfamily about this historic election. It means more than you know. Now, here weare in November, with the election looming over us, only four days away – andwe have a new goal that we need your help to reach. We intend to raise $25,000by Election Day so we can fight back against the onslaught of Republicanspending trying to silence our voices and buy this election. Can you pitch in$5 to help us reach this goal? https://secure.actblue.com/donate/odp-email-241101-gotv?amount=5&refcode;=ODP_ATA_EM_FR_ThankYou_241101_T1_1 Inthese next four days, we’re not giving up on our unprecedented get out thevote push. We’re still on the ground, mobilizing voters, and getting Ohioansto the polls. Ohio’s House and Senate races will decide control of Congress,and these races will be won and lost by the closest of margins. So we’re notdone yet. This is the final stretch and we can’t afford to waste a singlesecond. If you’re able, please chip in anything you can afford to help usreach our Election Day fundraising goal so we can win at the ballot box onTuesday >> https://secure.actblue.com/donate/odp-email-241101-gotv?refcode=ODP_ATA_EM_FR_ThankYou_241101_T1_1 Thank you foryour constant support. name: Katrina Christiansen
body: One dollar. That’s the donation I am asking you to make before midnight. Peter– seriously, just $1. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/katrina_email] $1 tostop Kevin Cramer and Republicans from taking back the Senate. $1 to keep upwith Cramer’s spending on TV in the final stretch. $1 to help me win this seatand secure a Senate Majority that can deliver on the issues hardworkingfamilies care most about. I know $1 may not seem like it can make much of adifference. But I refuse to accept a dime of Corporate PAC money. So I’mrelying on help from grassroots Democrats – not corporate donors and specialinterests – to fund my campaign in these last days. That means every dollarcould be the difference between flipping this seat blue and handing Cramer andextreme Republicans the reins to our democracy. So please, Peter: Can you makea contribution of just $1 to ensure we have the resources to counter everyRepublican attack and reach voters before they head to the polls with ourcampaign's winning message? name: Scott Presler
subject: Election Update From Pennsylvania
body: Democrats will do ANYTHING to stop us from getting out the vote Friend, Idon't have much time but I needed to share this update about what is happeningon the ground in Pennsylvania. Democrats are trying to get me thrown inPRISON! The same Democrat machine that is relentlessly waging lawfare againstPresident Trump and the leaders of our America First movement is now goingafter my team and I. Why? Because they know that our efforts are moving theneedle towards a complete MAGA victory and they will do anything to try toslow us down. Thanks to the support of patriots like you Early Voting in PAwas through the roof for Republicans: For the first time ever, Republicansrequested and returned more mail-in ballots than Democrats. And make nomistake %recipient.first%, if we hold the line in Pennsylvania the so-called"Blue Wall" will come crumbling down, President Trump will return to the WhiteHouse, and we can finally get back to work saving our nation. But there isstill a lot of work that needs to be done in the final stretch before ElectionDay. We must ensure that our victory is TOO BIG TO RIG and we cannot allow theLeft to distract us from achieving our goal. STEP UP NOW - LET'S FINISH THIS!Right now, our team is deploying door knockers across the Commonwealth ofPennsylvania to make certain every Trump supporter that has not already votedbefore the Early Voting deadline shows up and casts their vote on ElectionDay. If you are able, please make a contribution so that we can fund theseefforts until we get over the finish line . $12 - SPONSOR A DOOR KNOCKER FOR 1HOUR $24 - SPONSOR A DOOR KNOCKER FOR 2 HOURS $48 - SPONSOR A DOOR KNOCKERFOR 4 HOURS Our team will not lose focus until every patriot in this crucialswing state that wants to take our country back and restore American greatnessbanks their vote. I am grateful for everyone who chooses to stand with us atthis pivotal moment. It is because of your support that I am confident we willsecure Pennsylvania, take back the White House, and MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!Yours Sincerely, Scott Presler Paid for by Early Vote Action PAC Unsubscribehere

subject: Not much time left

But, we’re still seeingextremely low voter turnout across the district. Considering I won by just 1%in 2022, that’s a major problem. We CAN defend this seat, but our field teamneeds extra support for the final weekend to ensure every voter returns theirballot. Will you give $10 before the end of the day Monday so we reach our$50,000 GOTV goal? name: Ruben Gallego
subject: We did not come this far to lose to Kari Lake
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego] When I was in Iraq, inurban combat, we had a special knock we’d use when we were surrounded byinsurgents. The comfort in that knock was knowing that while danger was allaround you, the person on the other side of the door was friendly — someoneyou could depend on. I’ve never been afraid to ask for help when I needed it.And right now, I’m knocking. I’m coming to you for help. Kari Lake is on theoffense. With just a few days until voting ends, she has a resource advantageover us. She’s got more money to spend, and she is funneling all of it into amassive surge. She’s outspending us on television in one of the most importantregions of the state. But I refuse to let her win. I did not swear an oath tosupport and defend the Constitution to lose against someone who has spreadmore lies and disinformation about our elections than any other politician inthe country after Trump himself. If you’re with me, donate $20.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego] I did not lose some of mybest friends in combat to cede the democracy they fought for to Trump, Lake,and the MAGA Right. This election is bigger than just who controls the House,the Senate, or the White House. It is about ensuring our democracy survivesfor our kids and our grandkids. If you’re with me, donate $20.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego] In the toughest times ofmy life, I have been incredibly fortunate to have the support I needed to getthrough. My mom, my sisters, my community, my Marines. In this campaign, Ihave you. And we did not come this far to lose to Kari Lake. I can’t overstatehow important this is: Please, make a split $20 donation with Tim Kaine todayif you are ready to help me win this campaign for U.S. Senate, hold our SenateMajority, and defend our democracy.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego] If you’ve saved yourpayment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go throughimmediately: DONATE $20[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego?express_lane=true&amount;=20]DONATE $50[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego?express_lane=true&amount;=50]DONATE $100[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego?express_lane=true&amount;=100]OTHER [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-gallego] I’ll never back downwhen it comes to our democracy. Thanks for sticking with me as I finish thefight. name: Justice Democrats
subject: BREAKING: Squad members are putting pressure on Biden
body: [1]Justice Democrats Breaking news, Peter: Justice Democrats incumbents Rep.Rashida Tlaib, Cori Bush, Ilhan Omar, and Summer Lee are putting pressure onPresident Biden to explain why his administration deployed U.S. troops toIsrael without congressional authorization. [https://go.justicedemocrats.com/signup/petition-20241101-us-troops-israel/?source=em20241101-36115&akid;=36115%2E1203867%2E5ZvhDY ]Prem Thakker:NEW—Reps. Rashida Tlaib & Cori Bush are pressing Biden to explain unauthorizedinvolvement of US armed forces in Israel's military activity. They warn amember can force a vote to remove troops from the region. André Carson, IlhanOmar, Summer Lee joined. Our progressive champions for peace are leading theway on this issue once again by holding this administration accountable forignoring the law and continuing to enable right-wing Israeli Prime MinisterBenjamin Netanyahu’s genocide against Palestinians. Despite the War PowersResolution of 1973 requiring Congressional approval to send troops to war,President Biden has provided Israel with U.S. soldiers on the ground, as wellas billions of dollars worth of weapons and bombs used to carry out warcrimes, all while Israel has largely blocked food and other humanitarian aidfrom reaching Palestinians in need — which violates federal and internationallaw. In their letter to the President, Rashida, Cori, Ilhan, and Summer madeit clear that he “cannot continue to ignore the law without Congressionalintervention,” and warned that a member of Congress can introduce a resolutionand force a vote to remove U.S. forces from Israel. [https://go.justicedemocrats.com/signup/petition-20241101-us-troops-israel/?source=em20241101-36115&akid;=36115%2E1203867%2E5ZvhDY ]Stand with ourprogressive leaders and join them in their fight to hold the Bidenadministration accountable: sign on to support their letter now → [https://go.justicedemocrats.com/signup/petition-20241101-us-troops-israel/?source=em20241101-36115&akid;=36115%2E1203867%2E5ZvhDY ]Sign On Fromintroducing the ceasefire resolution last year to sending this letter toPresident Biden, Justice Democrats members are giving it all they’ve got toend the genocide, bring home the hostages, and promote peace instead ofviolent escalation in the Middle East. In solidarity, Justice DemocratsContribute to Justice Democrats:https://secure.actblue.com/donate/justicedemocrats?refcode=em20241101-36115-footer&t;=1002&refcode2;=36115_1203867_5ZvhDY&akid;=36115%2E1203867%2E5ZvhDYThis email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. Email is the most important wayfor us to reach you about opportunities to get involved. If you need to removeyourself from our email list, click here to unsubscribe:https://go.justicedemocrats.com/unsubscribe/unsubscribe/?t=1003&akid;=36115%2E1203867%2E5ZvhDYPAID FOR BY JUSTICE DEMOCRATS. name: Debbie, me
subject: I'm putting my record up against Rick Scott's
body: Friend — by now, with just 4 days until Election Day, I hope you have a goodsense of who I am and the issues I believe are so important. But I thought alittle reminder would be helpful, especially contrasted with who Rick Scott is🤢. Maybe it will even motivate you to make your very first online donationbefore tonight's fundraising deadline to ensure I can defeat Rick Scott!https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2476-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 First and foremost, I'm everything I am todaybecause of my mother. She brought my sisters and me to America when I was just14. Mom knew we had to get out of Ecuador, which was transitioning todemocracy after suffering under a military dictatorship. She knew America wasthe key to a better life. Well, with a whole lot of hard work (includingworking in a doughnut shop to help my family get by), long hours, and a ton ofhope, we were able to win our American dream. My story is what inspires me togive back to this incredible country and state that gave me so much. Afterputting myself through college, I worked for several nonprofit organizationsacross Florida, helping to protect our wildlife and preserve our coral reefs.Rick Scott, on the other hand, banned saying the words "climate change" whenhe was governor of Florida, and the League of Conservation Voters gave him awhopping 0% score last year. During my time working at Florida InternationalUniversity, I spearheaded a new program to expand affordable health careaccess to more Floridians. But Rick Scott has voted to repeal the AffordableCare Act more times than I care to count. And who can forget he committed oneof the largest Medicare frauds in the history of our country. Eventually, Ihad the honor of serving my community in the U.S. House of Representatives,where I became the first South American immigrant to be elected to Congress!In the House, I wrote the bill to expand seniors’ Medicare Advantage coverage,worked with Republicans to provide economic relief to families and smallbusinesses, and secured $200 million for Everglades restoration. I'm proud ofmy record — but can Rick Scott say the same, friend? He has used his time inoffice writing the plan to end Social Security and Medicare, attempting toundermine our elections, attacking our rights, and making it harder forworking families to get ahead. As a result, Rick Scott's approval ratings withFloridians are underwater. Even a large percentage of Republicans don'tapprove of him! Now, polling shows me statistically tied with Scott, and injust 4 days, we can defeat him and protect our Democratic Senate majority inthe process. But with Rick Scott outspending me 3-1 on the airwaves, it'sgoing to take a surge in grassroots support from people like you to trulydefeat him. So please, rush a donation of $5 or whatever you can to send me tothe U.S. Senate and give Floridians the true leader and public servant wedeserve!https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2476-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 -------- This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Jon Tester
subject: Tied with Tim Sheehy
body: | ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/X68678553-96e8-42b4-9281-157e96a29561/368d17ff-e836-4168-8049-c5f0900fbbf9) | | | ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/68678553-96e8-42b4-9281-157e96a29561/a638be21-8513-42b1-9bfc-5f974022c80e.png) --- | | | | |  --- | _You're getting this message because you’ve supported good causes andDemocratic candidates. We need your support to continue fighting for ourdemocracy. We love having you in our network, but if you no longer wish tohear from us, you canunsubscribe here._ --- |  Peter — it’s Jon. I’m in the toughest race of my life to win Montana’sSenate seat, and a brand new poll has me tied against Tim Sheehy.![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXe-vdsceM3RCQJXWg-eamF118DHUd_7ajuYiy7oVL3SePEMX_RCRJxQajUIZKCvnhubgAwveL58y4eE4qMPxpwY_y6fRgQWGbHy9TrWpYIEx4TAymFaEffstylEbgiVV-wMbMg0YujNlAD-OmekEtaJNzY4?key=ENBiXSBu33tyTs9k-rKaA5FD) I can feel that themomentum is on our side and we can't afford to waste a single second of itover these next four days. I need you now more than ever: Will you split adonation of $25 to help us finish these final days in the best possibleposition to win this race? After seeing this new poll, generous donors arematching every donation to this email dollar-for-dollar >> --- | | SPLIT A $25 DONATION --- | Look, I’m no stranger to tough elections — I won my first Senate race byless than one percentage point. But I’ve never run a race like this. MitchMcConnell is making it his #1 mission to defeat me. His big money buddies havepoured in millions of dollars to boost their handpicked candidate, and floodthe airwaves with attacks against me — right as Montanans vote. But this newpoll shows that if we put in the work these last 4 days, we can break the tieand defeat Tim Sheehy. My team says we raise about $25K from emails like thisone. I think we can do $60K right now — but I need your help to get there.Peter, will you rush a matched donation of $25 (becomes $50) before midnight? --- | | SPLIT A $25 DONATION --- | Thank you, Jon --- | --- | | | | |  --- | | |  --- | --- | | |  --- | | | | |  --- | | | ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/68678553-96e8-42b4-9281-157e96a29561/bdd7c5f5-7de1-4347-b64e-b4284329efec.png) | Cliff Schecter President, Blue Amp Action Amplify Good  ---|--- | | |  --- | | Follow Us | ![](https://blueampstrategies.salsalabs.org/public/images/icons/medium-auto_twitter2.png) | ![](https://blueampstrategies.salsalabs.org/public/images/icons/medium-auto_linkedin.png) ---|---  | **Blue Amp Action PAC** PO Box 8384, Cincinnati, OH 45208 --- | Having trouble viewing this email? View it in your web browser --- | | |  --- | | | About BlueAmp Action: We cannot sugarcoat the current situation. Right-wing authoritarianism, defeated by a worldwide coalition during WWII, was only in hibernation. Over the past decade it has infected democratic societies--including ours. It is as simple as it is terrifying: What we do now will define the future of our country and world. We at Blue Amp Action are dedicated to liberal, open societies, where reason and science are applied to solve our problems; where civil rights--including voting rights!--are protected for all. We fight for these values every day. Speaking up on our platforms, raising the voices and the political prospects of liberal pols and pundits. **And savvy grassroots activists like you know, just like we do, that we can’t stop watching the people we help elect:_ after the elections, we have to keep organizing support for the policies we like and pushing back against the ones we don’t._** **__When the public tunes out between elections and the only people our elected officials hear from are the paid lobbyists of wealthy corporations, our government stops being accountable to the needs of ordinary families.__** **Democracy never sleeps, and neither can we.** So we ask that you support our work, so we can continue to engage in this fight every moment of every day. So our kids grow up in democracy, not dystopia. Thank you for your support for all we do! Please follow Cliff Schecter on Twitter @cliffschecter, or subscribe to The Takedown with Cliff Schecter on YouTube, to keep up to date with this battle for the heart and soul of our country. — _You're getting this message because you’ve supported good causes and Democratic candidates. We need your support to continue fighting for our democracy. We love having you in our network, but if you no longer wish to hear from us, you canunsubscribe here._ --- | Paid for by Blue Amp Action PAC --- | | Unsubscribe or Manage Your Preferences ---

name: Keith Ellison
subject: If you’re considering sitting out this election because of Gaza
body: Peter, I suspect the majority of you reading this email have already voted orhave made a plan to vote for Kamala Harris for President and Tim Walz for VicePresident. If so, thank you, and please sign up for a GOTV shift athttps://www.mobilize.us/2024mnvictory/! You don’t need to read this email anyfurther. But I am aware some of you may be considering sitting this electionout, or voting for a third-party candidate, because you strongly disagree withKamala Harris about Gaza. This email is for you. Please read on. We have manythings in common. Like you, I am outraged by the suffering in Gaza: themassive and indiscriminate loss of life, the displacement of millions ofpeople, the deliberate destruction of hospitals, the use of food as a weapon,all of it. Every nation, including Israel, has the right to defend itself, andall hostages must be released now. But no nation, including Israel, has theright to collectively punish another people, including the people of Gaza. Butthat is what has happened, and like you, I believe American policy has notdone enough to stop it. Now to Kamala Harris. Kamala Harris has said she’s fora cease fire. She’s said she’s for more humanitarian relief now. She standsfor international human-rights laws, and she has the active support of membersof Congress who are insisting on the enforcement of international human-rightslaw. And she has publicly called out Rudy Giuliani’s violent rhetoric aboutPalestinian children at Trump’s racist Madison Square Garden rally. And as shesaid in her speech in Washington on Tuesday night, she will listen toeveryone, including people who disagree with her. I’ve known her for years, soI know from personal experience that this is true. On the other hand, DonaldTrump, who put in place the illegal Muslim ban as president, has said he’lllet Benjamin Netanyahu “finish the job.” Donald Trump, whose own chief ofstaff says he is a fascist, has promised to deploy the military againstconstitutional protest and be a dictator on Day One. So if you care about thepeople of Gaza — and the right to protest about Gaza — you don’t want DonaldTrump in power. Now I doubt any of you reading this email plan to vote forDonald Trump. But — and this is critical — if you sit this election out, or ifyou vote for a third-party candidate who will not win, you are letting DonaldTrump get one vote closer to power. Donald Trump in power will increasesuffering in Gaza and the world. If Kamala Harris is elected, we will havesomeone in the White House who will use the powers of the presidency toalleviate suffering at home and abroad, not increase it. Just as importantly,we will have someone in the White House with whom we can be in dialogue, notsomeone who will turn our country against us. Don’t take only it from me.Senator Bernie Sanders supports Kamala Harris even though he stronglydisagrees with current Gaza policy, because he believes that Kamala in theWhite House is the best chance to change that policy. Hear more:https://x.com/berniesanders/status/1851040553745432775?s=42 Georgia State Rep.Ruwa Romman supports Kamala Harris for the same reason. Hear more:https://www.rollingstone.com/politics/political-commentary/ruwa-romman-harris-dnc-gaza-uncommitted-vote-1235144105/ Nada Elmikashfi of Wisconsin, a SudaneseAmerican and Muslim activist and political organizer who supports the peopleof Gaza, supports Kamala Harris because she believes that supporting Harris —and not a third-party candidate — is the only way to keep Trump from makingeverything she cares about worse and harming far more communities than herown. Hear more: https://x.com/nadaelmikashfi/status/1851465420097585482?s=10And former President Jimmy Carter, who brokered the Camp David accords and hasworked tirelessly for more than 40 years for a comprehensive peace in theMiddle East that includes dignity, opportunity, and self-determination forPalestinians, supports Kamala Harris. I strongly encourage you to listen tothem. And finally, even as Gaza is first in many of our thoughts, even more isat stake in this election. Racial justice, abortion rights, climate change,and economic fairness: it’s all on the ballot, along with the very soul ofthis country. Trump’s racist Madison Square Garden rally leaves no more roomfor doubt about that. For the sake of all the people that would bear the bruntof Donald Trump’s deliberate cruelty, and for the best chance of building abetter future for the people of Gaza, the Middle East, the United States, andthe world, I am asking you not to sit this out: I am asking for your vote forKamala Harris for President and Tim Walz for Vice President. - Keith Preparedand paid for by the Keith Ellison for Attorney General committee, PO Box17224, Minneapolis, MN 55417 Keith Ellison for Attorney General PO Box 17224Minneapolis, MN 55417 United States If you believe you received this messagein error or wish to no longer receive email from us, please unsubscribe:https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/rnmAh_BZp0CUaBw6XYl7Xw2?unsubscribedata=2W3VAJdw0Km2QlWjWSNn5jILNXUrlnEvliKA4k45I5pVyuqoBa4Y3UFm3BhbuqHtqqYrTIxbuJjziosllmOXfejlaoFG7D3AFDxJQG93VgilTx6DNsKdZMq%2FC2O3PQ%2F7BSpw91OasYmadv2hVJ%2F4elgiqlhVrEn8xl2lKfAyhd87jzDY6fFGwvfYWo7%2BOwui6dGaOsBEWAoyDu%2BaV7KBvNKX8hASP2M4qjbsfyGIzPQ7TxfTZTFaQgp3IYTwE9WBLAlxcSLEA5OK5pJjTWRqM6PnUTx%2B%2BQtqhSH6S%2B5v6nmHFpYEVkzLQ0tDTItkioUCjKTmQHt%2Bg9VoP1RJTtAVnAuUK8ObOKuEtRLoGf9z8Vv%2B9lwyIdQN0jkW8gZoR6D0H3taZ70cUxj55pabsOMrgUZPOCStGYjYt%2B55QwokiuMqRzJHxx8BVU5cxIFJ4Thh.

name: Katie Porter
subject: What you can control
body: [ https://act.katieporter.com/go/10?t=1001&akid;=39253%2E3422442%2E4ZkRXw]Truth to Power PAC Derek, A lot is happening this week—it may be the moststressful week of the year. With the stakes so high, it is human nature to beworried, even if you can’t control what’s happening. Put that restless energyto work, and focus on what you can control. At this stage in campaigns, theonly thing that matters is voter contact. Here’s how you can help: 1. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ttp-em-20241101?refcode=em20241101-39253&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&refcode2;=39253_3422442_4ZkRXw&akid;=39253%2E3422442%2E4ZkRXw]Chip in: Your donation helps campaigns keep up their communications untilpolls close. Campaigns make projections based on how much money they thinkthey’ll raise; if they have a shortfall, they may have to scale back the paceof their advertising. [ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ttp-em-20241101?refcode=em20241101-39253&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&refcode2;=39253_3422442_4ZkRXw&akid;=39253%2E3422442%2E4ZkRXw]Donate to a campaign you care about, or chip in to Truth to Power to help usget our endorsed candidates over the finish line. 2. [https://act.katieporter.com/go/21197?source=em20241101-39253&t;=1002&akid;=39253%2E3422442%2E4ZkRXw]Volunteer: Knocking on doors is the best, most effective form of votercontact there is. If you have a couple hours to spare before Election Day,sign up for a canvassing shift or two. How many people we’re able to get tothe polls in California swing seats could decide which party controls theHouse. [https://act.katieporter.com/go/21197?source=em20241101-39253&t;=1003&akid;=39253%2E3422442%2E4ZkRXw]Visit mobilize.us to find volunteer opportunities near you. Even though I’mnot on the ballot this November, I’ve still been raising money and knocking ondoors for candidates in California I believe in: [https://act.katieporter.com/go/21197?source=em20241101-39253&t;=1004&akid;=39253%2E3422442%2E4ZkRXw][IMG] I know that elections have a way of making folks lose perspective.During my first campaign, I briefly thought that an unexpected package on mydoorstep could be a secret Republican tracking device. (It was actually myson, with my credit card, ordering himself an Xbox without permission.) Myadvice to avoid being overwhelmed: spend a day door knocking and then takesome well-earned time for self-care. Thank you for all you do—Truth to Powerhas only made it this far with grassroots supporters like you. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ttp-em-20241101?refcode=em20241101-39253&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&refcode2;=39253_3422442_4ZkRXw&akid;=39253%2E3422442%2E4ZkRXw]Please, if you can, will you consider donating today to keep us going? name: John Thune
subject: me and Bernie
body: Bernie Moreno for US Senate I’ve already transferred $4 million to help folkslike Bernie, but he needs folks like you to step up to take on a 50-yearcareer politician in Sherrod Brown. Peter, I’ve been crisscrossing the countryto do everything I can to help the team get across the finish line this fall.One of my most important stops: campaigning in Ohio with Bernie Moreno.President Trump and a Senate Republican majority will end the disastrousBiden-Harris agenda, but we cannot win a Senate majority without winning inOhio. Will you join me in supporting political outsider, Bernie Moreno?Bernie Moreno is the type of Senator we need in Washington. He’s lived theAmerican dream - and wants to make sure our grandkids have the sameopportunities he had when he came to America at the age of five. He hasn’tmade a career as a Washington insider - just the opposite. He’s anentrepreneur who built a successful business from the ground up. ThisNovember, we’ve got a great map—unlike anything we’ve seen in a fewdecades—and with high-quality candidates like Bernie, I know we can win backthe Republican majority in the Senate. But here’s the bad news, Peter.Democrats like Sherrod Brown are outraising us by millions. I’ve alreadytransferred $4 million to help folks like Bernie, but he needs folks like youto step up to take on a 50-year career politician in Sherrod Brown. Even just$10 can make a difference when it comes to the millions Sherrod Brown israising from every liberal in the country. We have got to change the courseof this country and put an end to the dangerous Harris-Schumer-Brownagenda—and that begins with doing everything we can to help Bernie Moreno winin Ohio and elect a Republican majority in the Senate! Thanks, John ThuneSenate Minority Whip Meet Bernie Moreno: Bernie Moreno fights for theAmerican Dream because he’s lived it. Bernie was born in Bogota, Colombia. Atage five, his American Dream began when he moved to the United States with hisfamily. Bernie became an American citizen at age 18. Through his relentlesswork ethic and untamable entrepreneurial spirit, he turned the first cardealership that he purchased in 2005 into one of the largest dealership groupsin America. In 2016, Bernie recognized the value and transformationalpotential of blockchain technology, before it received mainstream attention,and moved much of his volunteer time and investment dollars into the space. In2018 he co-founded ChampTitles, which grew to be quite successful as Bernieserved as Chairman of the Board. After a long, successful career, Bernie soldmost of his business to begin focusing on his calling: protecting the Americandream for another generation. Solving our country’s problems requires commonsense. In Washington, Bernie will fight to shrink government, protect ourfreedoms, stop the Chinese Communist party from taking our data and land, andalways put America First. Ohioans are done with politicians who talk a biggame and do nothing. Bernie wants to go to D.C. to get work done – just likehe always has. Join Bernie ➞ FOLLOW BERNIE ON SOCIAL MEDIA Paid for byBernie Moreno for Senate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hateto see you go: unsubscribe .

name: Ron Wyden
subject: Don’t let this get lost on you
body: I was horrified by the rally Donald Trump's campaign held over the weekend atMadison Square Garden. It was a hate-fest of disgusting rhetoric aboutimmigrants, Puerto Ricans, Black Americans, Jews, Muslims, and anyone the MAGAmovement deems their enemy. It also wasn't lost on me that House Speaker MikeJohnson attended and gave a speech, after which Trump later thanked him andominously declared: "our little secret is having a big impact, he and I have alittle secret, we will tell you what it is when the race is over." Whetherthat means Johnson is ready to legislatively implement Project 2025, orwhether he's planning to have the House deny a free and fair election, I can'tsay. But I can say that Mike Johnson giving his seal of approval to adisgusting rally and him being praised by Donald Trump as cooking up a secretplan with him shows that we cannot afford to have him as Speaker again comeJanuary. With only 4 days left, the state of play for control of the Houseremains as close as ever — and flipping the 5th District here in Oregon fromred to blue remains one of the biggest steps we can take toward gaining aDemocratic House majority. Polls have OR-05 a statistical dead heat, andRepublicans are launching one desperate attack after another to try and stopJanelle Bynum. We must ensure that Janelle has the resources to finish thisrace strong and beat out Republican incumbent Lori Chavez-DeRemer. So will yousplit $11 right now for Janelle and myself? We plan on leaving it all on thefield for this critical House race – one with major national implications.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/stand-with-ron-wyden-bynum-split?refcode=2024-11-01-jb&recurring;=&amount;=11&amounts;=10,30,50,100,200&refcode2;=f2be11d1-a798-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]Onward, Ron Paid for and authorized by Wyden for Senate. name: Debbie
subject: Donald Trump is upset I called Rick Scott a snake 😅
body: If you haven't heard about this yet, you need to, Peter. Earlier this week, myopponent, Rick Scott, was at one of Donald Trump's campaign events. That's nosurprise. He's everywhere Donald Trump goes. He infamously skipped animportant Senate vote to be Trump's lapdog in the courtroom for one of Trump'scriminal trials.Pathetic. Anyway, Donald Trump gave Rick Scott a very ...interesting shoutout: It's interesting how often Trump resorts to callingother people liars — when he himself is perhaps the most notorious serial liarin modern American history. It's no wonder he and Rick Scott get along sowell. Scott has lied time and again about his record of writing the plan toend Medicare and Social Security, about supporting a national abortion ban,and even about his Medicare fraud. Lies, lies, and more lies from the snakethat is Rick Scott and his buddy, the twice-impeached, disgraced liar of aformer president, Donald Trump. The TRUTH of the matter is that Donald Trumpand Rick Scott are scared of my new ad. They are scared because they know I'mstatistically tied with Scott in the polls as Floridians are beginning to casttheir ballots. They are scared we will pull off a massive political upset byflipping Florida blue.Well, Peter, they are right to be scared. We can winthis race and protect Democratic Senate control in the process, but it simplyis not possible if I don't hit my $10 million fundraising goal to fight RickScott's attack ads and reach every Florida voter. So please, rush a donationof $5 or whatever you can to help me hit my last fundraising deadline beforeElection Day, defeat Rick Scott, and protect our Democratic Senate majority!If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donationwill go through immediately: RUSH $25 IMMEDIATELY RUSH $50 IMMEDIATELY RUSH$100 IMMEDIATELY RUSH $250 IMMEDIATELY RUSH $500 IMMEDIATELY RUSH ANOTHERAMOUNT Thank you, Debbie DONATE Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This emailwas sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com . name: Orlando Sonza
subject: Sonza for Congress Newsletter - November 1st
body: Peter, this our final newsletter before Election Day, and it is a big one!Peter, this our final newsletter before Election Day, and it is a big one!This week, we were endorsed by President Donald J. Trump! With his support, weare ready to flip OH-01 and bring about the commonsense change SouthwestOhioans desperately need! Peter, with 4 days left, we can use some moreresources to get our message out to voters. $10, $20, $50, or $100 at the endcan be what makes the difference in such a tight race. name: Team Rosen
subject: BREAKING: ONE POINT DOWN
body: Friend, did you see the latest polling numbers in Nevada?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_email_1124?refcode=jtk5397-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 For months, expert polls showed Jacky Rosenahead in Nevada’s Senate race. But after Mitch McConnell’s super PAC swoopedin with a massive last-ditch $6 MILLION ad blitz – she’s now DOWN by just 1point with only four days until the election. We’ve always known this racewould be close. But now, Republicans are ramping up their attacks in Nevadaand Donald Trump is propping up Jacky’s anti-abortion opponent – and the tidesare turning AGAINST us. If Democrats lose in Nevada, it’s game over. DonaldTrump will become the president. MAGA Republicans will have control of theSenate. And they’ll have free rein to pass every extreme policy you canimagine – from their radical Project 2025 agenda to a nationwide abortion ban.It’s now or never and we don’t have a second to waste. Republicans areoutspending Jacky on the airwaves, voting is well underway, and Jacky’sopponent is SURGING. We’re desperately asking for your help to close thispolling gap. Will you PLEASE rush $5 or more to Jacky’s campaign RIGHT NOW tohelp Jacky get out the vote and fight back against the GOP’s attacks? name: Ted Cruz
subject: I’m standing alone
body: We’re in real trouble- here’s why We’re in real trouble- here’s why Peter,Here is the situation. Senator Chuck Schumer (D-NY) the powerful MajorityLeader for the Senate Democrats has directed his forces to inject millions andmillions of dollars into Texas to defeat me and flip Texas brightblue. Schumerhas said they will spend over one-hundred million dollars to defeat me. Otherradical leftwing groups and National Democrat Party committees are jumpinginto the fray as well-just flooding us with attack ads, flyers, and boots onthe ground… But here’s the worst part: The National Party is not coming tosave us. I am standing alone against this massive progressive onslaught. Weare getting almost NO HELP from Mitch McConnell. And the major RepublicanSenate Super PAC has no operations or ads running in Texas… That’s why I’mcalling on all grassroots conservatives from Maine to Marfa for help… RUSHHELP HERE >> The Washington DC Party Establishment doesn’t want a grassrootsconservative like me in the Senate- they never have, and their lack of helpduring the fight of my life is proof! I need YOUR help. Not because ourfundraising hasn’t been successful- we’re doing well, and thousands of Texansand patriots from all over are stepping in to give generously. Many are givingfor the very first time, while others have given every month this year. Butwith no air cover. I'm forced to ask for urgent help. We can’t lose Texas- andright now we’re in real trouble. STAND WITH TEXAS & SAVE AMERICA RIGHT NOW >>Thank you for standing with me. Ted Cruz DONATE >> Paid for by Ted Cruz forSenate 815 A Brazos, PMB 550, Austin, TX 78701 Unsubscribe

name: Hung Cao
subject: Knock knock knock
body: Knock, knock, knock. It’s the scariest sound you’ll hear when you live in acommunist country. It’s the last sound my parents heard when their fatherswere taken away. It’s the sound of always living in fear, and it’s my family’sreal-life story. We escaped from Vietnam just days before Saigon fell to thecommunists, and we were given a new life in the most generous country onEarth. America saved my life, and I dedicated my life to paying her back. Igraduated from the United States Naval Academy and served for 25 years in NavySpecial Operations in Iraq, Afghanistan, Somalia, and Pakistan and 40 othercountries around the world. I love this country - but right now, it’s taken adark turn. Now, the knocks are coming from Joe Biden’s Department of Justice.Sending two dozen armed agents to arrest a pro-life activist in front of hisfamily. Raiding gun shops and seizing records from law-abiding gun owners.Arresting his challenger in the next election. And he’s doing it all whilereal criminals are free to roam our streets. We are losing our country. Youknow it. But you also know we can save it. I’ve been all over the world.Believe me when I tell you, if America fails, there is nowhere else to go.It’s time to save America while we still have a chance. I’m Hung Cao, retiredNavy Captain, and I’m running for the United States Senate. If you’re all-into defend the greatest country on Earth, join our team today. JOIN THE TEAM -STAND WITH ME TODAY I still believe America can be the land of opportunity,Fellow Patriot. And as someone who owes their life to the American Dream, Ihave an obligation to fight back against those who have trampled on it. Weneed REAL fighters. Not politicians, not bureaucrats, and not keyboardwarriors acting tough in custom made suits. If we’re going to preserve ourfreedoms, we can’t be intimidated. We must be fearless. It’s time to fight forthe American greatness that lies within us. Join our team today - because Iknow you haven’t given up on America yet either. JOIN THE TEAM - STAND WITHME TODAY Let’s win this. In Liberty, CAPT Hung Cao, USN (Ret) Former NavySpecial Operations Candidate, U.S. Senate (VA) TEXT HUNG TO 21412 JOIN TEAMCAO! Paid for by Hung Cao for Virginia Use of military rank, job titles, andphotographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by the Department of theNavy or the Department of Defense. Unsubscribe.

name: Elizabeth Warren
subject: Your conversations with voters this weekend can add up to swing a whole state.
body: Warren for Senate: https://act.elizabethwarren.com/go/370?source=em-header&t;=1001&akid;=2404%2E4032634%2EAhE-I2 It’s go-time. If you’ve beenmeaning to volunteer for the Harris campaign, now is the moment. This is thefinal weekend before Election Day, and we’ve got two full days — or as theSwifties for Harris coalition would put it, 288 All Too Well (10 MinuteVersion)’s — to connect with and turn out voters. [https://act.elizabethwarren.com/go/2804?t=1006&akid;=2404%2E4032634%2EAhE-I2]Click here to see the best volunteer opportunities near you, and pitch in afew hours to help set the direction of our nation for the next fewgenerations. The work we put in this weekend will determine the outcome ofthis election. [https://act.elizabethwarren.com/go/2804?t=1007&akid;=2404%2E4032634%2EAhE-I2]YES, I'LL VOLUNTEER One conversation with a voter could determine whether ornot they make a plan to cast their ballot. A few ballots per precinct couldadd up to swing a whole state. And one state’s electoral votes could make thedifference between President Kamala Harris (it feels wonderful to type thosewords) or four more years of Donald Trump in the White House (you know how itfeels to read those words). This fight won’t be easy — but if we run uphillwith joy and courage in our hearts, we can get it done. As Vice PresidentHarris often says: “When we fight, we win.” [https://act.elizabethwarren.com/go/2804?t=1008&akid;=2404%2E4032634%2EAhE-I2]Take a look to see where you can get involved this weekend. Even if you’venever volunteered for a political campaign before, you’ll get all theinformation you need to be set up for success. If you’ve got time, we need youin this fight. name: Sen. Sherrod Brown
subject: I plan to win
body: Friend, with Election Day just around the corner, I wanted to take a moment tolevel with you: I plan to win this race. I plan to win to continue our fightfor the Dignity of Work, to protect reproductive freedom, to save SocialSecurity and Medicare, and to keep making progress for working families acrossour state and this country. Because whether you punch a clock or swipe abadge, earn a salary or work for tips, care for children or an aging parent,your work has dignity – and I'll never stop fighting to make sure that hardwork pays off for everyone. I plan to win for you, friend. But I can’t do italone – I need you by my side, especially now. Will you chip in $5 now topower us to victory? https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/sherrod-brown-email-wr-24?refcode=jtk3637-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 With just fourdays to go until Election Day, I’m reaching out because I urgently need thesupport of this grassroots movement. Senate control is on the line, and myMAGA opponent, Bernie Moreno, is leading me by 1 point in a new poll. You cantell who the folks in office answer to based on who funds their campaign. Myopponent cut himself a $4.5 million check and takes money hand over fist fromMAGA billionaires. He's in it for himself and his rich buddies. Me? I'mrunning a grassroots campaign with an average donation of $26. I answer to thepeople of Ohio – folks like you, friend. We can't let someone like BernieMoreno in the Senate. So in this final stretch, I'm asking you to help get usacross the finish line. That's why I’m personally asking: Will you chip in $5to help us defeat Moreno, win this race, and keep the Senate blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/sherrod-brown-email-wr-24?refcode=jtk3637-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Let's win, together.Sherrod -------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Eugene Vindman
subject: This wasn't part of the plan
body: Jason Crow For Congress [https://nvlupin.blob.core.windows.net/images/van/NGP/NGP21/1/88523/images/logoJC%20(1).png] Eugene Vindman is running for Virginia’s open 7th Congressional District. Eugene served 25 years in the Army and is ready to fight with Jason Crow to defend our democracy against Donald Trump’s allies. We hope you’ll read his message below, and then split a donation between his and Jason’s campaigns. Hi team — it’s Eugene Vindman. I had some things on my mind I needed to share with you. I never envisioned myself running for Congress. It wasn't part of the plan. But over the past 5 years — since Trump made that phone call attempting to extort Ukraine — the Republican party has shown the dangerous path they are willing to tread. And we have seen firsthand the threat that extremism poses to our democracy. So I launched this campaign because I needed to do something — I needed to continue defending our democracy in whatever capacity I could. Because our children and families deserve better than the extremists we have now in Congress, controlling the People’s House. I’ve only gotten this far with pure grassroots support. Support from folks like you. And I can only pass the finish line with you by my side. With only four days to go until the most critical election of our lifetimes, I am asking: Can you please split $10 between my campaign for Congress and Jason Crow's today? That’s it. Just $10. Because when you and everyone reading this email give $10, we will have the power to defeat our MAGA extremist opponent at the polls in four days and flip the House majority blue. name: Nella Domenici
subject: 📢 “Go out and vote Nella!”
body: Nella for Senate You need to see President Trump’s remarks about me and our campaign during his rally in New Mexico this week. “Go out and vote Nella!” Peter – this was just part of President Trump’s remarks about me and our campaign during his rally in New Mexico this week. I really want you to see the whole thing. Please check this out! WATCH PRES. TRUMP’S NM REMARKS » —Nella Domenici ABOUT NELLA New Mexico is Nella Domenici’s home. She was born in Albuquerque and lived for most of her childhood in a home near the intersection of Lomas and Monroe with her seven siblings, and her parents - Pete and Nancy Domenici. Nella began her education at Our Lady of Fatima, where she learned the values she holds today. Nella is a proud third-generation New Mexican, devoted mother of two, step-mom of four, and the wife of a Navy Veteran. Nella’s family’s roots run deep in New Mexico and she and her husband Pat enjoy their family home in New Mexico that they have owned for nearly twenty years. Like most New Mexicans, Nella Domenici understands the importance of hard work. She waited tables to help pay for her undergraduate degree from Georgetown University, and worked her way through night school at Georgetown Law while holding down a full time job. She then graduated from Harvard Business School as a Baker Scholar, top 5% of the class, while 9 months pregnant. Nella began her career at the bottom and worked her way up through the complex finance world, eventually serving as CFO for one of the world’s largest, most successful investment firms. In her career, Nella advised, invested in, grew, and led many companies, and served on public company boards. The industries she has worked in are vast and include areas such as health care, AI, food service, lodging, commercial real estate, mortgage lending, and consumer products. These companies have ranged from small family-owned businesses, to rapidly growing venture backed enterprises, to a Fortune 200 company. Several of these have been headquartered in New Mexico. Collectively, the companies Nella has been heavily involved with have employed thousands of Americans. Like her father and mother, Nella has been a warrior for those who most need an advocate: for women competing in academics or business, for families dealing with mental illness, and for those without access to quality healthcare or education. JOIN NELLA Follow Nella Online Checks can be made payable to Nella for Senate and mailed to PO Box 92918 | Albuquerque, NM 87199 Paid for by Nella for Senate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hate to see you go: unsubscribe .

name: Eric Sorensen
subject: Joe McGraw’s not from here
body: https://go.sparkpostmail1.com/f/a/BC7HApRelOllGnGi0F8mdw~~/AAUS1gA~/RgRpB--uP0QgaHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZXJpY2ZvcmlsbGlub2lzLmNvbS9XA3NwY0IKZxOxaiVnCRESGlIUZHB3aWxsaXM2N0BnbWFpbC5jb21YBAAAABs~Hi Peter, Here’s a fun fact you may not know about me: I was born atSwedishAmerican Hospital in Rockford -- right here in Illinois’ 17th District.Call me old-fashioned, but I think it’s important that we elect arepresentative who has called this district home for *at least* the majorityof their lifetime. This week, we learned that hasn’t been the case for myopponent, Joe McGraw. From WIFR: “The Illinois State Board of Electionsconfirmed the former 17th Judicial Circuit judge wasn’t a resident of the areahe would represent if elected on Nov. 5.” As someone representing my hometown,I’m definitely doing so with a heightened sense of duty. That’s what decadesof building relationships and absorbing local values will do to you, and it’swhy I always felt a deep sense of responsibility as a meteorologist -- helpingmy community understand the risks and make well-informed decisions. So maybethat’s why WBEZ reported that McGraw has been “repeating Trump campaigntalking points” on the trail instead of representing what’s popular in thedistrict – he’s not going to be fighting for us, but for his MAGA mega-donorshoping to flip this seat. We need support to make sure our voices come first,not MAGA. If you can, please chip in $10 to keep our momentum going. Let’s re-elect someone focused on IL-17 first. name: John, Campaign Manager
subject: It’s not too late
body: Peter, With Election Day just four days away, I know what you might bethinking: it’s too late to make a difference in Hung Cao’s race for Senate inVirginia. But as his campaign manager, I can promise you it’s NOT! Virginia’sraces are neck-and-neck down the ballot. The last few undecided voters willdecide this race - and right now, we’re on a race with Tim Kaine to reachthem. Hung’s message of saving the American Dream and defending our countryfrom socialism is resonating with voters. But Tim Kaine has us MASSIVELYoutraised, and he’s been able to blanket the airwaves and the web withdisgusting lies. Your contribution helps us run more ads, reach more voters,and set the record STRAIGHT in these final few days. Now that you know howyour money helps, will you pitch in now? Every dollar makes a HUGE differencethis close to Election Day. committee: Friends of Melissa Chaudhry for Congress
name: Melissa Chaudhry for Congress
subject: Reminder: VIDEO: Chaudhry calls on Smith to Step Aside
body: Email from Friends of Melissa Chaudhry for Congress ...and the cops are called! Plus, key ways to engage in the final push!! Melissa Calls on Adam Smith to Step Aside - and during this peaceful statement, the police are called! As we entered the final week before Election Day, Melissa Chaudhry issued a public statement calling on Adam Smith to take his own advice to Joe Biden, and step aside. Shockingly, the police were called on us as we were peacefully gathered outside Smith's federal office - paid for by our tax money, and legally required to be accessible to the public! Yet another example of Adam Smith violating fundamental American freedoms of speech and assembly - which, we'll recall, is why he was formally Condemned and Censured by the 43rd LD Democrats, earlier this year! Please watch the video below, and please forward to your friends and family. Whether they've already voted or not, everyone needs to know who Smith is, what he's done, and why we need to vote him out. In these final days, please do everything you can to help get the word out! Join us to canvass or sign-wave - events listed on the website here! Give the campaign a Like, Comment, Follow, and Share on social media - and make your own posts sharing why you're a supporter! Get in touch with your friends and family and let them know why they should vote for Melissa. Chip in financially to help strengthen the campaign in this final push! Remember, Melissa's campaign is ENTIRELY supported by individuals - not foreign interests, corporate PACs, or war profiteers! Why? Because she believes government should truly be Of, By, and For the People - and serve and uphold Liberty and Justice for ALL. Let's make history together and elect Melissa to Congress! Share This Email Share This Email Share This Email Friends of Melissa Chaudhry for Congress | 6727 Martin Luther King Jr Way S Suite M, #1117 | Seattle, WA 98118 US Unsubscribe | Update Profile | Constant Contact Data Notice

name: Jon Tester
subject: How I stay grounded
body: Can I explain something, folks? I grew up in a 24-by-36 foot house. I lostthree fingers on my left hand in a meat grinding accident when I was a kid. Iam and always will be a farmer, like my folks and my grandparents before me.In fact, I’m very proud to be the U.S. Senate’s only working dirt farmer.Every spring, I spend a lot of weeks working the stubble, getting equipmentready for planting, and out in the field seeding. Come summer, I am out thereharvesting. I maintain my own heavy equipment and deliver my grain in a truckthat’s a bit bigger than what any of my colleagues drive. I buy grease by thecase and seeds by the ton. I butcher my own beef. My wife, Sharla, and I workthe farm hand-in-hand. The task of scheduling my work in the Senate around theinflexible timing of farm responsibilities drives my staff crazy — but theyknow my farm work is non-negotiable. It keeps me, quite literally, grounded.And rather than spend my days hobnobbing with special interests, I rely onhardworking folks like you to power everything we do. That’s why I’mpersonally asking you to join my reelection team and split $5 between JeanneShaheen and my campaign today to help us defend Montana’s Senate seat.Anything you can give makes a difference.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/shaheen4tester?refcode=jtk3027-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thank you so much for sticking by me. I promiseto spend every ounce of time fighting for you and your families (when I’m notout in the field, of course). — Jon -------- This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Ben Ray, EMILYs List
subject: This is the only way
body: Peter, We've been giving you LOTS of ways to support Kamala Harris over thepast 100-odd days she's been campaigning. I'm writing to you today with onethat might surprise you: We have to make sure Democrats hold the Senate. CHIPIN TO SAVE THE SENATE >> https://secure.actblue.com/donate/el-q42024-em That'sright — the only way to enact a true pro-choice agenda nationwide, even withan EMILYs List woman in the White House, is to maintain the Democraticmajority in the U.S. Senate. Without it, obstructionist Republicans couldblock every pro-choice cabinet appointment and judge (or justice!) nominatedby a Democratic president. And yes, I'm looking at you, Sen. John Cornyn(R-TX). He's taking a page straight out of Mitch McConnell's obstructionistplaybook and already promising publicly that he'll block liberal appointmentsif he becomes the Senate majority leader next year. We've got four days left,Peter. Let's show Mitch McConnell, John Cornyn, and every other Republicanthat when we say abortion wins elections, we mean at EVERY level of theballot. Donate now to help pro-choice champions BEAT Republicans, WIN Senateseats, and DELIVER a pro-choice majority to the most pro-choice presidentialticket in history: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/el-q42024-em Thanks forstepping up, Ben Ray (he/him/his) Interim Vice President of Federal andGubernatorial Campaigns, EMILYs List ---- PAID FOR BY EMILYS LISTWWW.EMILYSLIST.ORG AND NOT AUTHORIZED BY ANY CANDIDATE OR CANDIDATE'SCOMMITTEE. name: Derek
subject: Thank you for standing with me
body: As things heat up for the final 4 days, I wanted to take a moment topersonally thank you. Thank you for fighting for the American Dream with me.An America where no one is limited by the neighborhood they grow up in anddemocracy is protected. Thank you for standing by me when Michelle Steel andher friends threw everything they had at us. You’ve stood by me as we went upagainst a warchest double the size of ours. We kept up with Elon Musk, CLF,and Michelle Steel’s personal bank account. Thank you for supporting me. Infive days, I have the chance to become the first Vietnamese Congressionalrepresentative of Little Saigon. Being a voice for my community means theworld to me. We are locked in the most competitive House race in the country.I wouldn’t be here without your support, but I need you to stand by me forfour more days. name: Mondaire Jones
subject: Just got off the debate stage for the final time.
body: Team, I just got off the stage for the final debate against Mike Lawler beforeElection Day. I couldn’t be more grateful for the incredible support you’veshown me leading up to it—and now, we’re pushing full steam ahead in thesefinal days. Will you rush a donation to help us finish strong, defeat MikeLawler, and take back the House majority?https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mj-q4-24-email I used tonight’s debate as anopportunity to speak directly to voters in the Lower Hudson Valley and sharemy commitment to fighting for working families, protecting women’s rights, andbeing an advocate for all New Yorkers. But we also saw Lawler play to hisfamiliar script: a friendly face for the cameras while trying to conceal theradical agenda he pushes in Congress. It’s time for real leadership thatrepresents all of NY-17. With just days left, I need your help to keep themomentum going. This race is neck-and-neck, and outside groups are spendingmillions to keep Lawler in office. Will you chip in to help me take this overthe finish line and flip NY-17?https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mj-q4-24-email Let’s do this, MondaireMondaire Jones is running for Congress to finish the work he started lastterm. subject: Democrats just dropped $1.3 MILLION on TV ads!!
body: Eric Hovde for Senate Democrats are panicked about losing Wisconsin andthey’re prepared to spend whatever it takes to defend the one seat that willdetermine who holds the majority. Peter, 🚨 🚨Tammy Baldwin just dropped $1.3MILLION on TV ads ALONE for the final 4 days of this race! Democrats arepanicked about losing Wisconsin and they’re prepared to spend whatever ittakes to defend the one seat that will determine who holds the majority. Theirspending is unprecedented. It’s purposefully designed to bury Eric indishonest advertising to regain momentum in this TOSS-UP fight. Help Ericfight back and protect his narrow lead in the polls by making an urgentcontribution of $25, $50, or whatever you can rush over immediately. name: Bernie Moreno
subject: Deplorable Nazi garbage
body: Bernie Moreno for US Senate It’s time to put an end to their hateful anddestructive hold on our nation. Fellow patriot, Biden thinks you’re “garbage”– but Sherrod Brown and his supporters think you’re worse... This is one ofthe biggest elitist bankrollers of Sherrod Brown, Kamala Harris, and the DNC.This is who Sherrod is beholden to and who he has to comply with in order tocontinue having his campaign war chest padded. Brown, Harris, and the radicalleft have shown us their true colors. They think those of us who disagree withthem –half the country – are deplorable, Nazi garbage... and worse! It’s timeto put an end to their hateful and destructive hold on our nation. We need tofight fiercer than ever until this is over. Can you chip in another $10 todayto keep our campaign cruising on the path to victory? For American Greatness!Bernie Moreno GOP Nominee for Senate, Ohio Meet Bernie Moreno: Bernie Morenofights for the American Dream because he’s lived it. Bernie was born inBogota, Colombia. At age five, his American Dream began when he moved to theUnited States with his family. Bernie became an American citizen at age 18.Through his relentless work ethic and untamable entrepreneurial spirit, heturned the first car dealership that he purchased in 2005 into one of thelargest dealership groups in America. In 2016, Bernie recognized the value andtransformational potential of blockchain technology, before it receivedmainstream attention, and moved much of his volunteer time and investmentdollars into the space. In 2018 he co-founded ChampTitles, which grew to bequite successful as Bernie served as Chairman of the Board. After a long,successful career, Bernie sold most of his business to begin focusing on hiscalling: protecting the American dream for another generation. Solving ourcountry’s problems requires common sense. In Washington, Bernie will fight toshrink government, protect our freedoms, stop the Chinese Communist party fromtaking our data and land, and always put America First. Ohioans are done withpoliticians who talk a big game and do nothing. Bernie wants to go to D.C. toget work done – just like he always has. Join Bernie ➞ FOLLOW BERNIE ONSOCIAL MEDIA Paid for by Bernie Moreno for Senate Don't want to receive anymore of our emails? We hate to see you go: unsubscribe .

name: Colin Allred
subject: All it takes
body: [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33435?t=1007&amount;=10&akid;=3178%2E52803%2EJbQVbr]Peter, I have an important question: Can you chip in a split donation of just$10 right now between my campaign and Angela Alsobrooks to help me hit mydaily fundraising goal so we can defeat Ted Cruz and keep our Senate majority?[https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33435?t=1008&amount=10&akid;=3178%2E52803%2EJbQVbr][IMG] [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33435?t=1009&amount;=10&akid;=3178%2E52803%2EJbQVbr]DONATE NOW → I am sorry to be so frank with you, Peter, but here's why that$10 is more critical than ever before: - Ted Cruz won by just 2.6% in his lastelection. - Experts are calling him the most vulnerable GOP Senator in thecountry. - A brand new poll has me UP 1 POINT against Ted. - And if we winhere in Texas, Democrats are virtually guaranteed to hold the Senate.Seriously, just $10 can make a HUGE difference to our grassroots campaign. Iknow it might not sound like much when you think of the tens of millions Cruzhas raised. But it adds up! If everyone reading this chips in $10, we'll reachour $500,000 daily fundraising goal in a matter of minutes, and we'll be thatmuch closer to beating Ted Cruz and protecting the Senate. So with only ahandful of days until Election Day, don't wait: [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33435?t=1010&amount;=10&akid;=3178%2E52803%2EJbQVbr]Will you give just $10 so that I can keep up with Ted's millions, reachvoters in every corner of Texas, and help Democrats protect the Senate? In arace this close and this expensive, I can't get to the finish line withoutsupporters like you, Peter. → [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33435?t=1011&amount;=10&akid;=3178%2E52803%2EJbQVbr]Donate $10 [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/33435?t=1012&amount;=35&akid;=3178%2E52803%2EJbQVbr]Donate Other Amount Thanks for fighting with me. – Colin Allred [https://act.angelaalsobrooks.com/go/89?t=1001&akid;=3178%2E52803%2EJbQVbr][IMG] We believe that emails are the best way for our organization to stay intouch with supporters like you. name: Erin Phillips, LCV Victory Fund
subject: Want to win in PA, MI, WI, NC, NV, and AZ? It takes organizers. And they STILL NEED you — please read this today.
body: To view this mail in a browser, copyhttps://links.messages.lcv.org/servlet/MailView?ms=MTE3MTM1NjYS1&r;=NjA3MDU0MTAzNTc3S0&j;=MjEwMDAyNjUwNAS2&mt;=1&rt;=0into your browser. Peter — I just got off a call with LCV Victory Fund fielddirectors in Pennsylvania, Michigan, Wisconsin, North Carolina, Nevada, andArizona — and I wanted to pass along an important update: Our team has nowknocked on 2,834,856 doors to turn out environmental voters in this election.The team needs you to know: → We are STILL reaching voters who are decidingbetween Trump and Harris. → We are STILL reaching voters who don’t know whotheir House and Senate candidates are. → We are STILL reaching voters whodon’t yet have a plan to vote. Our organizers are about to go into the mostGRUELING weekend of the election season — and it would make a HUGE differenceif I could tell them that you have their backs. So I’m asking one more time:Please, make a TRIPLE MATCHED gift to LCV Victory Fund to help us get out thevote in this final weekend >>https://links.messages.lcv. YOUR 3X GIFT >>https://links.messages.lcv.’m really hoping I can report back to our organizers just how many people areout there cheering them on — so please, even if it’s just $5, every bit helps.Here’s an example of the conversations our canvassers are having on the groundin swing states: One of our organizers in Michigan just told us about a voterwho had heard wild lies about how Kamala Harris had been locking up Black menfor marijuana infractions. We were able to set the record straight. We’rehaving hundreds of in-depth conversations with voters who need moreinformation every day — we HAVEto keep this up until Election Day, becausewe’re looking at states and districts that could be decided by a tiny numberof votes. Our team of canvassers is 3,000 people strong — on the ground inPennsylvania, Michigan, Wisconsin, North Carolina, Nevada, and Arizona. We’reworking nonstopto get pro-democracy, pro-environment voters in these keystates to turn out on Election Day. Tomorrow is the last day of our pre-election fundraising campaign leading up to November 5.If you’ve been waitingto pitch in, please — don’t wait anymore! A group of donors will 3X MATCHevery gift to LCV Victory Fund up to our $100,000 goal, tripling your impact.TRIPLE YOUR IMPACT: Help turn out environmental voters in PA, MI, WI, NC, NV,and AZ. Let our organizers know you’ve got their backs! Even $5 helps >>https://links.messages.lcv.org/els/v2/bxyvTVA~ YOUR 3X GIFT >>https://links.messages.lcv. know it will mean so much to our team if we hear back from you today. Thankyou for everything, Peter! Onward, Erin Phillips National Field Director LCVVictory Fund Paid for by LCV Victory Fund,www.lcvvictoryfund.orghttps://links.messages.lcv.,and not authorized by any candidate or candidate's committee. This email wassent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. If this isn't the best email address at which toreach you,update your contact informationhttps://www.pages08.net/leagueofconservationvoters/forms/ContactInformation?spMailingID=11713566&spUserID;=NjA3MDU0MTAzNTc3S0&spJobID;=MjEwMDAyNjUwNAS2&spReportId;=MjEwMDAyNjUwNAS2.Clickhere to unsubscribehttps://www.pages08.net/leagueofconservationvoters/forms/Unsubscribe?spMailingID=11713566&spUserID;=NjA3MDU0MTAzNTc3S0&spJobID;=MjEwMDAyNjUwNAS2&spReportId;=MjEwMDAyNjUwNAS2from our supporter list.Send us any comments, criticisms, or feedback heremailto:feedback@lcv.org?subject=, or just reply to this email! Thanks for yoursupport. 740 15th St NW, Suite 700 Washington, DC 20005 202-785-8683

name: Madi V. (Kean Finance Director)
subject: RE: Now or Never
body: With all the Halloween business from last night (Happy Halloween!! 🎃), Iwanted to make SURE you saw Congressman Kean’s FINAL call to Team Kean. 🚨Please read below and take action ASAP. It’s now or never. ----------Forwarded message --------- From: Tom Kean (iPhone) Date: Thu, Oct 31, 2024 at9:07 PM Subject: Now or never Friend, this is it. We are so close—just fivedays to go and we are just shy of $1K away from hitting our final goal of thecampaign. I am asking you to giveone last push , reach out to one morefriend, and help in any way to get out the vote. It means everything to oursuccessful campaign. Your support throughout this campaign is something I willnever forget. I cannot thank you enough for being part of this importantjourney. Let’s bring it home. title: Judge Joe McGraw for Congress - Final Stretch of the Campaign
description: Thank you to everyone who has contributed and supported our campaign. We're in the final stretch, but there's still work to be done. Please consider donating to help us get out the vote efforts as we approach Election Day.
source: Email from Judge Joe McGraw for Congress

Without your support, we would not havegotten to where we are today. Your support, whether you joined my team at thestart of my campaign or in the past few weeks has not gone unnoticed. Whetherit's helping us fill up the campaign car with gas, funding our get out thevote efforts, or helping us keep ads on the air, your support has gone a longway.https://click.email.judgejoeforcongress.com/?qs=cf86390fc711a73d9a69ac7229b8a224e52a9daeabcf5db72953679b7137a8fb9d31d2c2327f7d2b9138b7baa0003f917c61d15d277288e9c812d42b78957806Now, with just 4 days left to go, we're in the final stretch. There is so muchat stake in this election. Crime is out of control, grocery prices areburdening families, and the border crisis is wreaking havoc across our countryincluding right here in Illinois. Winning this race isn't just about flippingIL-17 RED. It's about sending a leader to Washington who will listen to yourconcerns, be your voice in Congress, and fight for you. I'm ready to get towork, but in order to win this race, I am hoping to get your help one moretime.https://click.email.judgejoeforcongress.com/?qs=cf86390fc711a73d9a69ac7229b8a224e52a9daeabcf5db72953679b7137a8fb9d31d2c2327f7d2b9138b7baa0003f917c61d15d277288e9c812d42b78957806If you are able to step up before Election Day in just 4 days to help fund ourfinal get out the vote efforts, I would be especially grateful. Thank youagain for all of your help and support. Thank you, Judge Joe McGrawhttps://click.email.judgejoeforcongress.com/?qs=cf86390fc711a73d9a69ac7229b8a224e52a9daeabcf5db72953679b7137a8fb9d31d2c2327f7d2b9138b7baa0003f917c61d15d277288e9c812d42b78957806DONATE Paid for by Judge Joe McGraw for Congress You are receiving this emailat: dpwillis67@gmail.com You are receiving this email because you signed up asa member of Judge Joe McGraw for Congress's online community.
