name: Senator Marco Rubio
subject: OH, MT, PA, NV, WI, NM, VA, AZ, MI
body: I’m personally asking you to chip in any amount you can to help them take onthe radical Left & win their races. 🗺️🗺Check out the map, Friend➡️                                                                                                                                                         🗺Check outthe map, Friend➡️ There are 9 conservatives running for Senate in each ofthese states. I cannot stress this enough: Friend;every one of them MUST winon Tuesday! I’m personally asking you to chip in any amount you can to helpthem take on the radical Left & win their races. If we drop the ball on this,the American Dream could beDOOMED! So please split a donation ten ways to meand these fine patriots: SPLIT A DONATION TO TEN PATRIOTS >> You can alsoget to know each of these candidates below & help them out individually!MARCO’S SENATE SLATE BERNIE MORENO (R-OH) As an immigrant who came herelegally from Colombia, Bernie Moreno lived the American Dream by turning afailing car dealership into one of the largest dealership chains in thecountry. Ohio is a must-win for conservatives to flip the Senate red, and thatmeans helping Bernie Moreno. DONATE NOW >> TIM SHEEHY (R-MT) Tim Sheehy is aNavy SEAL, aerial firefighter, and conservative running in another must-winstate for conservatives. He’s up against a well-funded career politician, sohe needs your help to win! DONATE NOW >> DAVE MCCORMICK (R-PA) DaveMcCormick is a former Army Paratrooper who’s fighting to renew America. He’stough on China and will do whatever it takes to create jobs in our country.Dave is essential to the fight to restore the American Dream! DONATE NOW >>SAM BROWN (R-NV) Sam Brown is a retired Army Captain who survived andrecovered from burns in an attack in Afghanistan. Sam's been through hell inservice to our country, so you know he has the resolve it'll take to restorethe American Dream DONATE NOW >> MIKE ROGERS (R-MI) Mike Rogers is a goodconservative and former law enforcement official. He’s serious about law andorder, and he’s ready to serve our country in the Senate! DONATE NOW >> NELLADOMENICI (R-NM) Nella Domenici is a wife, a mom, and a patriot. She knows howcrucial it is that we renew American energy independence and secure ourborder. DONATE NOW >> HUNG CAO (R-VA) Hung Cao came to America as a refugeefrom Vietnam as a kid. He joined the Navy and served his country. Hung knowswhat it takes to protect the American Dream and he’s the perfect man to defendit! Help him flip Virginia red! DONATE NOW >> KARI LAKE (R-AZ) Kari Lake isa fierce Republican who is up against a tough Democrat opponent. We need herto win if we’re going to take back the Senate! DONATE NOW >> ERIC HOVDE(R-WI) Eric Hovde is a family man and a true conservative. He knows what isat stake in this election and will not quit on the American Dream! DONATE NOW>> Don’t sit this one out, Friend! I need each one of these patriots to joinme in the Senate if we’re going to have any shot at restoring the AmericanDream! Thanks for your support, Marco Rubio Access Marco Rubio’s latest memo!Enter your phone number & zip code to unlock his latest message about thestatus of our country, where we’re headed, and how we fix it. UNLOCK THE MEMO!It’s Marco Rubio, and I know that times are hard right now in Joe Biden’sAmerica. If you can’t afford to donate, do you think you could endorse myAmerican Dream Team Candidates? They could really use your support andprayers. Thank you! ENDORSE MARCO’S DREAM TEAM >> Paid for by Rubio VictoryCommittee It’s Marco Rubio, Friend. I’m on a mission to restore the AmericanDream. I want to keep all of my supporters up-to-date on the work my team andI are doing. Please add my personal email, marco@act.marcorubio.com, to youraddress book to make sure you receive important messages from me and my team!If you don’t know how to do that, you can see how here: iCloud ,Gmail,Outlook ,Yahoo Mail ,AOL Mail Thanks so much for being on my team! 110130th St. NW #125 Washington, DC 20007 The appearance of U.S. Department ofDefense (DoD) visual information does not imply or constitute DoD endorsement.Privacy Policy Unsubscribe

name: Ritchie Torres
subject: why we fight
body: Peter, as we’re entering the final push of this election, I’m focusing on whywe’re fighting this hard. For families struggling to make ends meet, living inpublic housing on minimum wage, working multiple jobs to get by – who will behurt by the Republican agenda who will cut social safety nets to helpbillionaires. For LGBTQ children hoping for acceptance, who might be facingbullying and discrimination from their peers and families – who are beingtargeted by Republican politicians and Donald Trump. For people of color, whoare facing discrimination and attacks – ENCOURAGED by Trump’s rhetoric. Andfor our very democracy. So I’m hoping you’ll join me in this fight in theselast 4 days. Please, chip in $3 to help us cross the finish line strong, flipthe House blue, and elect Kamala Harris! »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3&amounts;=3,10,25]If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donationwill go through immediately: CONTRIBUTE $3 »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3&amounts;=3,7,10&express;_lane=true]CONTRIBUTE $7 »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=7&amounts;=3,7,10&express;_lane=true]Or a custom donation »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=10&amounts;=3,7,10]Thank you! I can’t tell you how much I appreciate your support. – Ritchie---------------------------------------- Paid for by Torres For Congress POBox 580303, Bronx, NY 10458 www.torres.nyc Ritchie Torres represents thefuture of the Democratic Party. Raised by a single mother in public housing,Ritchie personally understands the hardships that working families endure. Atage 25, Ritchie made history as the youngest elected official to serve on theNew York City Council. He fought tirelessly for the working families of TheBronx, and now, he's fighting for those families and for progressive values inCongress. He is the first openly gay Afro Latino ever elected to Congress.Ritchie is a champion for progressive policies to fight poverty and to improvethe lives of families just like the one he was raised in. name: Jane Fonda
subject: Let’s send these climate champions to Congress
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/kmr-email?refcode=email-header[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/kmr-email?refcode=email-header] Hey, JaneFonda here. With Election Day right around the corner, I’m reaching out to seeif you will join the Jane Fonda Climate PAC and PCCC in supporting a slate ofclimate champions in the final stretch of this critical election. I want totell you more about why I’m so excited to support these candidates, but first,can you chip in $20 to split a contribution for these candidates ahead ofElection Day?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pccc_2024_house_janefonda?refcode=email_110124_kmr-fonda-split] I’m excited to team up with the PCCC to support a slate ofincredible climate candidates running in competitive congressional races whoare committed to tackling the climate crisis, including standing up topowerful special interests like the fossil fuel industry. These candidatesneed our help: * Kristen McDonald Rivet is running to flip Michigan’s 8thCongressional District . In the state senate, Kristen helped pass ambitiousclean energy legislation to address the climate crisis, create clean jobs, andsave Michiganders money. She also secured funding to replace lead pipes andensure kids have clean drinking water at schools. * Dave Min is running forCalifornia’s 47th Congressional District . As a state senator, Dave chairedthe Natural Resources and Water Committee and introduced legislation toterminate offshore oil and gas leases and secured funding to improve beaches.* Andrea Salinas is running for re-election in Oregon’s 6th CongressionalDistrict . In Congress Andrea has been a tireless champion for our environmentand the well-being of the entire Pacific Northwest. She’s fighting for a cleanenergy future for her daughter and all Americans. In 2022 Andrea won by lessthan three points, so it’s critical we defend her seat this year. Corporatespecial interests and far-right extremists are pouring millions into theseraces to defeat these progressive climate champions. For the sake of ourenvironment and electing a pro-environment Congress, we must have their backs.Can you help us ensure these climate champions have the resources they need towin? Your support – whether it’s $5, $10, or $50 – makes a HUGE difference inbuilding a movement to protect our planet’s health.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pccc_2024_house_janefonda?refcode=email_110124_kmr-fonda-split] If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express,your donation will go through immediately: Donate $5 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pccc_2024_house_janefonda?refcode=email_110124_kmr-fonda-split&amounts;=5,10,25,50,100,250,500&amount;=5&express;_lane=true]Donate $25 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pccc_2024_house_janefonda?refcode=email_110124_kmr-fonda-split&amounts;=5,10,25,50,100,250,500&amount;=25&express;_lane=true]Donate $50 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pccc_2024_house_janefonda?refcode=email_110124_kmr-fonda-split&amounts;=5,10,25,50,100,250,500&amount;=50&express;_lane=true]Donate $100 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pccc_2024_house_janefonda?refcode=email_110124_kmr-fonda-split&amounts;=5,10,25,50,100,250,500&amount;=100&express;_lane=true]Donate $250 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pccc_2024_house_janefonda?refcode=email_110124_kmr-fonda-split&amounts;=5,10,25,50,100,250,500&amount;=250&express;_lane=true]Other →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pccc_2024_house_janefonda?refcode=email_110124_kmr-fonda-split&amounts;=5,10,25,50,100,250,500] Let’s make it happen. – JaneFonda xxhttps://secure.actblue.com/donate/pccc_2024_house_janefonda?refcode=email_110124_kmr-fonda-split[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pccc_2024_house_janefonda?refcode=email_110124_kmr-fonda-split] This email was sent to: dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Adam Schiff
subject: Trump’s latest attack on me: “The Adam Schiffs of the world, he’s scum, total scum.”
body: [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/62?t=1001&akid;=8120%2E5257348%2Eooc-pP ]Adam Schiff for Senate Derek, last night on stage in Arizona, Donald Trump told Tucker Carlson I was “scum” and fantasized about Liz Cheney facing a firing squad. I’m going to show you just some of the attacks from the day and then [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2907?c0=nov2024_abs_em.SALZ0e&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM3_V1_S1&email;=&t;=1004&akid;=8120%2E5257348%2Eooc-pP ]ask you to pitch in a donation of any amount to help defeat him on Tuesday. This has to stop. Yesterday he attacked me first from the rally stage in Albuquerque, New Mexico: “The Adam Schiffs of the world — he’s scum. Total scum.” Then he went to Nevada and came after me again: “Can you imagine that bum is gonna be a senator? Can you imagine?... He's a bum, he lied like hell, Adam shifty Schiff.” Then a third time last night with Tucker Carlson in Glendale, Arizona: “We deal with real scum. A guy like Adam Shifty Schiff. This is a really bad guy.” And at the same event with Carlson, Trump said this about Liz Cheney: “Let’s put her with a rifle standing there with 9 barrels shooting at her. Let’s see how she feels about it. You know, when the guns are trained on her face.” [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/1014?c0=nov2024_abs_em.7WX_lH&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM3_V1_S1&t;=1005&akid;=8120%2E5257348%2Eooc-pP ]Trump and Tucker Carlson Trump is incredibly dangerous — more vengeful and unrestrained than ever by the far-right Supreme Court — as he keeps up a daily drumbeat to contest the election results if he loses. He cannot stand that Liz Cheney and I investigated his lies on the January 6 Committee and are working day and night to unite our country behind Kamala Harris. We CANNOT let Trump’s lies and violent threats be the last thing voters hear before Election Day. We have 4 days left. [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/1014?c0=nov2024_abs_em.7WX_lH&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM3_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=10&t;=1006&akid;=8120%2E5257348%2Eooc-pP ]Please, Derek, rush in a donation of $10 or whatever you can afford to help defeat Trump and save our democracy before it’s too late. If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately: [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM3_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=10&t;=1007&akid;=8120%2E5257348%2Eooc-pP ]EXPRESS DONATE $10 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM3_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=25&t;=1008&akid;=8120%2E5257348%2Eooc-pP ]EXPRESS DONATE $25 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM3_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=50&t;=1009&akid;=8120%2E5257348%2Eooc-pP ]EXPRESS DONATE $50 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM3_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=100&t;=1010&akid;=8120%2E5257348%2Eooc-pP ]EXPRESS DONATE $100 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM3_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=250&t;=1011&akid;=8120%2E5257348%2Eooc-pP ]EXPRESS DONATE $250 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/1014?c0=nov2024_abs_em.7WX_lH&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM3_V1_S1&email;=&t;=1012&akid;=8120%2E5257348%2Eooc-pP ]ANOTHER AMOUNT We won’t get this time back. name: JD Vance
subject: Can I trust you to keep this confidential?
body: I just stepped off stage and I’ve got some troubling news. I’ll always keepit real with you, straight from the heart, just like folks back home would. Ijust stepped off the stage in North Carolina and my team gave me sometroubling news. Kamala is shelling out HUNDREDS OF MILLIONS in a last-ditcheffort to seize back momentum. She’s cashing checks left and right from theHollywood “elites” and corrupt special interests while you read this email.We’re talking about historic spending — with just 4 days until polls open! ButI’ve never been one to run from a fight, and I know you won’t either, Friend.If you join forces with every other PATRIOT in VA by chipping in just $10,we’ll have more than enough to take this fight all the way back to the WhiteHouse! >> GIVE $10 When you support President Trump, you aren’t throwingmoney at a Washington Elitist who only cares about themselves. You’reinvesting in your life, your family’s life, and the life of every Americanpatriot. So if you have just a few bucks to spare, please consider chipping inbefore we face the final FEC deadline of our entire campaign. >> GIVE $10 Ialso really hope you will pledge to donate again before the polls close. Itwould mean the world to me if you could pledge to give again. If you can’t,don’t sweat it and make sure you uncheck the first box. Thank you and Godbless you, JD Vance GIVE $10 Contributions to Trump National Committee JFCare not deductible for federal income tax purposes. All contributions aresubject to the limits and prohibitions of the Federal Election Campaign Act.Contributions from corporations, foreign nationals (i.e., without "greencards"), federal government contractors, and other federally impermissiblesources are strictly prohibited. Contributions made in the name of, orrefunded by, any other person are unlawful. Paid for by Trump NationalCommittee JFC, Inc., a joint fundraising committee composed of and authorizedby Donald J. Trump for President 2024, Inc. and the Republican NationalCommittee. You are receiving this email at dpwillis67@gmail.com Trump NationalCommittee JFC, PO Box 509, Arlington, VA 22216 donaldjtrump.com Thank you forjoining Team Trump. We believe this is an important way to reach ourgrassroots supporters with the most up-to-date information regarding PresidentTrump, and we're glad you're on our team. It's because of grassrootssupporters like YOU that we've been able to consistently call out the FakeNews media EVERY SINGLE TIME they've tried to spread misinformation oroutright LIES about the important work President Trump is doing to SAVEAMERICA. Reaching grassroots supporters directly is CRITICAL if we're going toSave America from the Left. But in order to do that, we need to providesupporters with the most up-to-date information on all of our efforts. TEXT"TRUMP" to 88022 to start receiving text messages from President Trump. It'sbecause of the commitment and support from real Patriots, like YOU, that wewill SAVE AMERICA! Thank you again for your generous support. If you'd like tochange your subscription status followthis link. Privacy Policy

name: Bynum, Janelle
subject: Our game plan
body: Team, in just a moment, I’m going to ask you to make a contribution to ourcampaign. Before I do, I wanted to reach out personally to let you know whythis request is so important. Here is the truth: Poll after poll shows this isgoing to be an extremely close race. Nothing is guaranteed here, and this raceis still anyone’s to win. My team and I are traveling across OR-05, meetingvoters where they are to reach as many Oregonians as possible with ourmessage. Our campaign is running significant programs across this district,and organizing communities on the ground and keeping our ads on the air isexpensive. Meeting voters where they are – especially those who may beundecided – will be the difference between winning and losing in just fourdays. You’re a critical member of our team, friend, and the most importantthing you can do today, if you’re able, is to make a donation to help us reachmore voters and run more ads ahead of Election Day. I am personally asking:Will you make a contribution of $10 today? Your generous donation will be usedimmediately to help us in this battleground district we need to win if we’regoing to take back the House.https://secure.actblue.com/donate/bynumq42024?refcode=em_fr_2024.11.01_b3_jb_all&amount;=10Thanks, friend. Let’s win this! Janelle-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Janelle Bynum is running to represent Oregon's Fifth Congressional District.With a reputation as a tireless champion for real progress, Janelle has workedin the State Legislature to safeguard our rights, lower costs, and createpathways to success for the next generation. body: Hey, team – it’s Mark. We’re now just 100 hours until the election, and let memake one thing clear, Peter: The momentum is on our side. We’re in the driver’sseat, but we need to keep our foot on the gas, Peter! Will you chip in $7toward our $2,000 final fundraising goal & help fund our critical GOTV effortsthrough Election Day? »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_takano_q42024_df?amount=7] CHIP IN $7 TOSUPPORT OUR VOTER TURNOUT OPERATION »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_takano_q42024_df?amount=7&amounts;=10,25,50,100]Peter, I would much rather be on our side than theirs. name: John Grisham
subject: Our nation faces a critical battle
body: Hi, Peter, I’m John Grisham. For decades, I’ve written novels that explore thecomplexities of justice and the human spirit. These stories are more thanfiction—they reflect real-life battles for fairness and truth. Today, ournation faces its own critical battle, and Montana’s Senate race is at thecenter of this fight. Jon Tester has been a beacon of hope and integrity in atime when those values are desperately needed. His tireless work has defendedthe rights of everyday people and challenged powerful interests that seek toundermine our democracy. But now, more than ever, Jon needs our help. Thestakes in this election are higher than they have ever been. Will you split acontribution between Defeat Boebert PAC and Jon Tester’s campaign to keep Jonin the Senate fighting for justice and democracy? Your support is crucial tohelping Jon win the most important Senate race in the country. If you'vesaved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will gothrough immediately: RUSH IN $25 RUSH IN $50 RUSH IN $100 RUSH IN $250RUSH IN $500 OTHER AMOUNT As someone who has spent a lifetime exploring thedepths of justice through my writing, I recognize the profound importance ofhaving leaders like Jon who fight with conviction for what is right. We’rewitnessing a concerted effort from those who want to roll back progress anddismantle the very foundations of our democracy. Jon’s opponent, backed bypowerful forces, represents a threat to the values we hold dear. That’s why inthis crucial moment, I am asking you to stand with Jon Tester. Your supportwill help him combat the enormous amount of outside money entering Montana. Bycontributing to his campaign, you are not just helping a candidate—you aredefending the principles of justice, fairness, and democracy that are thebedrock of our nation. Please split a donation today and be part of this vitalfight. Your support will ensure that Jon Tester can continue his vital workand secure a future where our shared values are protected and our democracyremains strong. If you've saved your payment information with ActBlueExpress, your donation will go through immediately: RUSH IN $25 RUSH IN $50RUSH IN $100 RUSH IN $250 RUSH IN $500 OTHER AMOUNT Thank you for standingup for what matters. Together, we can make a difference. With deep gratitude,John Grisham DONATE Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com . name: Hung Cao
subject: The end of the road
body: Fellow Patriot, I’m afraid we could be at the end of the road. I don’t mean tobe too negative, but Tim Kaine has a MASSIVE war chest, and I just don’t knowif we can overcome it. This is CAPT Hung Cao. I’m not a career politician likeTim Kaine. I’m a husband, a father, and a 25-year combat Naval Captain. I’malso running for Senate in what could be the biggest political upset inVirginia’s history I’m running against a 30+ year incumbent who has spent hisentire life serving Washington's special interests. Let’s just cut to thechase: I can’t do this alone. Can you pitch in to support my campaign? PITCHIN NOW I won’t lie, this is going to be an uphill battle, but I know thatwith you on our A-Team we can win this seat and take back the Senate. Our teamis gearing up for the upset of the century, and we want YOU to be a part ofit.Please, will you pitch in now to make sure we have the resources we need towin? SAVE OUR COUNTRY My wife and I are raising our children to grow up intohonest men and women, so you can trust that I’ll keep my promise to put ourCommonwealth and our country first in everything I do. In Liberty, CAPT HungCao USN (Ret) Paid for by Hung Cao for Virginia Use of military rank, jobtitles, and photographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by theDepartment of the Navy or the Department of Defense. subject: You need to know what happened
body: Tim Sheehy for Montana Please open this email as soon as you receive it today.It couldn’t be more urgent. We're going dark, Fellow Conservative - And itcouldn’t come at a worse time. A new poll has me TIED with my opponent lessthan a week out from Election Day. If you don’t already know, here’s whathappened. PLEASE LET ME EXPLAIN → “ "I SERVED AS A NAVY SEAL, BUILT ONE OFTHE LARGEST AERIAL FIREFIGHTING COMPANIES IN AMERICA CREATING OVER 200 MONTANAJOBS, AND STARTED A VETERAN-LED CATTLE RANCHING AND FEEDING OPERATION. WHETHERIT WAS IN WAR OR BUSINESS, I SEE PROBLEMS AND SOLVE THEM. AMERICA NEEDSCONSERVATIVE LEADERS WHO LOVE OUR COUNTRY. I'M RUNNING FOR THE U.S. SENATEBECAUSE OUR CAMPAIGN IS ABOUT SERVICE, DUTY, AND COUNTRY — NOT POLITICS ASUSUAL." Unsubscribe PAID FOR BY TIM SHEEHY FOR MONTANA Tim Sheehy is aformer Navy SEAL. name: Senate Conservatives
subject: Five Candidates for Freedom
body: We are coming down to the wire, and there are five conservative Senatecandidates who need your support. Please make a split contribution to theircampaigns now. Senate Conservatives Fund will pay all processing fees andtransfer 100% of your contributions directly to their campaigns. Time isrunning out, so please take action now. All of these candidates can win ifthey have the funds to get their message out. ► Businessman Eric Hovde isrunning neck-and-neck with incumbent Senator Tammy Baldwin in Wisconsin. Onepoll conducted by the Trafalgar Group even showed Hovdeleading by one point.Democrats have pulled their fire alarm and are pouring money into the state tosave Baldwin. ► Businessman Bernie Moreno is on the verge of defeatingincumbent Senator Sherrod Brown in Ohio, who has been a politician for overfifty years. Rasmussen Reports has Moreno up by one point, while theWashingtonPost has his down by one point. This is the best chance we've had to defeatBrown in years. ► Senator Ted Cruz is the Democrats' #1 target this year, andthey are dumping millions of dollars into Texas to turn Texas Blue. Hisopponent, Rep. Colin Allred, is a Kamala Harris liberal who is desperatelytrying to hide his record. The Hill/Emerson College poll showed Cruz leadingby only one point. ► Conservative former TV news anchor Kari Lake is surgingin Arizona and only trails liberal Ruben Gallego by four points. Butapparently, she's too conservative for Mitch McConnell, who refuses to spendthe party's money to support her. There's still time for her to win in a statewhere President Trump is expanding his lead. ► Army combat veteran Sam Brownis rapidly gaining on incumbent Senator Jacky Rosen in Nevada. Republicans aredoing exceptionally well with early voting, and Brown only trails by threepoints, according to the latest Rasmussen Reports poll. ELECTION COUNTDOWNSUPPORT SENATE CONSERVATIVES DONATE NOW Change in Washington means changingthe people we send there. Senate Conservatives Fund 300 Independence Ave SEWashington, DC 20003 Text SENATE to (877) 838-9388 to receive exclusiveupdates and invitations. Senate Conservatives Fund is a grassrootsorganization that promotes conservative policies and helps elect conservativecandidates to the U.S. Senate. SCF was founded by former Senator Jim DeMint tohelp the grassroots change Washington. Contributions to the SenateConservatives Fund are not deductible as charitable contributions.Contributions from corporations or foreign nationals lacking permanentresident status are not permitted. Federal law requires us to report the name,mailing address, occupation and employer for each individual whosecontributions aggregate in excess of $200 in a calendar year. Not paid for attaxpayer expense. PAID FOR BY SENATE CONSERVATIVES FUND AND NOT AUTHORIZED BYANY CANDIDATE OR CANDIDATE'S COMMITTEE. SENATECONSERVATIVES.COM Unsubscribe

name: Ted Cruz
subject: Texas Republicans are standing alone
body: We’re in real trouble- here’s why We’re in real trouble- here’s why Peter,Here is the situation. Senator Chuck Schumer (D-NY) the powerful MajorityLeader for the Senate Democrats has directed his forces to inject millions andmillions of dollars into Texas to defeat me and flip Texas brightblue. Schumerhas said they will spend over one-hundred million dollars to defeat me. Otherradical leftwing groups and National Democrat Party committees are jumpinginto the fray as well-just flooding us with attack ads, flyers, and boots onthe ground… But here’s the worst part: The National Party is not coming tosave us. I am standing alone against this massive progressive onslaught. Weare getting almost NO HELP from Mitch McConnell. And the major RepublicanSenate Super PAC has no operations or ads running in Texas… That’s why I’mcalling on all grassroots conservatives from Maine to Marfa for help… RUSHHELP HERE >> The Washington DC Party Establishment doesn’t want a grassrootsconservative like me in the Senate- they never have, and their lack of helpduring the fight of my life is proof! I need YOUR help. Not because ourfundraising hasn’t been successful- we’re doing well, and thousands of Texansand patriots from all over are stepping in to give generously. Many are givingfor the very first time, while others have given every month this year. Butwith no air cover. I'm forced to ask for urgent help. We can’t lose Texas- andright now we’re in real trouble. STAND WITH TEXAS & SAVE AMERICA RIGHT NOW >>Thank you for standing with me. Ted Cruz DONATE >> Paid for by Ted Cruz forSenate 815 A Brazos, PMB 550, Austin, TX 78701 Unsubscribe

body: This isn't good, friend: After experts said our race will decide Senatecontrol, Republicans started outspending us 3-to-1 to flip this seat. That's why he's asking you directly: Will yourush $5 right now to help us pull ahead, win this race, and keep the Senateblue? https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/sherrod-brown-email-wr-24?amounts=250,100,50,25,5&refcode;=jtk3804-fr-text With only two hoursleft until midnight, we're still short of our $3 million goal. name: Tim Sheehy
subject: We’re getting pummeled
body: Tim Sheehy for Montana Given the glut of outside spending on this race, it isnow costing our campaign $309 to reach a single registered voter. FellowConservative, If the most recent poll released over the weekend is to bebelieved, more than 23,000 voters in Montana have yet to decide whether theywill support me or my opponent, Democrat Jon Tester. With just four days leftin the race, we’re running out of time to reach these folks before they casttheir ballots. And that is not good news for us.In 2006, Jon Tester won hisfirst race by just 3,562 votes; trust me when I tell you that every votematters. With the Senate majority on the line, our need for further assistanceis immediate and as urgent as it gets. HELP ME REACH EVER LAST UNDECIDEDVOTER→ Given the glut of outside spending on this race, it is now costing ourcampaign $309 to reach a single registered voter.That means if we want toreach every last of Montana's 23,000+ undecided voters, we need to raise anadditional $7 million. When I tell you that every dollar counts, you know Igenuinely mean it. When I tell you that this race will come down to the lastvote, now you know I genuinely mean it. Please, can you help me get across thefinish line with a gift of $1, $5, $25, $75 or even $1,000 today. HELP MEREACH EVER LAST UNDECIDED VOTER→ For America's Future, Tim Sheehy Former NavySEAL Republican Candidate for U.S. Senate CHIP IN TODAY “ "I SERVED AS A NAVYSEAL, BUILT ONE OF THE LARGEST AERIAL FIREFIGHTING COMPANIES IN AMERICACREATING OVER 200 MONTANA JOBS, AND STARTED A VETERAN-LED CATTLE RANCHING ANDFEEDING OPERATION. WHETHER IT WAS IN WAR OR BUSINESS, I SEE PROBLEMS AND SOLVETHEM. AMERICA NEEDS CONSERVATIVE LEADERS WHO LOVE OUR COUNTRY. I'M RUNNING FORTHE U.S. SENATE BECAUSE OUR CAMPAIGN IS ABOUT SERVICE, DUTY, AND COUNTRY — NOTPOLITICS AS USUAL." Unsubscribe PAID FOR BY TIM SHEEHY FOR MONTANA TimSheehy is a former Navy SEAL. Use of his military rank, job titles, andphotographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by the Department of theNavy or the Department of Defense.

name: J. Carville
subject: One question
body: Folks, it’s James Carville here, and I have just one question for you: Do you care about what’s going on in Montana?! Every morning, I wake up and check the latest Montana Senate polls—and I’m telling you, this thing is tighter than a mosquito’s behind. So frankly, friend, I’m BEGGING—will you please split a donation to help Jon defeat Mitch McConnell’s handpicked candidate and win reelection? This is THE most important thing you can do today to defend the Senate >> https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_tester?refcode=jtk5615-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 I’m not kidding—this race is as serious as it gets. Newsweek is calling Montana the only real toss-up in the entire country, and Mitch McConnell and his rich buddies are throwing almost $90 million into this race. That’s more cash than Jon’s faced in every campaign of his life, COMBINED! And now I’m hearing Jon’s still falling behind on fundraising. Are you kidding me?! The only way he’s gonna pull this off is if more grassroots folks like you get FIRED UP and start giving right now. Not tomorrow. Not later tonight. RIGHT NOW. name: Team Kennedy
subject: Nominate Leaders for the Future of America
body: Be a Part of History – Nominate Leaders for a Healthier Republic NOMINATE OURFUTURE LEADERSYour Nominations Can Help Drain the SwampDear Peter,PresidentTrump, Robert F. Kennedy Jr., and the unity coalition need your help innominating individuals of integrity and courage for over 4,000 appointments inthe future Trump Administration. This isn’t the old system of backroom deals;this is your chance to shape the administration through the newNomineesForThePeople.com .Restore America’s Health and IntegrityThe MakeAmerica Healthy Again movement isn’t just about keeping our bodies healthy andtoxin-free—it’s about restoring the Republic by draining the swamp and endingcorporate influence. We can’t rely on the same revolving-door D.C. crowd. Weneed the best public servants our country has to offer—and we believe you knowwho they are.Nominate Someone TodaySubmit your nominations for those youbelieve should serve. These can be public figures, those you know, or evenyourself.👉 Submit Your Nomination Here Nominees are needed across all areas ofgovernment such as: - • Health, Food, and Agriculture - • Housing, Economy,and Environment & Natural Resources - • Education, Labor, Peace at Home, andPeace Abroad - • Technology and Government Efficiency Your input is essential.Please participate as soon as you can before November 5th to help rally andmotivate our community in these final days before Election Day. Yournominations will play a role in supporting Bobby’s work on the Transition Teamand within the future unity administration.Share This OpportunityEncouragefriends and family to join in—share NomineesForThePeople.com widely so otherscan nominate and comment on future leaders too.We’re excited to read yoursubmissions and to see the vibrant discussions around these nominees. Yourfeedback on the site is also welcomed!Thanks for being a part of this historicmovement to bring the people’s voice to Washington.Nominate Now atNomineesForThePeople.com Team KennedyMahanow.org ©2024 • Unsubscribe •Privacy Policy • Terms of Use • Contact Us PAID FOR BY TEAM KENNEDY -=-=-Team Kennedy - CA 90049, United States This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Eric Hovde for Senate HQ
subject: BREAKING: $1.3 MILLION in 4 days
body: Eric Hovde for Senate Democrats are panicked about losing Wisconsin andthey’re prepared to spend whatever it takes to defend the one seat that willdetermine who holds the majority. Peter, 🚨 🚨Tammy Baldwin just dropped $1.3MILLION on TV ads ALONE for the final 4 days of this race! Democrats arepanicked about losing Wisconsin and they’re prepared to spend whatever ittakes to defend the one seat that will determine who holds the majority. Theirspending is unprecedented. It’s purposefully designed to bury Eric indishonest advertising to regain momentum in this TOSS-UP fight. Help Ericfight back and protect his narrow lead in the polls by making an urgentcontribution of $25, $50, or whatever you can rush over immediately. RUSHEMERGENCY DONATION → $25 RUSH EMERGENCY DONATION → $50 RUSH EMERGENCYDONATION → OTHER Thank you, Lexi Ardis Campaign Manager Eric Hovde for SenateRUSH EMERGENCY DONATION MEET ERIC Eric's a fourth-generation Wisconsinite,born and raised in the Madison area. He's a serial entrepreneur. He foundedand managed his first business in his twenties and then went on to start andbuild many others. When he is not running his businesses, he is focused on hisfamily and his philanthropic endeavors. He and his brother Steve operate 10Hovde Homes around the world that provide shelter, supportive services andlove to vulnerable children. name: Tim Sheehy
subject: I prayed I would be wrong
body: Tim Sheehy for Montana Honestly, the money gap is so large that there is adistinct possibility that my opponent will block us on the airwaves. We'regoing dark, Peter - And it couldn’t come at a worse time. A new poll has meTIED with my opponent less than a week out from Election Day. If you don’talready know, here’s what happened. PLEASE LET ME EXPLAIN → “ "I SERVED AS ANAVY SEAL, BUILT ONE OF THE LARGEST AERIAL FIREFIGHTING COMPANIES IN AMERICACREATING OVER 200 MONTANA JOBS, AND STARTED A VETERAN-LED CATTLE RANCHING ANDFEEDING OPERATION. WHETHER IT WAS IN WAR OR BUSINESS, I SEE PROBLEMS AND SOLVETHEM. AMERICA NEEDS CONSERVATIVE LEADERS WHO LOVE OUR COUNTRY. I'M RUNNING FORTHE U.S. SENATE BECAUSE OUR CAMPAIGN IS ABOUT SERVICE, DUTY, AND COUNTRY — NOTPOLITICS AS USUAL." Unsubscribe PAID FOR BY TIM SHEEHY FOR MONTANA TimSheehy is a former Navy SEAL. Use of his military rank, job titles, andphotographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by the Department of theNavy or the Department of Defense.

name: Barbra Streisand
subject: No one has ever regretted getting off the sidelines
body: Peter, I’m an actress, director, singer, longtime activist, and, above all, acitizen of our great democracy. And as a citizen with a platform larger thanmost, I believe it is not only my right but also my duty to express myconcerns. So here goes Peter: I’m concerned by what I’m seeing in Pennsylvaniaand national Republicans’ ruthless efforts to unseat Bob Casey and flip thisbattleground red. If the GOP succeeds in flipping Pennsylvania red, they’llalmost certainly regain control of both the Senateand the White House,threatening everything from voting rights to women’s rights to the fightagainst climate change. That’s why outside interest groups have startedspending upwards of $150 million to defeat Bob. The stakes this November arehigher than ever before.So before I go on, can you please split a donationbetween Bob’s re-election campaign and Defeat Boebert PAC? DONATE NOW >> I’mcommitted to electing lawmakers like Bob Casey, who believes that everyonedeserves a fair shot at getting ahead and staying ahead. Bob’s opponent on theother hand is a Connecticut mega-millionaire who will do and say anything tohelp his own bottom line. With the most extreme Republican party of mylifetime teetering on the edge of regaining power, we need all hands on deck.If we’re going to protect our Senate majority and the White House, we must allstay informed and stay involved. So please, rush $25 or as much as you can toBob Casey and Defeat Boebert PAC right now to win in Pennsylvania. If you'vesaved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your weekly donation willgo through immediately: RUSH IN $25 RUSH IN $50 RUSH IN $100 RUSH IN $250RUSH IN $500 OTHER AMOUNT Thank you, Barbra DONATE Paid for by DefeatBoebert PAC This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com . subject: Senator Bernie Sanders is trying to save our democracy!
body: Friend, this vital warning from Bernie Sanders is a MUST READ for all good Democrats: “Democracy is supposed to be about one person, one vote, not billionaires buying elections. It's time to overturn Citizens United.” Our end Citizens United campaign is LOSING STEAM, we need you to step up now, friend: Chip in $7 before midnight on Saturday to support our work » https://act.fightforreform.org/go/56626?t=1003&akid;=22495%2E4449941%2E5qBTzQ GOAL: $8,200 | DAILY GOAL: $4,100 | DEADLINE: SATURDAY @ MIDNIGHT Senator Sanders hit the nail on the head. Billionaires shouldn’t be able to buy elections – we live in a DEMOCRACY and the American People should decide our elections with their votes! But unless we all step up, Dark Money-backed Republicans will steamroll our efforts to end Citizens United and we’ll lose our window of opportunity. So we’re joining Senator Sanders in this fight and calling on you to stand alongside us: Chip in $7 to help us hit our $8,200 goal to end Citizens United and support our work » https://act.fightforreform.org/go/56626?t=1004&akid;=22495%2E4449941%2E5qBTzQ Thank you for everything, Fight For Reform ------------------ Paid political advertisement paid for and provided in kind by End Citizens United Nonfederal, P.O. name: #6 Steve Garvey
subject: The most important week
body: What matters most right now is that we do whatever we can to fund a campaignthat can win. That’s the most important thing. Winning this race.                                                                                                                  Fellow Patriot,I have an important message that I didn’t think I’d be sending you today. Injust a moment, I am going to ask you to make a contribution to my campaign forU.S. Senate. November 5th isdays away, and I’d really appreciate the chance toexplain why this request — especially today — is so critically important.Here’s the truth: Right now, we have a week of media buys to pay for — themost important week of the entire campaign. And if we don’t raise what we neednow, we will be forced to give up the airwaves and let Adam Schiff and theDemocrat-machine backing him up run their attacks on me unopposed. Whatmatters most right now is that we do whatever we can to fund a campaign thatcan win. That’s the most important thing. Winning this race. Not just for thesake of winning, but because of what it would mean to substitute my presencewith Adam Schiff’s in the Senate. That’s a reality I don’t think any of uswant to consider, but it’s what will happen if we come up short. Now, time isrunning out. So, this is the part where I ask, one more time, and very humbly:Can you please use this link to make a donation to my campaign for U.S. Senatein California before Election Day? These emails are how we fund our campaign,and I really need you to chip in and help prevent us from falling behind.DONATE $35 DONATE $100 DONATE $500 DONATE $50 DONATE $250 DONATE $1000DONATE $35 DONATE $50 DONATE $100 DONATE $250 DONATE $500 DONATE $1000OTHER AMOUNT Thank you Fellow Patriot, and God bless, DONATE <> PAID FOR BYSTEVE GARVEY FOR U.S. SENATE PO Box 532389 Los Angeles, CA 90053-2389Unsubscribe here

Can I count on you to step up and help us? It will go a long way towardshelping us win and putting Colorado and America back on the right track. In just asec, I’d love to give you 5 reasons why this race is THE Senate race to watch,but before I do: Will you split just $5 between my campaign and UNITEDemocrats— just $1 for each reason below — to help keep this seat in Democrats’ hands?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ud_q42024_spl-alsobrooks?amount=5] Ifyou've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your splitdonation between Angela Alsobrooks and UNITEDemocrats will go throughimmediately: CONTRIBUTE $5 » [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ud_q42024_spl-alsobrooks?amount=5&amounts;=5,25,50,100&express;_lane=true] CONTRIBUTE $25 »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ud_q42024_spl-alsobrooks?amount=25&amounts;=10,25,50,100&express;_lane=true] CONTRIBUTE $50» [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ud_q42024_spl-alsobrooks?amount=50&amounts;=10,25,50,100&express;_lane=true] CONTRIBUTE $100» [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ud_q42024_spl-alsobrooks?amount=100&amounts;=10,25,50,100&express;_lane=true] Or a customdonation » [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ud_q42024_spl-alsobrooks?amount=25&amounts;=10,25,50,100] Peter, here are 5 critical reasonswe need to win in battleground Maryland: 1) Senate control: Mitch McConnellpersonally recruited Larry Hogan for this race because he sees it as his bestchance to flip the Senate RED. 2) Abortion access: A Senate controlled by theGOP would pull every lever at their disposal to restrict, limit, and outrightban abortion nationwide. 3) The Supreme Court: We need to defend the Senate toensure we can fill any vacancies with fair justices appointed by KamalaHarris. 4) A Democratic agenda: If we keep the Senate blue, we can prioritizethe issues that matter most to Marylanders, like combating climate change andlowering costs for families. 5) Stopping Project 2025: Sweeping wins for theGOP would pave the way for them to implement their authoritarian, anti-democratic agenda. And if they succeed with their plans, regular, everydayAmericans will pay the price. I could go on and on about why we need to winthis race, but I’ll just cut to the chase: Will you please split $5 (or more!)between my campaign and UNITEDemocrats to help me defeat Republican LarryHogan and keep Maryland blue? Your support is critical to fending off a GOPtakeover in the Senate! name: D.M.P
subject: don't 🗣️ mess 🗣️ with 🗣️ my 🗣️ people
body: Friend, did you see Rick Scott’s lies about me during the Copa América? Hespent SIX FIGURES of his own fortune to run Spanish-language ads on the CopaAmérica broadcast — the world's oldest continental soccer tournament — thatspecifically named me. And he just dropped a whopping $10 MILLION on ads totry and shut us out before Election Day. Not on my watch, friend. In response,my team and I are taking action with ads of our own — but unlike my ultra-wealthy opponent, I can’t keep them live without a massive surge of grassrootssupport to reach my FINAL $4 million goal ahead of Election Day. So please,friend, can I count on you to chip in $5 right now to help me expose the truthabout Rick Scott's lies?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk2467-fr-text LOOK: Rick Scott is desperate to be the next leader of the Senate GOP.And since this race will decide Senate control, he's not leaving anything tochance. He's proven time and again that he cares only about helping ultra-wealthy oligarchs like himself, having written the plan to END Social Securityand Medicare and RAISE taxes on middle class families. He even voted for anationwide BAN on abortions ... even though a majority of Florida voterssupport keeping abortion legal. And he knows his positions are fundamentallyunpopular in Florida — it's why he spent $64 MILLION to buy this seat in 2018,and why he announced a SEVEN-FIGURE ad spend to buy it again. But frankly,friend, I've had enough. Ya no más. I’m running to retire Rick Scott and givethe Sunshine State a Senator who actually cares about fighting for Florida'sworking families. But to withstand Scott's barrage of nasty ads and staycompetitive against his self-funded campaign, I can't afford to fall short ofmy LAST $4 million fundraising goal of the election. So, friend, before mycritical deadline on Nov. 5, will you please rush $5, $25, or anything you canspare right away to keep my ads live, put an end to Scott's self-funded smearcampaign, and flip Florida blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk2467-fr-text Thank you for everything you do, Debbie -------- This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Debbie Mucarsel-Powell
subject: The-Senator-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named ⚡🧙
body: Beware, Peter: Dark magic ahead! [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82099?refcode=em20241101-8587&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1001&akid;=8587%2E614464%2EzUf410]Rick Scott as Voldemort with a button that reads: Chip in now to defeat the-senator-who-must-not-be-named The-Senator-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named is slitheringaround the U.S. Senate, rallying his followers to help him hold on to thisseat. And they're ready to persecute ANYONE who isn't like them. [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82099?refcode=em20241101-8587&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1002&akid;=8587%2E614464%2EzUf410]With just 4 days left to cast our ballots and make our Unbreakable Vows, Ineed your urgent help to close the gap on my $10 million fundraising goal. Soplease, for some extra Hogwarts House points, will you chip in $10 between meand Lucas Kunce to help flip Florida blue and save our Senate majority? [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82099?refcode=em20241101-8587&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1003&akid;=8587%2E614464%2EzUf410]split a donation It's no surprise that in this final stretch, we're seeingsome dark forces come out from the shadows to pour MILLIONS into this race totry and buy this seat AGAIN. But we won't let them. I'm in the fight of mylife to defeat The-Senator-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named once and for all. And I cansolemnly swear to you, Peter, that I'm up to do A LOT of good in the Senate.But my opponent can't say the same. You-Know-Who actually wrote the plan toend Social Security and Medicare, raise taxes on the middle class, and co-signed Florida’s abortion ban. Unlike him, I'll fight every day to expandMedicare and Social Security, restore reproductive rights, protect oureconomy, and defend our democracy. And while I might not be a wizard, thatdoesn't mean we don't have the power to vanquish this hateful darkness andbring back some more good magic to Florida. [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82099?refcode=em20241101-8587&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1004&akid;=8587%2E614464%2EzUf410]Peter: I'm counting on you to have my back right now so we can defeat The-Senator-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named, end the night terrors, and win a better futurefor Florida. Will you chip in $10 before midnight tonight to split betweenLucas Kunce and help me reach my critical $10 million fundraising goal? Ifyou've stored your info with ActBlue Express, we'll process your contributioninstantly: [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82100?refcode=em20241101-8587&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=10&t;=1005&akid;=8587%2E614464%2EzUf410]Contribute $10 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82100?refcode=em20241101-8587&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=25&t;=1006&akid;=8587%2E614464%2EzUf410]Contribute $25 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82100?refcode=em20241101-8587&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=30&t;=1007&akid;=8587%2E614464%2EzUf410]Contribute $30 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82100?refcode=em20241101-8587&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=50&t;=1008&akid;=8587%2E614464%2EzUf410]Contribute $50 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82100?refcode=em20241101-8587&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=100&t;=1009&akid;=8587%2E614464%2EzUf410]Contribute $100 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82100?refcode=em20241101-8587&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=250&t;=1010&akid;=8587%2E614464%2EzUf410]Contribute $250 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82099?refcode=em20241101-8587&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1011&akid;=8587%2E614464%2EzUf410]Give another amount Thank you, Debbie This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Jacky Rosen
subject: Sorry to reach out again
body: Hi friend, sorry to email again – especially this late – but I had to reachout. I’m looking over our fundraising numbers for the day and, unfortunately,we’re still short of our $250K goal. Early voting just ended in Nevada, soit’s vital that undecided voters see our message between now and Election Day.My opponent’s attacks seem to be working, and recent polling shows my racenarrowing significantly – all while MAGA billionaires and outside groups arespending $75 million to flood the airwaves with lies about me. Long storyshort, we need to raise another $23,260 by midnight to keep our own ads on theair, or we’ll risk losing Nevada entirely. Please, can I count on you to chipin $5 before midnight so we can keep control of the Senate and White House?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_email_1124?refcode=jtk5138-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Thank you, Jacky -------- This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Jacky Rosen
subject: Can I be straight with you?
body: Peter – I'll get straight to the point: With polling showing me TIED 48-48with my MAGA opponent in my must-win Senate race in Nevada, the only way forme to fight back and win is with your grassroots support.So please, is thereanything I can say to convince you to split a $25 donation between myreelection campaign and Defeat Boebert PAC today? DONATE TODAY Would it makea difference if I told you that I'm the most vulnerable woman in the Senate?What if I told you that Mitch McConnell’s super PAC even announced anothersurprise $6.2 MILLION ad blitz for the last 2 weeks of the election to flipNevada red and defeat me – and that it's working? What if I told you thatthere is no Senate majority or Democratic White House without Nevada – and ifwe don't turn things around fast, we'll lose both? Democrats across thecountry are counting on us to win and defend this crucial seat, Peter.But withtime running out before Election Day, we're still falling short of our$1,000,000 goal. Only 10% of people open emails like this – and you're one ofthem. I hope I can count on you to take the next step by chipping intoday.Please, will you split $25 – or as much as you can – between my campaignand Defeat Boebert PAC to help me reach my important goal, win in Nevada, anddefend our Senate majority? If you've saved your payment information withActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately: RUSH IN $25 RUSHIN $50 RUSH IN $100 RUSH IN $250 RUSH IN $500 RUSH ANOTHER AMOUNT Thankyou, Peter. Your generous support is essential to keeping Nevada and theSenate blue. – Jacky Rosen DONATE Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This emailwas sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com . Don't want to receive these emailsanymore?Unsubscribe Defeat Boebert PAC,

subject: re: Trump tells swing states to REJECT votes?!
body: Vote-by-mail has been TREMENDOUSLY impactful for millions of Americans and ahuge win for voting rights.But after mail-in ballots helped DEFEAT DonaldTrump in 2020, he and the GOP are on a mission to DESTROY it!We need to knowwhere local Democrats stand: DO YOU SUPPORT VOTE-BY-MAIL?(https://act.protectvoting.org/signup/poll-vote-by-mail/?source=VPP_20241101_EMPOLL_E10_T0_AC_RS&t;=1002&akid;=17876%2E878179%2EUgMu0o)YES, OF COURSE! » (https://act.protectvoting.org/signup/poll-vote-by-mail/?source=VPP_20241101_EMPOLL_E10_T0_AC_RS&t;=1003&akid;=17876%2E878179%2EUgMu0o)NO » (https://act.protectvoting.org/signup/poll-vote-by-mail/?source=VPP_20241101_EMPOLL_E10_T0_AC_RS&t;=1004&akid;=17876%2E878179%2EUgMu0o)UNSURE » (https://act.protectvoting.org/signup/poll-vote-by-mail/?source=VPP_20241101_EMPOLL_E10_T0_AC_RS&t;=1005&akid;=17876%2E878179%2EUgMu0o)Look, if Donald Trump gets away with this, we risk THOUSANDS of swing stateballots going directly into the garbage.But if we step up, we’ll show DonaldTrump and his cronies that we REFUSE to sit idly by while they attack ourdemocracy! name: Michael Baumgartner
subject: You're invited to the Davenport on Election Night
body: Come watch the results and (hopefully) celebrate! ** Election night party at Historic Davenport ------------------------------------------------------------ Friends, Eleanor and I warmly invite you to join us in the Grand Pennington ballroom at the original Davenport Hotel in Spokane for a special election night party on the evening of Tuesday, Nov 5th. We’ve been on quite the journey these last eight months, and we are so appreciative of all your support. It would be wonderful to watch the results roll in and (hopefully) celebrate with you. Doors open at 6pm and I’ll be pleased to publicly address the gathering after results are known at about 8:30pm. Big thanks to Representatives Mike Volz and Suzanne Schmidt for hosting what is certain to be an exciting evening! Warmest wishes & I hope to see you, Michael Paid for by Vote Baumgartner for Congress | (509) 370-8398 | www.votebaumgartner.com Our mailing address is: Vote Baumgartner for Congress, PO Box 8508, Spokane, WA 99203 You can update your preferences (https://hotmail.us21.list-manage.com/profile?u=91b93e6889137ccb3f3fef037&id;=62bfedeea6&e;=5a45b9550e&c;=e9b00bc24a) or unsubscribe (https://hotmail.us21.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=91b93e6889137ccb3f3fef037&id;=62bfedeea6&t;=b&e;=5a45b9550e&c;=e9b00bc24a)

subject: No bodyguards, just me and the most evil dictator in the world.
body: Let me tell you a story about Kim Jong Un. ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ I'll never forget the day I stepped into the heart of darkness, facingoff against the North Korean dictator, Kim Jong Un. The rules were clear: notranslator, no armed bodyguard, no photographers. I was completely alone, withonly my convictions to guide me. But I wasn't intimidated. As the formerDirector of the CIA, I've stared down evil before, and I know that weakness isits fuel. President Trump's unwavering resolve had my back, and together, wesent a message to the world:America will not be swayed by tyranny. In thatmeeting, I saw something that the fake news media will never report: Kim JongUn was rattled. His regime, built on fear, was shaken to its core by theunyielding strength of American leadership. When America stands tall, theworld is a safer, freer place. But when we falter, the consequences are dire.Let me tell you a story about what it truly meant to have President Trump inthe White House, something the fake news media would never tell: CLICK HERETO READ THE FULL STORY SECURE LINK FOR Friend Make sure you never miss anupdate from Mike Pompeo and CAVPAC! Add info@email.cavpac.com to your addressbook! PAID FOR BY CHAMPION AMERICAN VALUES. NOT AUTHORIZED BY ANY CANDIDATE ORCANDIDATE’S COMMITTEE. 8136 Old Keene Mill Road Suite A300 Springfield, VA22152 Privacy Policy Conservatives Give PO Box 461 Fort Collins, CO 80522unsubscribe |manage data preferences

name: Abolish the Electoral College (via FFR)
subject: We need your help now more than ever, team
body: WE TOLD YOU our account for our Abolish the Electoral College Ad Campaign wasbone-dry… WE TOLD YOU experts are predicting that the Electoral College couldhand Trump the presidency again – without winning the popular vote! AND WETOLD YOU that Democrats like Jamie Raskin, Pete Buttigieg, and Adam Schiff arewarning us that the Electoral College hurts our democracy! But team, you musthave missed our messages, because you didn’t step up and we MISSED our goal torelaunch our Abolish the Electoral College Ads. name: Sent from Debbie's iPhone
subject: Just poured myself a cup — can we check in?
body: Good morning, friend — I just poured myself a cup of coffee and am eager towrite to you and get my day going! 🌞 I'll be honest: I need a lot of coffeethese days, and it's because I'm not sleeping much. Everything is OK, it'sjust that I'm a bundle of nerves and excitement in these final days of thecampaign, where we are so close to actually defeating Rick Scott andprotecting Democratic control of the Senate! I need you to know that we neverwould have gotten to a point where the polls are statistically tied, wherebrand new polling data has me leading by 18 points with independent voters,where Rick Scott is forced to spend tens of millions of dollars to competewith our grassroots movement, and where the major Democratic committees spendmillions of dollars of their own money to help us because they believe in us!Thank you, friend. A year ago at this time, the political pundits wrote offFlorida completely. We put Florida in play. We gave Rick Scott his notice. Weare on the cusp of pulling off the greatest political upset in modern history.But Rick Scott is outspending me nearly 3-to-1 on the airwaves — and he'salready spent over $38 million on ads to defeat me. Well, I don't have afraudulently earned fortune like him to tap into. I have you, friend. I havethis grassroots movement. And I can only fight back and win by closing in onmy final $4 million goal before Election Day. So please, will you make adonation of $5 or more to help me make history here in Florida? Whatever yougive will be put to work immediately to counter Rick Scott's attack ads,defeat him once and for all, and save our Democratic Senate majority!https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk2478-fr-text Well, there's another cup of coffee gone ☕️. I hope you have a great day,friend. I'll check in with you again soon! Debbie -------- This email was sentto dpwillis67@gmail.com. To unsubscribe from this email list, please clickhere:https://secure.ngpvan.com/p/7CGTHFDMeUWW_Wz2yFDujA2?unsubscribedata=P1zFER5zOvEUxWcXBvovzYjjmizZSLUVJc%2FmXu4AY7wOHh0DVnouEVJeEjJ4IPHFHCN1%2F3WJW4VNgKjv0ZrYpswWay8P08RISTC1%2FgO70Rk87%2BwE5LKMdVkXGlVAvUXTwuOoKF23w0e8vCGDMGIV5S5WwRBxWfWnlm8aWXP3Dtpz9VoxxSCDdpd4uT3Yy3f%2Bd1YswcmGzW9HBzIF8hFg14uJ7TnOxMRmxs7jjEf2tEADV%2Ff41q8PrwSkRkRWdEutKqhj%2B8zooBPOg1ecSedJLmKCFuUd8JSWLt7CszjoLtwu5RcJziKQKkfMi6P%2FHZvdVYxWsbI7c9iRFTlnRyTfVHg13zLflm02C9hy5H87LFOW%2Fzkw46IaAY9Hzl1QL7SKDsVYMzdWjz7uM%2B3p6J8omsuHk9WVYm6QWfszvMha33zFvE3GLv3n6kWoW5CHjU0FPaid for by Debbie for Florida. name: Tom Cotton
subject: November 4th
body: ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ Friend, my team has emailed youabout the final fundraising deadline I’m facing on November 4th. I’m notalone. Every single Republican Senator and Senate candidate is facing thisfinal deadline. And for our nominees in battleground states, it could be amake or break moment. That’s why I’m asking you to split a donation betweenthese candidates and my campaign ASAP. Tim Sheehy, who served as a Navy Seal,<> is running in Montana against Jon Tester. Dave McCormick, a fellow Armyveteran, is running in Pennsylvania against Bob Casey. Sam Brown, anotherfellow Army veteran, is running in Nevada against Jacky Rosen. Bernie Moreno,a proven business leader, is running in Ohio against Sherrod Brown. And KariLake, a tough conservative who will put America first, is running in Arizona.SPLIT A DONATION HERE If these tough conservatives win, it guaranteesRepublicans win the U.S. Senate. And I need each of them there with me to stopthe Marxist Left in its tracks, and to make America strong again. A donationof any amount will go directly to their campaigns, and *any amount* will makea difference ahead of this critical marker. As I’ve also said before, if wedon’t win in November, we’re done. So, if you can give at this time, don’twait.Help each of these tough conservatives before this final deadline, andlet’s win in 4 days. In service, Tom Cotton DONATE NOW Paid for by theNRSC. name: Tom Cotton
subject: Help five Republicans at once
body: ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏    Friend, my team has emailed you about the final fundraising deadline I'mfacing on November 4th.  **I'm not alone. Every single Republican Senator and Senate candidate isfacing this final deadline.**  **And for our nominees in battleground states, it could be a make or breakmoment.** **That 's why I'm asking you to split a donation between these candidates andmy campaign ASAP.** _**Tim Sheehy, who served as a Navy Seal,**_ is running in Montana against JonTester.  _**Dave McCormick, a fellow Army veteran,**_ is running in Pennsylvaniaagainst Bob Casey.  _**Sam Brown, another fellow Army veteran,**_ is running in Nevada againstJacky Rosen.  _**Bernie Moreno, a proven business leader,**_ is running in Ohio againstSherrod Brown.  _**And Kari Lake, a tough conservative who will put America first,**_ isrunning in Arizona. ********************************************************SPLIT A DONATIONHERE************************************************** ****** If these tough conservatives win, it guarantees Republicans win the U.S.Senate.  And I need each of them there with me to stop the Marxist Left in its tracks,and to make America strong again.  **A donation of any amount will go directly to their campaigns, and *anyamount* will make a difference ahead of this critical marker.**  As I've also said before, if we don't win in November, we're done. So, if youcan give at this time, don't wait. **Help each of these tough conservativesbefore this final deadline, and let 's win in 4 days.**  In service, ![Tom CottonSignature](https://e.trumptrainnews.com/rd/9z2zpat0rnacvfvftb0kgelmkh8kdao0nnd1d3oean8_rp22sh2s8i6epj0clgm8or6clh2bs) Tom Cotton ![Tom Cottonheadshot](https://image.e.redsparkstrategy.com/lib/fe2e11727364047c701278/m/1/e00c1b84-0119-43d1-ba85-27b9768a3c50.jpg)  ********************************************************DONATENOW************************************************** ******                            | Paid for by the NRSC. subject: Four Neck-and-Neck Senate Races
body: Mitch McConnell is stepping down as the Republican Leader in November͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  | | | ![Senate Conservatives Fund](http://e.goppresidential.com/rd/9z2z8k60ks19m8flig7ahks3qoovfigdqvjegstqcso_rp22sh2s8i6epj0clgm8or5cjh2bs) --- | ---  Mitch McConnell is stepping down as the Republican Leader in November and it'stime to build a conservative majority in the Senate that will truly fight forour values without making excuses.  **The best way to send principled leadersto Washington is to donate to their campaigns through the Senate ConservativesFund.**  You can contribute to multiple candidates with a single onlinetransaction, and SCF will pay all expenses and processing fees.  This willsave these candidates a mountain of money, so they can use your contributionsto win votes rather than to pay fundraising costs.  Here are the Senatecandidates who need your urgent support:  ✓ **Bernie** **Moreno** (OH) ✓ **Eric Hovde** (WI) ✓ **Sam Brown** (NV) ✓ **Kari Lake** (AZ)  **Pleasetake action right now by making a split contribution to their conservativeSenate campaigns.**  These races are neck-and-neck, so these candidates willneed funding until Election Day to broadcast their message and turn out theirvoters. --- | ---  ![kxjbvjnkshfsijlslkjdfojserljhlsijdlhsldijfsfd](https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/pub/bfra/bjo1adx3/kn7/y7p/nir/SCF%20-%20Head-to-Head%20Polling%20%28white%29.jpg) --- **SUPPORT SENATE CONSERVATIVES** --- **RUSH $250 →** --- **RUSH $100 →** --- **RUSH $25 →** --- | ---  **THE BEST WAY TO FUND CONSERVATIVES**  Did you know that candidates oftenhave to pay fundraising expenses that are over 80 percent of yourcontribution?  It's true. When you respond to marketing emails and textmessages from candidates, the candidates often get less than 20 percent ofyour donation after expenses.  That's why the **Senate Conservatives Fund**was founded – to give freedom-loving Americans an effective way to support thebest Senate candidates across the nation.  **Please contribute to these fourcandidates today!**  We will combine your donations with those made bythousands of other patriots and transfer them directly to their campaigns.Working together, we can build a conservative Senate that will truly advanceour freedom agenda.  Thank you for considering this urgent request and fordoing so much to help fight for America's future! --- | ---  **ELECTION****COUNTDOWN** --- | ---  ![motionmailapp.com](https://s.mmgo.io/t/C0G1/) --- | ---  **SUPPORT SENATE CONSERVATIVES** --- **DONATE NOW** --- **_Change in Washington means changing the people we send there._**  SenateConservatives Fund 300 Independence Ave SE Washington, DC 20003   --- ![U.S.Flag](https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/pub/bfra/bjo1adx3/mt0/8ze/f8c/US%20FLAG.jpg) --- | ---  ![kxjbvjnkshfsijlslkjdfojserljhlsijdlhsldijfsfd](https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/pub/bfra/bjo1adx3/guj/rh6/i5f/Build%20a%20Conservative%20Senate%20%28300%20x%2050%20px%29%20%283%29.gif) --- Senate Conservatives Fund is a grassroots organization that promotesconservative policies and helps elect conservative candidates to the U.S.Senate. subject: With every extra volunteer…
body: The ENTHUSIASM and ENERGY that the Turning Point Action team has seen from hard-working, patriotic volunteers is incredible. ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏  Friend, I've got HUNDREDS of patriotic volunteers connecting with Turning Point Action's CHASE THE VOTE efforts every single day. And for EACH new volunteer our Turning Point Action team can train and deploy, we expect 200 MORE BALLOTS to be chased! Friend, will you make your most generous gift of $20.24, $50, $100, or even $250 to help Turning Point Action recruit, train, and deploy our NEXT 1,000+ VOLUNTEERS to CHASE 200,000+ MORE BALLOTS? Help patriotic volunteers CHASE THE VOTE and WIN >> Above: Turning Point Action is training MORE VOLUNTEERS to CHASE BALLOTS and supercharge our CHASE THE VOTE efforts every single day. Friend, Turning Point Action's CHASE THE VOTE program is already CHASING 500,000+ BALLOTS nationwide. Now -- with our next 1,000+ VOLUNTEERS -- we have the opportunity to CHASE an ADDITIONAL 200,000+ MORE BALLOTS! The ENTHUSIASM and ENERGY that the Turning Point Action team has seen from hard-working, patriotic volunteers is incredible. In fact, our Turning Point Action team is training so many volunteers that we had to make extra room in a warehouse! See for yourself in the photo above, on the right. Will you help Turning Point Action recruit, train, and deploy our NEXT 1,000+ VOLUNTEERS TO CHASE 100,000+ MORE BALLOTS? Please rush your support of $20.24, $50, $100, or even $250 right away. Help patriotic volunteers CHASE THE VOTE and WIN >> Friend, this special program will SUPERCHARGE everything that Turning Point Action is doing to CHASE THE VOTE and WIN BIG! And, in the MUST-WIN battleground states of ARIZONA and WISCONSIN especially, every additional BALLOT CHASED could truly be the difference between WINNING or LOSING the White House. Please don't wait to make your most generous gift of $20.24, $50, $100, $250, or even more to help Turning Point Action SUPERCHARGE our CHASE THE VOTE efforts, with the help of PATRIOTIC VOLUNTEERS. Thank you for helping Turning Point Action do all we can to CHASE THE VOTE and WIN BIG this year. Together, we are doing the work to SAVE AMERICA -- and I am so grateful for YOUR support. Onward! Charlie Kirk Founder Turning Point Action Support Turning Point Action PAID FOR BY TURNING POINT ACTION (TPACTION.COM) AND NOT AUTHORIZED BY ANY CANDIDATE OR CANDIDATE'S COMMITTEE 4930 East Beverly Road Phoenix, Arizona 85044 Full Mag News PO Box 1177 Fort Collins, CO 80522 unsubscribe | manage data preferences

name: Tom Cotton
subject: Help five Republicans at once
body: ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏    Friend, my team has emailed you about the final fundraising deadline I'mfacing on November 4th.  **I'm not alone. Every single Republican Senator and Senate candidate isfacing this final deadline.**  **And for our nominees in battleground states, it could be a make or breakmoment.** **That 's why I'm asking you to split a donation between these candidates andmy campaign ASAP.** _**Tim Sheehy, who served as a Navy Seal,**_ is running in Montana against JonTester.  _**Dave McCormick, a fellow Army veteran,**_ is running in Pennsylvaniaagainst Bob Casey.  _**Sam Brown, another fellow Army veteran,**_ is running in Nevada againstJacky Rosen.  _**Bernie Moreno, a proven business leader,**_ is running in Ohio againstSherrod Brown.  _**And Kari Lake, a tough conservative who will put America first,**_ isrunning in Arizona. ********************************************************SPLIT A DONATIONHERE************************************************** ****** If these tough conservatives win, it guarantees Republicans win the U.S.Senate.  And I need each of them there with me to stop the Marxist Left in its tracks,and to make America strong again.  **A donation of any amount will go directly to their campaigns, and *anyamount* will make a difference ahead of this critical marker.**  As I've also said before, if we don't win in November, we're done. So, if youcan give at this time, don't wait. **Help each of these tough conservativesbefore this final deadline, and let 's win in 4 days.**  In service, ![Tom CottonSignature](https://e.youramerica.news/rd/9z2zipjmcrcs60r0ke102055ikjufalmvqnr95gqf0g_rp22sh2s8i6epj0clgmcob0c3h2bs) Tom Cotton ![Tom Cottonheadshot](https://image.e.redsparkstrategy.com/lib/fe2e11727364047c701278/m/1/e00c1b84-0119-43d1-ba85-27b9768a3c50.jpg)  ********************************************************DONATENOW************************************************** ******                            | Paid for by the NRSC. subject: No bodyguards, just me and the most evil dictator in the world.
body: Let me tell you a story about Kim Jong Un. ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ I'll never forget the day I stepped into the heart of darkness, facingoff against the North Korean dictator, Kim Jong Un. The rules were clear: notranslator, no armed bodyguard, no photographers. I was completely alone, withonly my convictions to guide me. But I wasn't intimidated. As the formerDirector of the CIA, I've stared down evil before, and I know that weakness isits fuel. President Trump's unwavering resolve had my back, and together, wesent a message to the world:America will not be swayed by tyranny. In thatmeeting, I saw something that the fake news media will never report: Kim JongUn was rattled. His regime, built on fear, was shaken to its core by theunyielding strength of American leadership. When America stands tall, theworld is a safer, freer place. But when we falter, the consequences are dire.Let me tell you a story about what it truly meant to have President Trump inthe White House, something the fake news media would never tell: CLICK HERETO READ THE FULL STORY SECURE LINK FOR Friend Make sure you never miss anupdate from Mike Pompeo and CAVPAC! Add info@email.cavpac.com to your addressbook! PAID FOR BY CHAMPION AMERICAN VALUES. NOT AUTHORIZED BY ANY CANDIDATE ORCANDIDATE’S COMMITTEE. 8136 Old Keene Mill Road Suite A300 Springfield, VA22152 Privacy Policy Conservative Liberty Wire PO Box 1188 Fort Collins, CO80522 unsubscribe |manage data preferences

name: Colin (personal)
subject: asking for five bucks
body: Peter, I'm going to be blunt: I need you to chip in five bucks. We have toraise $500,000 every single day to keep up with Ted Cruz and his wealthyextremist donors. I simply can't do that without your help. Will you pleasesplit a $5 donation between my campaign and Defeat Boebert PAC to help medefeat Ted Cruz and protect our Democratic Senate majority CHIP IN $5 If wewin this race, I will work in the Senate to prevent a national abortion ban,protect our democracy, and fight against attacks on Social Security andMedicare. And polls show we can win – three in a row have me statisticallytied with Ted Cruz. But I’m not taking corporate PAC money like he is. I’mrelying on grassroots donors like you to power my campaign, which means wehave to hit every single goal. Today we’re falling $361,322 short, which iswhy I’m humbly asking, one more time: Will you please chip in a split donationof $5 between my campaign and Defeat Boebert PAC? subject: Following up re: voter outreach
body: AOTL logo[https://nvlupin.blob.core.windows.net/images/van/EA/EA013/1/89296/images/email-theme/aotl-navy.png] Peter, since we first reached out about All On The Line’svoter outreach last week, our teams have sent thousands more texts to keystates. But with voters casting their ballots even as I write this, we must doeverything we can to keep this program going in the final days of thiselection. Together, we’ve sentover one million texts to empower voters across key battleground states. Fromrecruiting poll workers to ensuring voter registrations are up to date, ouroutreach is driving real change! Just look at these numbers: All On The LineBattleground Outreach Get Out The Vote Texts – 1,000,000+ Poll WorkersRecruited – 6,800+ Voter Registrations Checked and Ballots Requested – 650+Every text we send costs a bit of money and requires a lot of support. This isa great time to chip in $5 or more. Make your gift to help support this workand everything we do going strong in the final days of the election — and helpus prepare for everything that comes after Nov. 5. →https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ehh-cavalry?refcode=don_aotl_redite_email_TxtTop_email_20241101-AOTL-RedLite-TxtTop_&utm;_source=email&utm;_medium=email&utm;_term=don&utm;_content=20241101-AOTL-RedLite-TxtTop_&utm;_campaign=TxtTop DONATE →https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ehh-cavalry?refcode=don_aotl_redite_email_TxtTop_email_20241101-AOTL-RedLite-TxtTop_&utm;_source=email&utm;_medium=email&utm;_term=don&utm;_content=20241101-AOTL-RedLite-TxtTop_&utm;_campaign=TxtTop Creating fair maps affects all the issueswe care about: Reproductive freedom. Common sense gun laws. Climate action.That’s why we built this state-by-state strategy. Our grassroots team ishelping get out the vote and showing folks just what’s at stake in thesestates like these: * Pennsylvania is the only state in the country with adivided legislature — Democrats hold the state house and Republicans the statesenate. Both chambers are toss-ups, and whether pro-democracy candidates areelected could decide whether we have a path to redistricting reform. * InArizona we’re mobilizing against a ballot initiative that would essentiallyend term limits for state supreme court and appellate court judges — includingthose already serving. * Michigan voters passed a ballot initiative to createa fair redistricting process. But extremists are trying to take back the statehouse — and if they win, they could plan harmful changes to the state’sindependent redistricting commission. This is a movement of millions ofAmericans, across all 50 states, committed to making our elected officialsmore responsive to the people they represent. Every dollar you give helpsbuild our momentum in key states when it matters most. subject: Donald Trump wants to STOP Jack Smith?!!!
body: We’re FURIOUS: Trump says he’d ‘fire’ special counsel Jack Smith in ‘twoseconds’ if elected again Thanks to Smith’s meticulous investigation, Trump iscloser than EVER to being held accountable for his laundry list of crimes!YES! So Trump is threatening to take matters into his own hands if he wins inNovember and END the investigation once and for all. We need to showoverwhelming public support for Smith to protect him from MAGA retribution andsave this investigation.
