subject: No bodyguards, just me and the most evil dictator in the world.
body: Let me tell you a story about Kim Jong Un. ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ I'll never forget the day I stepped into the heart of darkness, facingoff against the North Korean dictator, Kim Jong Un. The rules were clear: notranslator, no armed bodyguard, no photographers. I was completely alone, withonly my convictions to guide me. But I wasn't intimidated. As the formerDirector of the CIA, I've stared down evil before, and I know that weakness isits fuel. President Trump's unwavering resolve had my back, and together, wesent a message to the world:America will not be swayed by tyranny. In thatmeeting, I saw something that the fake news media will never report: Kim JongUn was rattled. His regime, built on fear, was shaken to its core by theunyielding strength of American leadership. When America stands tall, theworld is a safer, freer place. But when we falter, the consequences are dire.Let me tell you a story about what it truly meant to have President Trump inthe White House, something the fake news media would never tell: CLICK HERETO READ THE FULL STORY SECURE LINK FOR Friend Make sure you never miss anupdate from Mike Pompeo and CAVPAC! name: Team Tester
subject: I just made a tough decision
body: Hello—it’s Shelbi, Jon Tester’s Campaign Manager. I just made a tough decision that you need to hear about immediately. According to several recent reports, Tim Sheehy lied about his military service. 1. On the campaign trail, Sheehy claimed he had a gunshot wound in his arm from combat. But according to the New York Times, public records, and firsthand accounts—including a Navy SEAL who served with Sheehy—his gunshot wound was from accidentally shooting himself in the arm in Glacier National Park. 2. Days later, NBC News released another bombshell report stating Sheehy lied about being “medically discharged” from the Navy. It’s shocking—and Montanans must know the truth but we’re running out of time. So I made the difficult decision to launch more television and digital ads today. The money isn’t in the budget yet—but with polls in the margin of error, running these final ads could be enough to break the tie in Jon’s favor and win this race. I need you to split an immediate donation to help us fund these last-minute ads. How you respond right now could be the difference between winning and losing. https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_tester?refcode=jtk5618-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Every time I take a risk on this campaign, it’s because I believe in this team. I’m confident grassroots supporters like you—who’ve stepped up time and time again—will help us win this Senate race. With just 3 days until Election Day, Jon and our team need you now more than ever. Thank you, Shelbi Campaign Manager Team Tester -------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Debbie (1 unread)
subject: re: Trump and Scott
body: It's plain to see, friend: Rick Scott is TERRIFIED of our movement — and hehas every reason to be: Based on his all-time-low approval rating at 35%, andKamala Harris now polling within the margin of error against Trump in Florida,it's clear that Florida voters are sick and tired of both the right-wingmovement and its most loyal puppets, like Scott. And it's no coincidence —since his election in 2018, Rick Scott's been nothing more than a rubber stampfor anything and everything Donald Trump wants: * Trump's SCOTUS nominees *Trump's dangerous agenda * Trump's baseless voter fraud claims * Trump'srefusal to certify Biden's victory * Rubber stamp after rubber stamp afterrubber stamp If both Trump and Scott are reelected in November, they couldconspire to move the Supreme Court even further to the right. Scott could bein charge of the Senate as majority leader, and with Trump unchecked by anycriminal culpability for his official acts as president, they could unleashthe most dangerous, extremist agenda yet on the American people. I refuse tolet that happen. Listen, nothing less than our democracy is at stake when itcomes to defeating Rick "Rubber Stamp" Scott this November. But just as he didlast time around, Scott is already shelling out millions from his own personalfortune to buy this Senate seat. He's already spent over $38 million on ads todefeat me as polling shows us in a statistical dead heat! Rick Scott isscared, plain and simple. And he should be. He's one of the most vulnerableGOP senators on the ballot, and with your grassroots support, we will defeathim. But I'm still falling short of my LAST $4 MILLION fundraising goal — agoal we MUST hit by Nov. 5. So please, will you help me close this fundraisinggap and fight back by rushing a donation of $5 or more? We can and must defeatRick Scott and Donald Trump, and it's YOUR donation that will make itpossible. name: Jon Tester
subject: The Senate’s only seven-fingered farmer
body: Hey Peter, it’s Jon Tester. I need your support to get our message in front ofas many voters as possible. So I’m humbly asking: [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82128?refcode=em20241102-8588&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=7&t;=1001&akid;=8588%2E614464%2Eog3zj6]Can you split $7 with Lucas Kunce today to reelect the Senate’s only seven-fingered dirt farmer? [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82128?refcode=em20241102-8588&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1002&akid;=8588%2E614464%2Eog3zj6]Jon Tester smiling and holding up hands [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82128?refcode=em20241102-8588&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=7&t;=1003&akid;=8588%2E614464%2Eog3zj6]donate $7 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82128?refcode=em20241102-8588&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1004&akid;=8588%2E614464%2Eog3zj6]other amount Here are 7 reasons why your donation today is so important(that’s one for every finger!): 1. Newsweek ranks this race a toss-up, whichmeans your gift will have a huge impact on our ability to raise the resourceswe need to win. 2. Tim Sheehy is wrong for Montana. He wants to privatizehealth care, transfer off our public lands, and wants to ban abortion. 3.Mitch McConnell is desperate to beat me. He named me one of his top targets,and outside groups are spending millions to pummel me with attacks. 4. Theirattacks are working. The polls have tightened into a statistical tie, and thisrace couldn’t be any closer—[https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82128?refcode=em20241102-8588&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=7&t;=1005&akid;=8588%2E614464%2Eog3zj6]your $7 will help us pull ahead. 5. I won my first Senate race by just 3,562votes…and this election could be even closer. 6. Montanans are voting as wespeak, and we’re falling behind on our fundraising. If we can’t afford to keepour ads up, our opponent’s attacks will drown us out just as voting begins. 7.We can’t win without you. [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82128?refcode=em20241102-8588&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=7&t;=1006&akid;=8588%2E614464%2Eog3zj6]If every person reading this split a donation of $7, we’d have the resourceswe need to overcome the attacks, break our tie in the polls, and win thisrace. But not everyone will, so I’m asking you personally: [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82128?refcode=em20241102-8588&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=7&t;=1007&akid;=8588%2E614464%2Eog3zj6]Can I count on you to chip in $7 or more? Your support today could mean thedifference between victory and defeat. If you've stored your info with ActBlueExpress, we'll process your contribution instantly: [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82129?refcode=em20241102-8588&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=10&t;=1008&akid;=8588%2E614464%2Eog3zj6]Contribute $10 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82129?refcode=em20241102-8588&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=25&t;=1009&akid;=8588%2E614464%2Eog3zj6]Contribute $25 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82129?refcode=em20241102-8588&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=30&t;=1010&akid;=8588%2E614464%2Eog3zj6]Contribute $30 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82129?refcode=em20241102-8588&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=50&t;=1011&akid;=8588%2E614464%2Eog3zj6]Contribute $50 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82129?refcode=em20241102-8588&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=100&t;=1012&akid;=8588%2E614464%2Eog3zj6]Contribute $100 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82129?refcode=em20241102-8588&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=250&t;=1013&akid;=8588%2E614464%2Eog3zj6]Contribute $250 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82128?refcode=em20241102-8588&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1014&akid;=8588%2E614464%2Eog3zj6]Give another amount If we win in Montana, we can defend our way of life,safeguard a woman’s right to make her own health care decisions, and protectour public lands for generations to come. —Jon This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. Email is the most important way for us to reach youabout opportunities to get involved. name: Team Kamala
subject: Team Kamala Newsletter:
body: Keep reading to learn about how you can reach as many voters as possible before Election Day…and help us WIN! | | |                                                                                                                                    --- ![Harris forPresident](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/111/764/original/HFP-Walz-SingleColor-HarrisBlue.png) ![Vice President Kamala Harris withsupporters](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/950/465/original/unnamed_\(6\).jpg)Peter, this is it. Election Day is this Tuesday, and we need every member ofthis grassroots team to help us mobilize, organize, get out the vote, and_win_. There has never been a more important moment for supporters like YOU tomake an impact than in the last three days of this election. ⬇️ Keepscrolling to learn about how you can reach as many voters as possible beforeElection Day...and help us WIN! ⬇️* * ***READY TO DO SOMETHING? We are so proud of everything we’ve accomplished, but our work is not over yet. **That’s where you come in, Peter. In the final days of this race, we need YOU to step up and help reach voters in your community.** **So, what do you say? Will you join Team Harris-Walz to knock on doors and speak to the voters that will decide this election? The time is flying, but it’s not toolate to claim your official Harris-Walz merch while supplies last.**There is something available for everyone --from****stickers****to****aprons****, and your purchase will go a long way tohelp us reach the voters we need to win next week!**Let’s win this together.| SHOP HERE ---  * * ***FIRED UP AND READY TO WIN? MAKE A DONATION TODAY**Vice President Kamala Harris and Governor Tim Walz are inspiring millions ofAmericans with their vision of a New Way Forward to a brighter future. We’refeeling hopeful, but it’s on _us_ to keep up the momentum.**Will you make a donation of $25 -- or whatever amount is meaningful to you-- to help Kamala win this election and make history? Every dollar powers ourvoter education and protection efforts in this critical election.**_If you've saved payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation willgo through immediately:_| $25 >> --- | $50 >> --- | $100 >> --- | $250 >> --- | $500 >> --- | Other >> ---            * * *| | DONATE --- | TAKE ACTION --- | SHOP ---  * * *This email was sent to **dpwillis67@gmail.com**. name: Ted Cruz
subject: A full description of what is happening…
body: We’re in real trouble- here’s why͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  We’re in real trouble- here’s why͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏| | | ![](https://d2kldsifk5aaa3.cloudfront.net/cruz/Ted-Cruz_Logo-Main_EM.png) --- | | Friend,  Here is the situation. Senator Chuck Schumer (D-NY) the powerful Majority Leader for the Senate Democrats has directed his forces to inject millions and millions of dollars into Texas to defeat me and flip Texas bright **blue**.  Schumer has said they will spend over one-hundred million dollars to defeat me. Other radical leftwing groups and National Democrat Party committees are jumping into the fray as well- _just flooding us_ with attack ads, flyers, and boots on the ground…   _**But here 's the worst part**_**:****_The National Party is not coming to save us._**** **  **I am standing alone against this massive progressive onslaught. **  We are getting almost _NO HELP_ from Mitch McConnell. And the major**** Republican Senate Super PAC has no operations or ads running in Texas…   _That 's why I'm calling on all grassroots conservatives from Maine to Marfa for help… _  ---  **RUSH HELP HERE >>** ---  _The Washington DC Party Establishment doesn 't want a grassroots conservativelike me in the Senate- they never have, and their lack of help during thefight of my life is proof! _  **I need** _**YOUR**_**help**. Not because ourfundraising hasn't been successful- we're doing well, and thousands of Texansand patriots from all over are stepping in to give generously. Many are givingfor the very first time, while others have given every month this year.  _Butwith no air cover. I'm forced to ask for urgent help. _ **We can 't loseTexas- and right now ****_we 're in real trouble_. **  **STAND WITH TEXAS &SAVE AMERICA RIGHT NOW**** >>**** **  Thank you for standing with me.  TedCruz --- ![](https://d1q5l1v0560xwk.cloudfront.net/images/lid12/tc-sig.jpg_thumb.png) ---  **DONATE >>** ---  | | | **Paid for by Ted Cruz for Senate** --- | | 815 A Brazos, PMB 550, Austin, TX 78701 --- | | ![](https://prospergroupcorp.demdex.net/event?d_event=imp&d_action=open&d_src=488020&c_pg_esender=cruz) --- | --- | ![](https://d1q5l1v0560xwk.cloudfront.net/images/lid12/Cruz-Ted_RecurringLogo_%281500x1500%29.png) ---    Republican Majority --- _PO Box 2221 Fort Collins, CO 80522_ _**unsubscribe**_ | _manage data preferences_ ![](https://email.republicanmajority.net/o/eJyEzjluxCAYQOHTDJ0t_sWAC44waVMiNjtE4BmBJ1Fy-sgnSPmap-_97u6-1HLsb75l25vrw7XhYn_9Tnv3YziUyBPAJNGRSFatqA2IbEGTXBa64sNKDlobUphNyGGhjUJKao0Lr4jAShR7fQAkArBBOW-ZcI2UeCP2hs2NZc_PV6gl-qP5z0cv58985FN0m57fpdYylL6x3JsvdY6PJs7_vV8W_wIAAP__XPFFIA)

name: Callie Barr
subject: pulling out all the stops
body: Peter, These days, we’re spending lots of time on the road, ensuring we reachas many voters as possible. SUPPORT CALLIE(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-cbc-24q4-em?refcode=BLU_EM_CBC_2024-11-02_1&amount;=25) With just 3 days left,we need your support to keep up the momentum, help cover our travel expenses,and ensure our message reaches every corner of the district. From Houghton toAlpena to Roscommon, we’re meeting with people, listening to their concerns,and sharing our vision for a better Northern and Upper Michigan. But to keeppushing through these last few days, we rely on grassroots supporters likeyou. Every dollar you give helps us knock more doors, make more calls, andspread the word. Can we count on your support to our GOTV fund to help usreach as many voters as possible before Election Day? name: Tammy Baldwin
subject: We can’t let this happen
body: [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/67?t=1001&akid;=4446%2E35263%2EVuDg49 ]TAMMY BALDWIN FOR SENATE [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2155?c0=tbe-em-nov24.ANyQo7&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_GEN_GEN_AC_20241102_PM1_V1_S1&t;=1004&akid;=4446%2E35263%2EVuDg49 ]Tammy Baldwin with a cup of coffee Good morning, Peter! I wanted to send you a quick message while I have my morning coffee. To be honest, asking for donations is my least favorite part of the job. But the truth is it’s absolutely necessary if we’re going to keep Wisconsin blue and defend this seat. Republicans have spent $100 million on ads attacking me and uplifting my opponent. The bad news is, their strategy seems to be working — with multiple polls showing my opponent taking a one-point lead. Losing this seat would cost Democrats control of the Senate. If Eric Hovde secured the majority for Mitch McConnell and the extreme GOP, everything from the Affordable Care Act and abortion rights to Social Security and Medicare would be on the chopping block. We can’t let that happen, but we’re running out of time to stop them. We have three days left to leave it all on the field — get our message in front of the final undecided Wisconinites, turn out voters across the state, and win this toss-up race. [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2155?c0=tbe-em-nov24.ANyQo7&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_GEN_GEN_AC_20241102_PM1_V1_S1&t;=1005&akid;=4446%2E35263%2EVuDg49 ]So, Peter, can you chip in to make sure my campaign has the resources to win Wisconsin’s Senate race? Donations have slowed down in November, so we could really use your support today. If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately: [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2591?c0=tbe-em-nov24.NDES17&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_GEN_GEN_AC_20241102_PM1_V1_S1&amount;=5&t;=1006&akid;=4446%2E35263%2EVuDg49 ]CHIP IN $5 NOW [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2591?c0=tbe-em-nov24.NDES17&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_GEN_GEN_AC_20241102_PM1_V1_S1&amount;=10&t;=1007&akid;=4446%2E35263%2EVuDg49 ]CHIP IN $10 NOW [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2591?c0=tbe-em-nov24.NDES17&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_GEN_GEN_AC_20241102_PM1_V1_S1&amount;=25&t;=1008&akid;=4446%2E35263%2EVuDg49 ]CHIP IN $25 NOW [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2591?c0=tbe-em-nov24.NDES17&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_GEN_GEN_AC_20241102_PM1_V1_S1&amount;=50&t;=1009&akid;=4446%2E35263%2EVuDg49 ]CHIP IN $50 NOW [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2591?c0=tbe-em-nov24.NDES17&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_GEN_GEN_AC_20241102_PM1_V1_S1&amount;=100&t;=1010&akid;=4446%2E35263%2EVuDg49 ]CHIP IN $100 NOW [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2591?c0=tbe-em-nov24.NDES17&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_GEN_GEN_AC_20241102_PM1_V1_S1&t;=1011&akid;=4446%2E35263%2EVuDg49 ]ANOTHER AMOUNT Thanks for all you do to support this campaign. subject: Ohio, Montana, Pennsylvania, Nevada, Wisconsin, New Mexico, Virginia, Arizona, Michigan
body: 🗺️🗺Check out the map, Friend➡️                                                                                                                                                        | |  --- | | | 🗺Check out the map, Friend➡️ --- | ![SenateMap](https://e.firstlook.news/rd/9z2z9kpirjv7pd81uo8r3pj4k5v67andmjahl6uih1o_rp22sh2s8i6epj0clgm1o73c1h2bs) --- There are 9 conservatives running for Senate in each of these states. I cannotstress this enough: Friend; __**every one of them MUST win on Tuesday!**__  I'm personally asking you to chip in any amount you can to help them take onthe radical Left & win their races. If we drop the ball on this, the AmericanDream could be _DOOMED_! **So please split a donation ten ways to me and thesefine patriots:** --- | | SPLIT A DONATION TO TEN PATRIOTS ---  _You can also get to know each of these candidates below & help them outindividually!_ --- | **MARCO'S SENATE SLATE** --- **BERNIE MORENO (R-OH)** --- | ![BernieMoreno](https://www.myimgcloud.com/ab24f2f4-dd67-45ae-b322-b8edb14a55b3.png) --- As an immigrant who came here legally from Colombia, Bernie Moreno lived theAmerican Dream by turning a failing car dealership into one of the largestdealership chains in the country. Ohio is a must-win for conservatives to flipthe Senate red, and that means helping Bernie Moreno. --- | | DONATE NOW --- **TIM SHEEHY (R-MT)** --- | ![TimSheehy](https://www.myimgcloud.com/f3c40731-1bb2-4972-abb0-bb24fdc662d4.png) --- Tim Sheehy is a Navy SEAL, aerial firefighter, and conservative running inanother must-win state for conservatives. He's up against a well-funded careerpolitician, so he needs your help to win! --- | | DONATE NOW --- **DAVE MCCORMICK (R-PA)** --- | ![DaveMcCormick](https://www.myimgcloud.com/980ebb29-6439-4b9f-870b-165b98a90149.jpg) --- Dave McCormick is a former Army Paratrooper who's fighting to renew America.He's tough on China and will do whatever it takes to create jobs in ourcountry. Dave is essential to the fight to restore the American Dream! --- | | DONATE NOW --- **SAM BROWN (R-NV)** --- | ![SamBrown](https://www.myimgcloud.com/8fdcb3d6-dd61-4ba6-a9bd-42989f5c3220.jpeg) --- Sam Brown is a retired Army Captain who survived and recovered from burns inan attack in Afghanistan. Sam's been through hell in service to our country,so you know he has the resolve it'll take to restore the American Dream --- | | DONATE NOW --- **MIKE ROGERS (R-MI)** --- | ![MikeRogers](https://www.myimgcloud.com/1921f41c-31c7-456d-9986-ac261b336ced.png) --- Mike Rogers is a good conservative and former law enforcement official. He'sserious about law and order, and he's ready to serve our country in theSenate! --- | | DONATE NOW --- **NELLA DOMENICI (R-NM)** --- | ![NellaDomenici](https://www.myimgcloud.com/e8d78ef2-7164-4684-b1e8-66fcefc24361.jpg) --- Nella Domenici is a wife, a mom, and a patriot. She knows how crucial it isthat we renew American energy independence and secure our border. --- | | DONATE NOW --- **HUNG CAO (R-VA)** --- | ![Hung Cao](https://www.myimgcloud.com/a95165d5-d195-49ec-8f0a-5504533ba440.png) --- Hung Cao came to America as a refugee from Vietnam as a kid. He joined theNavy and served his country. Hung knows what it takes to protect the AmericanDream and he's the perfect man to defend it! Help him flip Virginia red! --- | | DONATE NOW --- **KARI LAKE (R-AZ)** --- | ![KariLake](https://www.myimgcloud.com/d6424b2a-e690-4b38-9ee1-379c823207b7.jpeg) --- Kari Lake is a fierce Republican who is up against a tough Democrat opponent.We need her to win if we're going to take back the Senate! --- | | DONATE NOW --- **ERIC HOVDE (R-WI)** --- | ![Eric Hovde](https://www.myimgcloud.com/661226dd-35d9-4cb9-8e12-3e6f80aaf5e8.jpg) --- Eric Hovde is a family man and a true conservative. name: Senate Conservatives
subject: Top Four Senate Candidates
body: Mitch McConnell is stepping down as the Republican Leader in November and it'stime to build a conservative majority in the Senate that will truly fight forour values without making excuses. The best way to send principled leaders toWashington is to donate to their campaigns through the Senate ConservativesFund. You can contribute to multiple candidates with a single onlinetransaction, and SCF will pay all expenses and processing fees. This will savethese candidates a mountain of money, so they can use your contributions towin votes rather than to pay fundraising costs. Here are the Senate candidateswho need your urgent support: ✓ Bernie Moreno (OH) ✓ Eric Hovde (WI) ✓ SamBrown (NV) ✓ Kari Lake (AZ) Please take action right now by making a splitcontribution to their conservative Senate campaigns. These races are neck-and-neck, so these candidates will need funding until Election Day tobroadcast their message and turn out their voters. SUPPORT SENATECONSERVATIVES RUSH $250 → RUSH $100 → RUSH $25 → THE BEST WAY TO FUNDCONSERVATIVES Did you know that candidates often have to pay fundraisingexpenses that are over 80 percent of your contribution? It's true. When yourespond to marketing emails and text messages from candidates, the candidatesoften get less than 20 percent of your donation after expenses. That's why theSenate Conservatives Fund was founded – to give freedom-loving Americans aneffective way to support the best Senate candidates across the nation. Pleasecontribute to these four candidates today! We will combine your donationswith those made by thousands of other patriots and transfer them directly totheir campaigns. Working together, we can build a conservative Senate thatwill truly advance our freedom agenda. Thank you for considering this urgentrequest and for doing so much to help fight for America's future! ELECTIONCOUNTDOWN SUPPORT SENATE CONSERVATIVES DONATE NOW Change in Washington meanschanging the people we send there. Senate Conservatives Fund 300 IndependenceAve SE Washington, DC 20003 Text SENATE to (877) 838-9388 to receive exclusiveupdates and invitations. Senate Conservatives Fund is a grassrootsorganization that promotes conservative policies and helps elect conservativecandidates to the U.S. Senate. SCF was founded by former Senator Jim DeMint tohelp the grassroots change Washington. Contributions to the SenateConservatives Fund are not deductible as charitable contributions.Contributions from corporations or foreign nationals lacking permanentresident status are not permitted. Federal law requires us to report the name,mailing address, occupation and employer for each individual whosecontributions aggregate in excess of $200 in a calendar year. Not paid for attaxpayer expense. PAID FOR BY SENATE CONSERVATIVES FUND AND NOT AUTHORIZED BYANY CANDIDATE OR CANDIDATE'S COMMITTEE. SENATECONSERVATIVES.COM Unsubscribe

name: Nina Ahmad
subject: Pushing To Victory!
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ninageneral[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ninageneral] Hi Friend, As we close in on Election Day - THIS TUESDAY, NOVEMBER 5th! - I wanted to take a moment to saythank you to so many of you for your incredible work, passion, andencouragement. Our fight to elect Kamala Harris as our next President alongwith Democrats up and down the ballot has been an inspiring and noble causeand I am in awe of the work that we've all been able to accomplish. I've beenworking day and night to make sure that we don't leave anything on the tablein this fight for our democracy . As we push through the finish line together,I'll be curing ballots, facilitating votes, talking to our neighbors atcommunity events, and working to Get Out The Vote in every corner of ourcommunity. Please join me in committing to taking one extra action - one morecanvassing shift, one more phone call, attend one more event - before pollsclose next Tuesday. We know that the future of our country will be decided inPennsylvania and it’s up to each of us to stop Donald Trump once and for all!Let's finish this together! name: Team Cooper Voting Reminders
subject: Unofficial survey re: your voting status
body: Hi Peter — With only a few days left before voting officially ENDS for the 2024 election, we’re encouraging all our Team Cooper supporters to make sure they have a plan to cast a ballot! It’s critical that every single one of us make our voice heard. Many folks may have taken advantage of early or mail-in voting options. To gauge how many of our supporters may still need to head to the polls on Election Day, we’re conducting an unofficial survey: Have you voted yet, Peter? Republicans need to win NC to return Donald Trump to the White House. Meanwhile, Roy is committed to flipping our state blue at the presidential level. Roy is term-limited and can’t run again this time, and our upcoming gubernatorial election is considered the most consequential gubernatorial contest in the country. Meanwhile, Republicans hold a one-seat supermajority in the state legislature — we MUST break the supermajority to prevent the GOP from enacting their radical agenda in North Carolina. Join Roy in the fight to elect Democrats at every level of the North Carolina ballot. Donate today. name: Jacky Rosen
subject: My cards are on the table
body: I’m going to leave all my cards on the table, friend: A few months ago,Democrats across the country were confident we’d win this Senate race inNevada. That’s why they focused their dollars on other states – thinking wehad Nevada in the bag, even though experts said this state would be the pathto both the Senate majority and the White House. Then, the GOP and its darkmoney donors saw their opportunity: They've invested $75 MILLION into Nevada,and Donald Trump has come here every chance he's gotten to prop up my extremeMAGA opponent. Now, my lead has been completely erased: The latest polls showme DOWN one point. With just days to go in this race, I’m getting outspent anddrowned out, and the GOP is dominating early voting numbers. We’re in bigtrouble, and we need to raise resources FAST if we want to turn this around inthese final few days. Please, friend, will you chip in $5 or more now to helpus keep Nevada, the Senate, and the White House blue before it’s too late?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_email_1124?refcode=jtk5369-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Thank you for your urgent support. name: Lexi Schiff
subject: My dad
body: [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/62?t=1001&akid;=8094%2E5257348%2El9CHG9 ]Adam Schiff for Senate Derek — My whole life, I’ve looked up to my dad, Adam. Not just because he’s a member of Congress, or because he served as an impeachment manager in the case against Donald Trump, or on the January 6th Committee — though I am proud of him for all of those things! I admire my dad because he is tireless and relentless in his work to make a difference for others — especially young people like me and my brother Eli. Whether he’s fighting to reform the Supreme Court so my generation is not beholden to an ultra-conservative judiciary, or fighting to cancel student loan debt, or fighting to restore reproductive rights, or fighting to protect our clean air and water, he’s taking on big fights to help other people out. My dad is one of the most selfless people I know. Growing up, I would watch him at campaign events, asking people over and over again how he could help and hearing about their struggles. For most people, it would probably be exhausting and quite challenging — especially when the former president of the United States is always demonizing you. But my dad has never wavered in his work to make real change. For your grandma, your neighbor down the street who is a veteran, your teacher, your kids and grandkids, for everyone. And that’s why I know he’s going to be a damn good Senator. We have just a few days left to make it happen, which is why I’m earnestly asking you, Derek: [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2907?c0=nov2024_abs_em.SALZ0e&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_GEN_AC90_20241102_AM1_V1_S1&email;=&t;=1004&akid;=8094%2E5257348%2El9CHG9 ]Will you help send my dad to the U.S. Senate? There’s no one we can count on more to make a difference in our lives and deliver for the people of California. Any amount you chip in will help turn out crucial voters over the last days of this election cycle. name: Adam Schiff
subject: Is California getting away from us?
body: Team — I have some alarming news to share. Steve Garvey outraised our campaignagain. For the third fundraising period in a row. This time he raised over$1.2 million in the first two weeks of October alone, no doubt boosted byTrump’s attacks on me as the “enemy within.” This is a MAJOR problem. We onlyhave a handful of days left to make up the difference in our fundraising. CanI count on you to rush in a split contribution of $10 between Fight for Reformto elect state and local Democrats and my campaign before midnight to help usclose the gap? »https://act.fightforreform.org/go/56596?t=1003&akid;=22489%2E4449941%2Ej_qnggIf you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your splitdonation between Fight for Reform and Adam Schiff will go through immediately:CONTRIBUTE $10 »https://act.fightforreform.org/go/56597?t=1004&akid;=22489%2E4449941%2Ej_qnggCONTRIBUTE $25 »https://act.fightforreform.org/go/56598?t=1005&akid;=22489%2E4449941%2Ej_qnggCONTRIBUTE $50 »https://act.fightforreform.org/go/56599?t=1006&akid;=22489%2E4449941%2Ej_qnggCONTRIBUTE $100 »https://act.fightforreform.org/go/56600?t=1007&akid;=22489%2E4449941%2Ej_qnggOr a custom donation »https://act.fightforreform.org/go/56596?t=1008&akid;=22489%2E4449941%2Ej_qnggGarvey has now raised over $18 million during this campaign. Every day we letpass without responding to Garvey’s fundraising numbers is another opportunityfor him to reach undecided voters in the California Senate race — and moreMAGA candidates to press their advantage down-ballot. The implications gobeyond just our race: If Garvey turns out GOP voters, we are putting injeopardy the half-dozen toss-up House races in California that could determinethe House majority. We can’t count out Republican candidates in California. Wesimply can’t. Steve Garvey has outraised our campaign over the last threefundraising reporting periods. But we still have time to beat him right now,when it matters most. That’s why I’m urgently asking: Can you pitch in a splitdonation of $10 or any amount between Fight for Reform to elect state andlocal Democrats and my campaign to help us shift the momentum back in ourfavor? Steve Garvey outraised us by over $330,000, and any amount you givewill help us catch up. »https://act.fightforreform.org/go/56596?t=1009&akid;=22489%2E4449941%2Ej_qnggIf you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your splitdonation between Fight for Reform and Adam Schiff will go through immediately:CONTRIBUTE $10 »https://act.fightforreform.org/go/56597?t=1010&akid;=22489%2E4449941%2Ej_qnggCONTRIBUTE $25 »https://act.fightforreform.org/go/56598?t=1011&akid;=22489%2E4449941%2Ej_qnggCONTRIBUTE $50 »https://act.fightforreform.org/go/56599?t=1012&akid;=22489%2E4449941%2Ej_qnggCONTRIBUTE $100 »https://act.fightforreform.org/go/56600?t=1013&akid;=22489%2E4449941%2Ej_qnggOr a custom donation »https://act.fightforreform.org/go/56596?t=1014&akid;=22489%2E4449941%2Ej_qnggThank you. We can’t let Steve Garvey’s momentum continue, not this close toElection Day. — Adam Adam Schiff is only asking for contributions of up to$5,000 from individuals, federal PACs, and other federally permissible sourcesfor End Citizens United-Nonfederal. Adam Schiff is not asking forcontributions in excess of that amount or any contributions from corporations,unions, or other federally prohibited sources. Paid for by ECU Non-federal.------------------ Paid political advertisement paid for and provided in kindby End Citizens United Nonfederal, P.O. Box 66005, Washington, D.C. 20035.Authorized by Schiff for Senate. Contributions to End Citizens United Non-federal will be used in End Citizens United Non-federal’s sole discretion andare not being earmarked for use in any particular state or election. Yourcontribution to FFR will be used in connection with FFR’s matching fundsprogram to match the contributions of other contributors.(https://act.fightforreform.org/go/26911?t=1001&akid;=22489%2E4449941%2Ej_qngg)Click here to request fewer emails:https://act.fightforreform.org/signup/Less-Emails/?t=1002&akid;=22489%2E4449941%2Ej_qngg Click here to unsubscribe:https://act.fightforreform.org/unsubscribe/unsubscribe-2022?akid=22489%2E4449941%2Ej_qngg

name: Jon Tester
subject: This is urgent
body: Good morning, Peter! I wish I didn’t have to email you so early, but this isurgent: Montanans are already heading to the polls. Will you please pitch in$5 split between my campaign and Letitia James' to help us win this race inthree days? A generous group of donors just agreed to match all donationsuntil the end of the day—so anything you can give will go twice as far.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/james-for-ny-24-tester?refcode=jtk1722-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Give me a minuteto explain why this fight is personal to me, Peter. This race is between awealthy outsider who wants to privatize and destroy our health care system,end protections for public lands, and make personal health care decisions forwomen—and me, someone who was born and raised here and will fight like hellfor our Montana values. But I’m up against nearly $90 million in spending fromMitch McConnell’s buddies. We’re being pummeled by their attacks—and if wedon’t act now, that spending could be enough to tip the race into Tim Sheehy’sfavor. Look, I’m no stranger to tough fights—I won my first Senate race byless than 1 percentage point. But my back is up against the wall, and the onlyway we’ll win is through your support. If you’ve been waiting for the besttime to give, it’s right now: Generous donors are matching all gifts untilmidnight to help us win this race—so don’t wait. Will you split $5 (becomes$10) between my campaign and Letitia James' before midnight to help me win themost competitive Senate race in the country? All of our work has led up tothis moment. https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/james-for-ny-24-tester?refcode=jtk1722-bu-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thank you, Jon-------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Lucas Tyree Kunce
subject: One word: Community
body: [1]Lucas Kunce for U.S. Senate Hi Peter, it’s Lucas Kunce. The community thatsupported my family after we were bankrupted by medical bills is whatmotivated me to run against Josh Hawley for Missouri’s U.S. Senate seat.Please let me tell you why: [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83260?refcode=em20241102-8603&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1001&akid;=8603%2E614464%2Ep6dHnE]Photos of Lucas with family and friends in his old neighborhood. I grew up ina working-class neighborhood in mid-Missouri. It was one of those places wherethe curbs crumbled into the streets and the sidewalks were so tilted youcouldn’t really walk on them — though they made a pretty good bike ramp forall of us kids. We all ran in and out of each other’s houses, everyone’sparents took care of everyone. It was a magical place to live. Like so manyfamilies, mine lived paycheck-to-paycheck — and when my littlest sister wasborn with a heart condition, we were bankrupted by medical bills. Our familygot by thanks to the generosity of our community — most people had no moremoney than we did, but helped us anyway. Our neighbors and friends took therest of us kids into their homes while my parents were with my sister at thehospital over 100 miles away. And when we were all home together, they broughtmore meals by the house than we could ever hope to eat. Their support helpedme go to college, and after that I joined the Marines to honor everything ourcommunity did for me and my family growing up. But when I came home betweentours in Iraq and Afghanistan, I found that old magical place picked for parts— our local corner store was boarded up, our family’s first home in theneighborhood was bulldozed to the ground. Now it’s an empty lot: [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83260?refcode=em20241102-8603&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1002&akid;=8603%2E614464%2Ep6dHnE]Photo of empty lot in Jefferson City where Lucas' childhood home once stood.While all of us were risking our lives to build up towns like Habbaniyah,Fallujah, and Herat, career politicians and corporate elites like Josh Hawleylet our towns and neighborhoods at home waste away. And then, after spending20 years and $6.4 trillion on pointless forever wars and defense contractors,they couldn’t figure out how to invest a fraction of that amount back into ourown country. I’m running for U.S. Senate because it’s time everydayMissourians — people who know how to take care of each other, like the ones inmy old neighborhood — called the shots in this country. [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83260?refcode=em20241102-8603&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1003&akid;=8603%2E614464%2Ep6dHnE]And today, I’m asking for your support to help me make it happen. [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83260?refcode=em20241102-8603&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1004&akid;=8603%2E614464%2Ep6dHnE]Photo of Lucas standing on the steps of the New Madrid County courthouse withlocal leaders. If you’re ready to take back power from the giant corporationsand corrupt, career politicians who’ve waged economic warfare on our country,I need you on November 5th, Peter. [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83260?refcode=em20241102-8603&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1005&akid;=8603%2E614464%2Ep6dHnE]Will you add a $10 donation to my campaign right now so we have the resourcesto fight back against Josh Hawley’s attacks, keep airing our own positivemessage, and flip this U.S. Senate seat in just 3 days? I don’t take any moneyfrom corporate PACs, so I mean it when I say anything makes a big impact. Ifyou've stored your info with ActBlue Express, we'll process your contributioninstantly: [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83261?refcode=em20241102-8603&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=10&t;=1006&akid;=8603%2E614464%2Ep6dHnE]Contribute $10 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83261?refcode=em20241102-8603&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=25&t;=1007&akid;=8603%2E614464%2Ep6dHnE]Contribute $25 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83261?refcode=em20241102-8603&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=30&t;=1008&akid;=8603%2E614464%2Ep6dHnE]Contribute $30 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83261?refcode=em20241102-8603&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=50&t;=1009&akid;=8603%2E614464%2Ep6dHnE]Contribute $50 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83261?refcode=em20241102-8603&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=100&t;=1010&akid;=8603%2E614464%2Ep6dHnE]Contribute $100 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83261?refcode=em20241102-8603&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amount;=250&t;=1011&akid;=8603%2E614464%2Ep6dHnE]Contribute $250 [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/83260?refcode=em20241102-8603&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1012&akid;=8603%2E614464%2Ep6dHnE]Give another amount I can’t tell you how much it means to me that you’re onthis team, Peter. Together, we’ll take back power for working people andfundamentally change who runs the show in our country. Thanks for being partof it, Lucas Kunce This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. Email is themost important way for us to reach you about opportunities to get involved. Ifyou need to remove yourself from our email list, click here to unsubscribe:https://act.lucaskunce.com/unsubscribe/unsubscribe?t=1013&akid;=8603%2E614464%2Ep6dHnEPaid for by Lucas Kunce for Missouri. name: CAPT Hung Cao
subject: 🚨Trump Rally Alert
body: Peter, President Trump is holding his LAST RALLY OF 2024 right here inVirginia, and I’m honored to stand alongside him! We’ve set a goal to raise$50,000 before the rally starts, and I told President Trump we could count onyou to pitch in. This final push will give us the resources we need to finishout this election and reach the final undecided voters. I don’t want to tellPresident Trump we MISSED our goal! Our rally starts in just a few hours, andwe’re running out of time. Can you pitch in now? PITCH IN NOW I knowPresident Trump appreciates all the work you’re putting in to take backVirginia! In Liberty, CAPT Hung Cao USN (Ret) TEXT HUNG TO 21412 Hung Cao:I’ll get right to the point - the Election is officially just days away, sowe’re launching an EMERGENCY ELECTION FUND to make sure we have the resourceswe need to win. I'm asking for your help today - whether you're able to give$5 or $25 today, any amount is greatly appreciated. subject: our momentum is clear

name: Leaders We Deserve
subject: Urgent: Final Push for Our 13 Progressive Candidates!
body: [https://act.leaderswedeserve.com/go/853?refcode=em20241102&t;=1001&akid;=1390%2E587540%2EG_OuL_]Leaders We Deserve Peter, As we approach Election Day, we are in the finalstretch of our grassroots campaign to support 13 incredible young progressivecandidates who are ready to make a difference in our communities. Thesecandidates embody the change we need — fighting for social justice, climateaction, and equitable education. But they can't do it alone. We have one lastchance to ensure they have the resources to mobilize voters and share theirvision. Why Your Support Matters: * Time is of the Essence: Every momentcounts. Early voting is already underway, and we need to ensure that everyvoter knows who is on the ballot. * Your Donation is Critical: With just daysto go, we’re making a final push to fund canvassing efforts, phone banking,and outreach materials. Every dollar you contribute will directly impact ourability to get these candidates elected. * A New Generation of Leadership: Byelecting these 13 young leaders, we’re not just changing who sits in office;we’re investing in a future that prioritizes the needs of our communities.Please join us in this critical effort. Your donation of $5 can make asignificant difference in our GOTV strategy. Together, we can ensure thatthese candidates have the support they need to succeed. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/lwd-em-20241102?refcode=em20241102-1390&amount;=5&refcode2;=1390_587540_G_OuL_&akid;=1390%2E587540%2EG_OuL_]Donate now to help us reach our goal and make history together! [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/lwd-em-20241102?amount=5&refcode;=em20241102-1390&refcode2;=1390_587540_G_OuL_&akid;=1390%2E587540%2EG_OuL_]Donate $5 » Thank you for your continued support and belief in a brighter,more equitable future. Thank you, Leaders We Deserve This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. Email is a critical way we communicate with grassrootssupporters like you. However, if you would like to change your subscriptionpreferences, here are some options: Receive Fewer Emails:https://act.leaderswedeserve.com/signup/receive-fewer-emails/?t=1002&akid;=1390%2E587540%2EG_OuL_ Update Your Information:https://act.leaderswedeserve.com/signup/update-your-information/ Unsubscribe:https://act.leaderswedeserve.com/unsubscribe/unsubscribe/?t=1003&akid;=1390%2E587540%2EG_OuL_Leaders We Deserve 611 Pennsylvania Ave SE #192 Washington, DC 20003info@leaderswedeserve.com [PAID FOR BY LEADERS WE DESERVE,LEADERSWEDESERVE.COM, NOT AUTHORIZED BY ANY CANDIDATE OR CANDIDATE'SCOMMITTEE]

name: The Collective PAC
subject: when it matters most
body: |                                                                 | If you want to help The Collective PAC build Black political power up and down the ballot, and across the country, then you’re in the right place. If you'd like to unsubscribe click here. | | ![Help us give free rides to go vote on Election Day!](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/950/842/original/SCOTUS.png) Peter,   It’s the weekend before Election Day, and there’s one thing everyone istalking about: voter turnout. With just three days to go, it all comes down towhich side gets more people to the polls.  That’s why it’s so important to give to The Collective PAC right now, when itmatters most.  **Our mission is to bring Black voters to the polls — to help people who might otherwise NOT be able to exercise their sacred right to vote.Chip in $20 to sponsor a round-trip ride to the polls or give whatever you can now to help us hit our $100,000 goal before Election Day→ ** | If you've stored your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will be processed immediately.  --- | DONATE $10 NOW » --- | DONATE $25 NOW » --- | DONATE $50 NOW » --- | DONATE $100 NOW » --- | DONATE $250 NOW » --- | OTHER » ---  With the race this tight, Black voters in key swing states like Michigan,Wisconsin, Pennsylvania, and Georgia will determine the presidency and controlof the House.  We don’t need to tell you how important this election is, Peter. We’re notjust choosing a president, we’re deciding whether America remains a free,democratic country or becomes a nation governed by a delusional dictator.  That’s why we won’t stop working to make sure every voter has the opportunityto get out and go vote. **Help The Collective PAC turn out voters in a BIG waycome Election Day but donating just $10or whatever you can right now.**If you've stored your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donationwill be processed immediately. --- | DONATE $10 NOW » --- | DONATE $25 NOW » --- | DONATE $50 NOW » --- | DONATE $100 NOW » --- | DONATE $250 NOW » --- | OTHER » ---  Thanks for all your help,  The Collective PAC* * * ![](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/670/260/original/TCP_NBI_Stacked_Logo.png)The Collective PAC is strategically focused on creating a truly equitabledemocracy where our nation’s local, state and federal governments have diverseand talented elected leadership and Black people are fully represented inpositions of power to create the policies necessary to progress ourcommunities forward. Since our inception in 2016, we have helped 500candidates win general elections at the local, state and federal levels. Westrive to support the next wave of progressive and unapologetic Blackcandidates who will usher in a sea of change in our political system whilehelping America fulfill its promise of democracy by creating a government thatwill truly be for the people and of the people. --- ![Twitter](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/527/084/original/unnamed-2.png)![Facebook](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/527/085/original/fb_back.png)![](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/527/086/original/Insta_black.png) ---  DONATE » --- DONATE MONTHLY » ---  To Donate by Check: PO Box 15320, DC 20003Paid for by the Collective PAC; not authorized by any candidate or candidate'scommittee. ---  ** Click here to unsubscribe from the Collective PAC's email list. **   ---    | | Sent via ActionNetwork.org. To update your email address, change your name or address, or to stop receiving emails from The Collective PAC, please click here.  ---  ![](https://an.collectivepac.org/ss/o/u001.ZbNyqOfLYPaP-d23SgKjnQ/4b4/IDRigVAlRYaAH6dQ8W0SeQ/ho.gif)

name: Donald J. Trump
subject: We waited 4 long years for this very moment
body: I need your support one last time.                                              | | | | |  --- ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/28/28b59c4c-27bb-4895-b18e-23e2a7ef42aa/3-days-out.png) | --- | **ALERT FROM PRESIDENT TRUMP** ---     | --- I just held two big & beautiful rallies to kick off Election Month — they bothSOLD OUT! **After 4 LONG YEARS, the moment we’ve been building and working toward isfinally here.** We’ve seen a _**SURGE IN SUPPORT**_ since I stepped off stage in Wisconsin,but __I need your help ONE LAST TIME__ to finish strong. We’re about to shift our remaining resources into an ALL OUT Get Out The VoteOperation — **will you chip in one last time so we can turn out MILLIONS OFTRUMP VOTERS?**  FINAL SURGE OF SUPPORT This is our final push to keep our ads running, reach every single voter withmy America first message, and show Comrade Kamala that we will neversurrender. It’s because of **YOUR SUPPORT** that we’ll win big in 3 days and get back towinning for the great American people. **So if you have anything left in the tank to give, please send it in beforetonight’s 11:59 PM DEADLINE and it will go directly towards our final voteroutreach operation.>**  RUSH EMERGENCY DONATION **Thank you in advance for your generosity and action in these final days.** God bless you,  ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/b0/b028923f-aa71-493e-a406-a3ae3dd63e4b/trumpheadshot.png) ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/cb/cb3fa8bb-6df3-4771-a7a6-1eb7fa1da014/trump-signature.png) Donald J. Trump 45th President of the United States **P.S. I also really hope you will pledge to donate again before the pollsclose.>** It would mean the world to me if you could pledge to give again. If you can’t,don’t sweat it and make sure you uncheck the first box. FINAL SURGE OF SUPPORT | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- ![MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN.>](https://cdn.nucleusfiles.com/10/10cd0096-0965-4373-8732-fe72b64c4165/swamp-the-vote.png) President Trump will NEVER SURRENDER in his fight to SAVE AMERICA. But hecan’t do it alone. It’s going to take all of us, working together, to pull offa MASSIVE victory this November that’s TOO BIG TO RIG! The only way to ensure that is by beating the far left liberals at their owngame – by voting before Election Day! body: Peter, Lily Tang Williams is a rubber stamp for Donald Trump’s extreme MAGAagenda! It’s safe to say there is a clear difference between Maggie and heropponent in this race. While her opponent doubles down on Trump’s extreme anddivisive policies that are out of step with voters, Maggie remains focused onbringing our community together to defend our fundamental freedoms, protectour democracy, and secure a fair deal for ALL Granite Staters. Maggie’sopponent has pushed Trump's baseless lies and conspiracies surrounding the2020 election, which have been used to restrict voting rights here in NewHampshire. If that wasn’t extreme enough, she’s refused to confirm whether ornot she would certify the 2024 election results if elected to Congress. Withcontrol of the People’s House on the line, we can’t afford to let this openseat fall into the hands of MAGA extremists who are willing to thwart ourdemocracy and bail Trump out! There are just 3 days left, and we’re runningout of time to reach voters and let them know what’s at stake before they headto the polls and cast their ballots. name: Jon Tester
subject: a wrench in our plans
body: Peter, this really threw a wrench in our plans… My campaign manager justcalled me, and she said that if we don’t raise another $100k by tonight, we’llhave to cut our ads by half. I don’t expect my supporters to chip in to everyemail we send. I know how hard you work for your money, and I’m alwaysthankful for whatever you can give, whenever you can give it. But here’s thereality: Mitch McConnell’s allies are spending nearly $90 million to defeatme, and my ultra-wealthy opponent, Tim Sheehy, has already put $2.5 millioninto his own campaign. Unlike my opponent, I can’t write myself million-dollarchecks. Instead, I rely on grassroots supporters like you to keep thiscampaign moving forward. That’s why I’m asking: Can you make a split donationbetween my campaign and Fight for Progress to help me get back on track? Yoursupport makes a big difference. $3 (https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-ffp-tester-2024?refcode=BLU_EM_FFP_2024-10-16_1&amount;=3) $5(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-ffp-tester-2024?refcode=BLU_EM_FFP_2024-10-16_1&amount;=5) $10(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-ffp-tester-2024?refcode=BLU_EM_FFP_2024-10-16_1&amount;=10) $15(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-ffp-tester-2024?refcode=BLU_EM_FFP_2024-10-16_1&amount;=15) $25(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-ffp-tester-2024?refcode=BLU_EM_FFP_2024-10-16_1&amount;=25) $50(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-ffp-tester-2024?refcode=BLU_EM_FFP_2024-10-16_1&amount;=50) OTHER AMOUNT(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-ffp-tester-2024?refcode=BLU_EM_FFP_2024-10-16_1) Thank you for standing with me.—Jon ------------------------------------------------------------ Paid for byFight for Progress PAC and not authorized by any candidate or any candidate'scommittee. name: Team Shontel Brown
subject: Election Day is only 3 days away
body: Peter, Election Day is only 3 DAYS AWAY! Shontel is facing not one but twoopponents. MAGA Republicans desperately want to flip this seat. name: Anna Sophia Rowe
subject: 3 Days: A room of 85% men…
body: Hi there, We have MAJOR news: Allie Phillips’ race has moved in priority andis now the top target for a Democratic victory in Tennessee! With only 3 daysleft until Election Day, we have an exciting opportunity to make a differencein the abortion ban state of TN and ensure Allie can be in the rooms to serveas a much-needed pro-choice woman’s voice. Rush a split $20.24 or morecontribution between Her Bold Move and Allie’s campaign TODAY to join thefight. → https://secure.actblue.com/donate/hbm-phillips/?refcode=EM_F_241102room__N_ASR_90DO_12_G_N_PT Last year, during aroutine anatomy scan at 19 weeks pregnant, Allie received the devastating newsthat the baby she was joyfully expecting, Miley Rose, was not going to makeit. Following the diagnosis, Doctors warned that continuing the pregnancywould endanger Allie’s life. But, the Tennessee state legislature, which is85% male, had passed a near-total ban on abortion in 2022. She was forced toleave her home state, devastated and heartbroken, to obtain the life-savingcare she needed: “With a risk of sepsis, blood clots, or more, I underwent anemergency abortion. I did this alone: in a city I had never been to before,without my family or my husband there by my side,” Allie said. After thishorrible, tragic experience, Allie began advocating for a new policy shetitled “Miley’s Law,” which would add an exception for fetal anomalies to herstate’s abortion ban. However, her legislator, Rep. Jeff Burkhart, did nothave any empathy for her experience. He told her that if his own daughter hadbeen in her position, he’d have wanted her to continue the pregnancy… he alsotold her “most of the time the pregnancies that go bad are usually the firstpregnancy.” (???) It’s way past time we elect legislators, not mansplainerswho have no idea what they’re talking about. Betches News recently publishedthe audio from that conversation, “In recently unearthed audio from June 2023,Republican Tennessee representative Jeff Burkhart is heard speaking to twowomen who had lost pregnancies. In the conversation he actively tried toinvalidate their experiences because of his own misinformed understanding ofreproductive health. Almost a year earlier, a ban on abortion from the pointof conception with zero exceptions went into effect in Tennessee.” After theconversation, Phillips wrote to Buckhart and said, “Every chance I get to tellmy story, I will… Who knows, maybe one day I’ll run against you.” Now Allie isrunning for HIS SEAT in the TN House of Representatives – and she is withinstriking distance of actually winning it – but she needs our help. This is arare opportunity to replace an anti-choice extremist legislator in TN, and weare honored to be standing with Allie in this fight. Rush support to hercampaign now by pitching in a split $20.24 or more today →https://secure.actblue.com/donate/hbm-phillips/?refcode=EM_F_241102room__N_ASR_90DO_12_G_N_PT Let’s do this, AnnaSophia Rowe Her Bold Move believes that ambitious women will transform ourcountry. We provide critical support for fiercely pro-choice women candidatesand their campaign teams: financial support, endorsements, messageamplification, campaign media, fundraising support, and more. Will you supportus with a contribution today? https://secure.actblue.com/donate/hbm-phillips/?refcode=EM_F_241102room__N_ASR_90DO_12_G_N_PT Paid for by Her BoldMove Action. subject: We need to pay attention to Nevada
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-rosen[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-rosen] Friends, it’s Julia Louis-Dreyfus. If you know me, you know I love a good joke. name: Sheen, Martin
subject: what's next in Florida:
body: Martin Sheenhttps://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2480-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 "What's next?" Former (fictional) president JedBartlet would ask this of his staff frequently on "The West Wing." Not alwaysa simple question when it comes to running the United States of America — butall the same, one intended to keep the momentum of his team going. So as theactor and activist who played that former president on TV, I ask the samequestion of you now, friend: What's next when it comes to your support of oneof the most important Senate races in the country? I'm talking about DemocratDebbie Mucarsel-Powell's campaign to defeat Rick Scott in Florida and protectour Democratic Senate majority. Just recently, Debbie narrowed the polling gapbetween her and Rick Scott to just 2 points. Then the experts at InsideElections increased her chances of defeating Rick Scott. So what's next,friend? Well, with your immediate grassroots donation, Debbie wins. That iswhat's next. Florida is winnable, so please rush a donation of $5 or more nowto help Debbie Mucarsel-Powell defeat Rick Scott and protect our DemocraticSenate majority.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2480-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 My career as an actor spans decades — but so toodoes my time as an activist. From supporting the farm worker movement withCesar Chavez in California to campaigning for Ted Kennedy's presidentialcampaign in Florida (yes, Florida!) to supporting Democratic Senatecandidates, I've never been shy about getting involved and fighting for what'sright. Fighting for what's right most usually demands articulating what iswrong. And Florida's GOP senator Rick Scott — who is beholden to Donald Trump— is absolutely wrong for Florida and our nation. A Republican majority in theSenate, with Donald Trump in the White House, is downright wrong and dangerousfor our nation. You know it as well as I do. Trump and Scott are beholden toan extreme ideology that attacks the heart of our nation — our freedom anddemocracy — while empowering and enriching themselves and their allies. Theiragenda wouldn't just send our nation backward, but it would also cause untoldharm. That's why I'm all in to help Debbie Mucarsel-Powell win in Florida. Ifwe win in Florida, Democrats hold the Senate. If we win in Florida, we stopDonald Trump. If we win in Florida, the "what's next?" is building a countrywith new, hopeful ideas and possibilities. So please join me by rushing adonation of $5 right now to help Debbie Mucarsel-Powell defeat Rick Scott.She's up against millions of dollars of attack ads courtesy of Scott and hisGOP allies, and Debbie can only fight back and win with your immediatesupport.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2480-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thank you, Martin Sheen -------- This email wassent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Ken Burns
subject: I am in the business of history
body: [ https://go.bobcasey.com/go/182?t=1001&akid;=4753%2E552475%2Ev8fdo0 ]BobCasey for Senate [ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241102-2?refcode=em20241102-2&refcode2;=4753_552475_v8fdo0&akid;=4753%2E552475%2Ev8fdo0]Ken Burns Hi Peter, it's Ken Burns. I am in the business of history. I’vespent my life learning about America’s past and understanding the challengesour democratic system of government has faced. From Ben Franklin toGettysburg, Pennsylvania has always played a critical role in shaping ourdemocracy — and it has the chance to do so again this year. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241102-2?refcode=em20241102-2&refcode2;=4753_552475_v8fdo0&akid;=4753%2E552475%2Ev8fdo0]That’s why I’m personally asking you to help keep Bob Casey in the Senate.Bob is running to protect voting rights and our democratic institutions — andhis success will make the difference in who has control of the Senatemajority. [ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241102-2?refcode=em20241102-2&refcode2;=4753_552475_v8fdo0&akid;=4753%2E552475%2Ev8fdo0]Donate » Bob Casey shares my love for learning American history, and heunderstands the importance of preserving our system of government thatrespects and listens to all of its citizens. He also understands that thedemocratic values that make up the very fabric of our nation are at risk ofunraveling. The GOP is spending more than $150 million against Bob to buy thisseat, meaning this race is the second most expensive in the entire country andis on track to become one of the most expensive in history. With recent pollsshowing that Bob is tied with his Trump-backed opponent, David McCormick, heneeds all of our support to keep up. This election, our country stands at acrossroads, and it’s up to us to decide which direction we’ll take. If we’regoing to elect Kamala Harris as the first woman president, defend our Senatemajority, and protect our very democracy, we must re-elect Bob Casey and keepPennsylvania blue. name: Team DLCC
subject: asking directly
body: Your $7 donation could be the difference between electing state Democrats who fight to protect abortion rights or losing to one of our far-right Republican opponents. | | |  --- | ![](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/097/354/original/2023_09_Email-Wrapper-Graphic_B_v2.png) |  ---|--- We have one question: Is defeating extreme Republicans across the country worth $7 to you? At the state legislative ballot level, races come down to a handful of votes, and resources are limited. A 5X-matched gift of $7 could give our in-state partners the necessary resources to fund get-out-the-vote efforts, hire digital staff, and invest in TV ads to spread our message across the airwaves. **Your 5X-matched $7 donation could be the difference between electing state Democrats who will fight to protect abortion rights or losing to one of our far-right Republican opponents who aim to attack all of our fundamental freedoms.** Before our match extension ends, we’re asking you directly. Is seeing Democrats win next week and defeating MAGA Republicans worth $7 to you? If it is, own a piece of this fight by chipping in now. We’re working to expand Democratic power, defend our majorities, and break up Republican supermajorities this fall – but it all starts with a donation from grassroots supporters like you. If you step up and decide $7 is worth investing before our deadline, you can feel good knowing that you helped Democrats gain power in states nationwide. We’re asking again: Will you donate a 5X-matched gift of $7 to help state Democrats defeat extreme Republicans in this election and beyond? | If you've stored your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will process immediately.  --- | 5X-MATCH $7 --- | 5X-MATCH $25 --- | 5X-MATCH $50 --- | 5X-MATCH $100 --- | 5X-MATCH $250 --- | OTHER » ---  Thank you so much,Team DLCC  **5X-MATCH: ACTIVE »** **MAKE IT MONTHLY »**             | --- Paid for by the Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee, dlcc.org. name: John Rich
subject: A reckoning is on the horizon...
body: https://click.updates.marshablackburn.com/?qs=b92d85a9778a6af9c4d56fbab9155cfbad4f420c998df4df1d983c9fb236ba284331617beb4f8d638e6d3edcdcdcf96facaf909453f9fd8d708adbf2184b5a4fhttps://click.updates.marshablackburn.com/?qs=b92d85a9778a6af9c4d56fbab9155cfbad4f420c998df4df1d983c9fb236ba284331617beb4f8d638e6d3edcdcdcf96facaf909453f9fd8d708adbf2184b5a4fMark my words, Peter. A reckoning is approaching. Hey friends - this is JohnRich. I'm proud to be a thorn in the side of the woke Left. Here's the thing.I've been singing and writing country music since before the word "woke" waseven a thing. I grew up in the South and was raised to be a freedom-lovingpatriot who always stands for the flag, protects the Second Amendment,supports our troops, and backs the blue. And that's why it makes me absolutelysick to see what the liberal whack jobs have done to our country, and whatthey have in store for our future. They want to redefine what it means to bean American. They won't stop until "one nation under God" is stripped from ourPledge of Allegiance. They are eager to parade drag queens through ourchildren's classrooms. They won't sleep until the U.S. Constitution isshredded to bits. It's an utter disgrace, but I find peace knowing that "theLord laughs at the wicked, for he knows their day is coming." It also doesn'thurt that we have patriots like Senator Marsha Blackburn fighting the goodfight for us in the U.S. Senate.https://click.updates.marshablackburn.com/?qs=b92d85a9778a6af9c4d56fbab9155cfbad4f420c998df4df1d983c9fb236ba284331617beb4f8d638e6d3edcdcdcf96facaf909453f9fd8d708adbf2184b5a4fThat's actually why I'm emailing you today. Chuck Schumer and his socialistcronies in Washington are propping up radical socialists to destroy MarshaBlackburn and PERMANENTLY take over Tennessee. They will spend, lie, and cheattheir way to victory unless we do something about it right here and now. Weneed a response that will leave Marsha's opponents regretting they everentered the ring.https://click.updates.marshablackburn.com/?qs=b92d85a9778a6af9c4d56fbab9155cfbad4f420c998df4df1d983c9fb236ba284331617beb4f8d638e6d3edcdcdcf96facaf909453f9fd8d708adbf2184b5a4fSo, I'm directly asking you to join me in supporting her campaign. SenatorMarsha Blackburn is as tough as they come. She's never given an inch to thewoke mob, and she is a God-fearing patriot like you and me. Marsha has mycomplete backing, and I hope you're willing to give her the same. I don'twrite emails like this ever, so trust me when I tell you that Marsha Blackburnneeds your support today to defeat her opponents and all the commie lovingLiberals hell-bent on destroying America. If they take Tennessee, the battleis over. We'd never recover.https://click.updates.marshablackburn.com/?qs=b92d85a9778a6af9c4d56fbab9155cfbad4f420c998df4df1d983c9fb236ba284331617beb4f8d638e6d3edcdcdcf96facaf909453f9fd8d708adbf2184b5a4fI'm asking this as a personal favor to a fellow Patriot: please don't closethis email without taking a moment to support Marsha Blackburn's campaign. ForAmerica, John Rich Paid for by Blackburn Tennessee Victory Fund, a jointfundraising committee authorized by and composed of Marsha for Senate, MARSHAPAC, and Tennessee Republican Party Federal Election Account. BlackburnTennessee Victory Fund PO Box 3750 Brentwood, TN 37024 This message reflectsthe opinions and representations of Blackburn Tennessee Victory Fund. You arereceiving this email because you signed up as a member of Blackburn TennesseeVictory Fund's online community.https://click.updates.marshablackburn.com/?qs=b92d85a9778a6af91c176dfcdcd0d5afaddd7241e4c0e16cb89c686ee92c1313765d6a9645756bada0fc431702b3133de7594556ef06ba13f2031769b522657dPrivacy Policy If you would prefer not to receive future emails from Blackburnfor Tennessee Victory Fund, click here.
