title: Dr. Michael Goldstein for U.S. House of Representatives - Connecticut District - Goldstein for Congress | Facebook
description: Dr. Michael Goldstein is running for U.S. House of Representatives in Connecticut's District. Join us to support Dr. Michael Goldstein and take back our country. We are the voice of the people, and it's time to stand up! #GoldsteinForCongress #TakeBackCT #VoteSmart
name: =?utf-8?b?RHIuIE1pY2hhZWwgR29sZHN0ZWluIGZyb20gTWljaGFlbOKAmXMgU3Vic3Rh?= =?utf-8?b?Y2s=?=
subject: Keeping it Local - We The People Need to Vote - I would be Honored by Your Support
body: View this post on the web athttps://drmichaelgoldstein4ct.substack.com/p/keeping-it-local-we-the-people-need Fellow Friends, Early Voting ends Sunday. We’ve been out on the Campaigntrail for almost a year and now it is time to take action at the ballot box.We need your support so please get out and vote. We are three days from theMain Event - For us it is a David v. Goliath story. We have been identifyingand posing solutions to issues facing the citizens of this district and willcontinue to do so and we have been working with the local candidates OurCampaign has been one about Federal Solutions to Local Problems that you and Iface living in the Constitution State of Connecticut. We have also looked atworld issues and issues that need to be addressed in Congress especially onglobal energy and reduced global emissions (See Article [https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/40db40d4-519f-4190-ae65-7e32a8d5227b?j=eyJ1IjoiMWh2cjYwIn0.VBabVq-VHATXCJqsddI7uMpdiTm0WkVanRDZfvCWMkg ]). We’ve been out there: knocking doors,talking to people at Garbage dumps (long before we were called garbage),talking to you, marching in parades, talking to our youth, our veterans,talking to communities that have been ignored. We have also spent a lot oftime talking to people in the supermarkets about their pocketbook issues. Wehave a pretty good feeling of the pulse of this State and this Country. Hereare some of the issues that matter to Every Day Nutmeggers like You.Connecticut has a border crisis. Immigration and bad economic policy isaffecting everyone and causes rampant inflation. The fentanyl and traffickingmaking its way to our backyard must stop. At the grocery stores, many peopleare waiting to shop on sale days and many are shopping at multiplesupermarkets to take advantages of different sales. The sales price ofgroceries today were the regular prices under the Trump administration. Thereis no price gouging at supermarkets as they typically run on less than a 2%profit margin and high volume. They are struggling due to high energy costs,supply chain issues, and theft. Crime is rampant and our police need to besupported and this mantra of Crime Pays Under Harris and Himes needs to bereversed. Education - Parents want to be able to send their children wherethey want and we have been advocating for school choice. When we marched thePuerto Rican Day parade, so many parents expressed the challenges of workingtwo or three jobs to be in a position to send their children to private orparochial schools because Bridgeport ranks at the bottom of the schooldistricts of 161 out of about 165. (See our article on Your Child, YourChoice. [ https://open.substack.com/pub/drmichaelgoldstein4ct/p/your-child-your-choice?r=26c3ku&utm;_campaign=post&utm;_medium=web ]) Housing is anothermajor issue and not just 8-30g. Rents keep going up and the supply of housingis an issue in some parts of our district. Pricing is going up forinflationary reasons as cost of home heating is up. Cost of electricity is up.Cost of insurance is up. Hartford keeps jamming 8–30g down our throats. Thismandate does not solve the real problem, which is enough affordable ownershipof housing. Our children cannot afford to live in Fairfield County. (See ourarticle on housing [ https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/dccf95aa-daad-4ffa-adbd-7d8603409ab6?j=eyJ1IjoiMWh2cjYwIn0.VBabVq-VHATXCJqsddI7uMpdiTm0WkVanRDZfvCWMkg ]). We Need a Return to Local Control andAffordable Home Ownership and Building Equity. Medicare - We are seeingSeniors on fixed income getting the shock of their lives as Medicare fundswere diverted - Only $280 Billion - to subsidize the Green New Deal of theInflation Reduction Act. This will cause major issues and we have to take careof our seniors [https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/4235c566-f55f-4198-963b-355b89783a8f?j=eyJ1IjoiMWh2cjYwIn0.VBabVq-VHATXCJqsddI7uMpdiTm0WkVanRDZfvCWMkg ]. Business - Companies are moving out ofConnecticut. The only companies that come here are doing so because they haveto. When they get here, they are stuck in traffic because I-95 doesn’t move -You can blame Himes for that one - See our article - When you Are Stuck onI-95 - Blame Himes) [https://open.substack.com/pub/drmichaelgoldstein4ct/p/i-95-when-you-are-in-traffic-blame?r=26c3ku&utm;_campaign=post&utm;_medium=web ]. Thisinfrastructure and energy crisis is causing issues to Commercial Real EstateConcerns and we need to bring more jobs to Connecticut with new pro-businessstrategies including: reduced regulatory burdens, expedited zoning and permitapprovals, improving the infrastructure with less congested highways andimproved commuter rail service. Federal tax incentives and opportunity zonesare tools that can be used to attract new businesses to our beautiful state.These are techniques being used by other states to lure away Connecticutbusinesses. We need to be more aggressive in both attracting and keepingbusinesses here. (See our Article on Addressing our Commercial Markets [https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/6daa23f1-9e4e-44d9-8658-35fbc3680cff?j=eyJ1IjoiMWh2cjYwIn0.VBabVq-VHATXCJqsddI7uMpdiTm0WkVanRDZfvCWMkg ]). I-95 - It needs solutions and somework is being done. Our new concern is that the roads are being improved bycontractors not from Connecticut - We have to try and keep jobs here and keepthe money in Connecticut that will flow into Connecticut. We launched aninquiry after you complained about New York license plates on the constructionvehicles (see article [https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/8046dcc5-feaf-43a7-8651-cd3b2a09611c?j=eyJ1IjoiMWh2cjYwIn0.VBabVq-VHATXCJqsddI7uMpdiTm0WkVanRDZfvCWMkg ]). Electricity - As for electricity, ourbills have gone up significantly because of the public benefit. The electriccompany should pay for these green initiatives which benefits them by reducingtheir need to supply additional electricity. You are not obligated to helpyour neighbor make improvements in a classic taxation without representation.In the interim, I have proposed a deduction on your taxes for this mandatewhile you push your local State Reps and Senators to push back. (See ourarticle on electricity [https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/dc7ab48b-f7a4-4f5f-872a-b09b57d5fce3?j=eyJ1IjoiMWh2cjYwIn0.VBabVq-VHATXCJqsddI7uMpdiTm0WkVanRDZfvCWMkg ]). The Border - The border is anotherbig issue, which is woven into many of these other issues and impacts ourlives. I am all about closing the border especially after Prison gangs of Trende Aragua are now killing people in Stamford (See Article [https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/7667e6c8-96e7-49d0-81cc-99e45fa49e5a?j=eyJ1IjoiMWh2cjYwIn0.VBabVq-VHATXCJqsddI7uMpdiTm0WkVanRDZfvCWMkg ]). Protecting Women means keeping themsafe and keeping known criminals from coming into this country and deportingillegals that commit violent crimes against women and children. My Opponentvoted Against the Violence Against Women by Illegals Act - and was wrong onthe facts at our debate [https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/5dc80471-af6e-4e47-a1ff-d69c8ec19667?j=eyJ1IjoiMWh2cjYwIn0.VBabVq-VHATXCJqsddI7uMpdiTm0WkVanRDZfvCWMkg ]. Most of Americans are in agreement oncrime and safety. However, Jim Himes has been horrible on the Border and evensuggested that we should bring refugees from Gaza. (See our article on Hamasand Himes [ https://open.substack.com/pub/drmichaelgoldstein4ct/p/no-process-is-strong-enough-to-vet?r=26c3ku&utm;_campaign=post&utm;_medium=web ])Veterans - We’ve also talked about how veterans have been ignored with bettertreatment given to illegals and the lack of good resources for veterans totreat their PTSD and other ailments following their service to this gratefulnation. (See our Article on Our Veterans [https://open.substack.com/pub/drmichaelgoldstein4ct/p/what-about-our-veterans-vote-august?r=26c3ku&utm;_campaign=post&utm;_medium=web ]). Israel - Harrisand Himes have been terrible on Israel despite the fact Jim Himes largestdonor is AIPAC. Himes has pandered to CAIR and was silent when both PresidentBiden and Vice President Harris snubbed Netanyahu and Israel on a veryimportant diplomatic mission. That was their first mission since October 7.(See our Article on Biden and Harris Snub Israe [https://open.substack.com/pub/drmichaelgoldstein4ct/p/biden-and-harris-snub-israel?r=26c3ku&utm;_campaign=post&utm;_medium=web ]l) . These protests andviolence on college campuses needs to end. Free speech is one thing, it isanother to incite violence and desecrating government property and attackingour flag while Universities are told by Chuck Schumer to bury the issue. WHATCAN YOU DO? Now ask yourself what can you do. If any of these issues strike anerve it is time to take action. As we have been in the words of the DoobieBrothers - Takin it To the Street, it is your turn to Take it to the Polls andTell Your Friends. Cast your vote. It matters and you matter. So Let’s buildthe greatest team going into this November to take back Connecticut and Healthis Country. We are out there working hard for the working people ofConnecticut that have been ignored. On Tuesday, November 5th, go out make yourvoices heard . The silent majority can no longer be silent any longer. IF YOUDO NOT GO OUT AND VOTE - YOU HAVE NO ABILITY TO COMPLAIN. We are leaving itall on the field and will not stop until the polls close. Thank you for yourcontinued support - We will not be ignored any longer. Put a Doctor in thehouse and you can do that on November 5th by casting your vote for Dr. MichaelGoldstein. Stand up for America and Our Future and the Future of Our Childrenand VOTE FOR ME ON ROW B. I would be honored by your support and tell yourfriends to get out and vote. Thank you for your continued support. This is aDavid v Goliath Moment and We the People Can Do this Together - that one stoneis your vote at the polls. Dr. Michael Goldstein Put A Doctor in the Housewww.goldsteinforcongress.com [https://link.sbstck.com/redirect/fe6ec7e8-3354-4247-aa39-e879475f200a?j=eyJ1IjoiMWh2cjYwIn0.VBabVq-VHATXCJqsddI7uMpdiTm0WkVanRDZfvCWMkg ] Paid for by Goldstein for Congress WeNeed Your Support. name: NDRC HQ
subject: Sabato’s Crystal Ball: 6 new toss-ups
body: A top analyst at Sabato’s Crystal Ball — one of the premier election-forecasting organizations in the country — rated six legislative chambers as“TOSS-UPS” in our priority states. Peter, this is a BIG deal. A toss-up meansit’s anyone’s game. Rush a $30 donation to the NDRC in these final days andhelp turn these “TOSS-UP” chambers into wins for fair maps. State legislativeraces are often decided by just a few hundred votes, so a contribution of anyamount can make a measurable difference in the outcomes.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ndrc-em-nov24?refcode=don_ndrc_tier1_email_TossUps_email_20241102-NDRC-Tier1-TossUps_&utm;_source=email&utm;_medium=email&utm;_term=don&utm;_content=20241102-NDRC-Tier1-TossUps_&utm;_campaign=TossUps&amount;=30] These “toss-ups” include bothchambers in the Arizona legislature, the New Hampshire State House, theMichigan State House, the Minnesota State House, and the Pennsylvania StateHouse. Here’s a quick analysis of what’s at stake in each state: ➡️ Arizona:Republicans hold majorities in both chambers of the Arizona legislature, butif we flip just two seats in each, we can flip both the state house and statesenate and strengthen the state’s redistricting process. ➡️ Michigan: WhileDemocrats hold a trifecta in Michigan, Republicans are vying to take back thestate house this November. If they do, they could attempt to roll backprogress on fair maps by targeting the state’s independent redistrictingcommission. ➡️ Minnesota: Democrats won a surprise trifecta of their state’sgovernment in 2022, but this year, only the state house is on the ballot.Republicans need to flip just five seats to win back control and block all theamazing progress we’ve seen there in the last two years. ➡️ New Hampshire:It’s the Republicans who hold a trifecta in New Hampshire — and since mid-cycle congressional redistricting is permitted in this state, the GOP coulduse their power to rewrite their maps at any given moment. (The Republicancandidate for governor has even said they hope to do so.) Democrats need towin the legislature to put an end to the possibility of mid-cycle GOPgerrymandering. ➡️ Pennsylvania: Democrats hold the state house and thegovernor’s seat, but Republicans control the state senate. If we can protectthe state house majority and flip the state senate, we will achieve anotherDemocratic trifecta and have the ability to enact redistricting reform inPennsylvania. These are races that are critical to the long-term fight forfairness — and being successful in these elections could help lay thefoundation for an even fairer redistricting process in 2031. With just 3 daysuntil the final votes are cast, we need a surge of support to fund our work toelect Democracy Defenders across the country and help keep the fair mapsmovement moving forward. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ndrc-em-nov24?refcode=don_ndrc_tier1_email_TossUps_email_20241102-NDRC-Tier1-TossUps_&utm;_source=email&utm;_medium=email&utm;_term=don&utm;_content=20241102-NDRC-Tier1-TossUps_&utm;_campaign=TossUps&amount;=30] Thank you so much, Team NDRCDONATE [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ndrc-em-nov24?refcode=don_ndrc_tier1_email_TossUps_email_20241102-NDRC-Tier1-TossUps_&utm;_source=email&utm;_medium=email&utm;_term=don&utm;_content=20241102-NDRC-Tier1-TossUps_&utm;_campaign=TossUps&amount;=30] Since 2017, the NDRC hasexecuted a comprehensive redistricting strategy that shifts the redistrictingpower, creating fair districts where Democrats can compete. Our victories havebeen made possible by our strong community of grassroots supporters. MAKE ADONATION [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ndrc-em-nov24?refcode=don_ndrc_tier1_email_TossUps_email_20241102-NDRC-Tier1-TossUps_&utm;_source=email&utm;_medium=email&utm;_term=don&utm;_content=20241102-NDRC-Tier1-TossUps_&utm;_campaign=TossUps&amount;=30] If you want to receiveperiodic updates from the NDRC on our fight for fair maps, text MAPS to 36787.Text HELP for help, STOP to end. Msg & Data rates may apply. Privacy Policy.[https://democraticredistricting.com/privacy-policy/] We know we send a lot ofemails, but we think it's important to keep you updated with the latestinformation on Republican gerrymandering and voter suppression and how we'refighting back -- regardless of whether you choose to donate. Click here[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ndrc-em-nov24?refcode=don_ndrc_tier1_email_TossUps_email_20241102-NDRC-Tier1-TossUps_&utm;_source=email&utm;_medium=email&utm;_term=don&utm;_content=20241102-NDRC-Tier1-TossUps_&utm;_campaign=TossUps&amount;=30] to make a donation. name: Colin Allred
subject: I feel it in my bones
body: With a handful of days until the election and just hours until our $500,000daily fundraising deadline, I don't want to waste any time:Will you chip in asplit donation between my campaign and Defeat Boebert PAC of $25 or more rightnow to power our final push to defeat Ted Cruz? RUSH MY DONATION This closeto Election Day, I know we're all having a lot of anxiety about which waythings will go. Peter, something special is happening here in Texas. We'vebeen putting in the work for over a year now, and we're seeing all of thathard work pay off in the form of real, sizable momentum. I can feel it in mybones that we are going to win. But I also know this: Our fight isn't overyet. We're running out of time before Election Day, and there is still so muchto do to counter the $40 MILLION worth of GOP attacks, reach Texans, and getevery last Texan out to vote before polls close at 7 p.m. on Tuesday. I don'twant to keep you from carrying on with your day, but I have nowhere else toturn, so I have to ask: Please, will you rush $25 or more, split between mycampaign and Defeat Boebert PAC, right now to help us meet our $500,000 dailyGOTV fundraising goal? We're just $27,426 away from reaching this criticalgoal!! If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, yoursplit donation between Colin Allred and Defeat Boebert PAC will go throughimmediately: RUSH IN $25 RUSH IN $50 RUSH IN $100 RUSH IN $250 RUSH IN$500 OTHER AMOUNT Thank you for your support, Peter – I'm so grateful. –Colin Allred DONATE Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com . name: Team Lucas Kunce
subject: NEW POLL: Lucas Kunce is locked in a STATISTICAL TIE with Josh Hawley for Missouri’s U.S. Senate seat
body: We’ve got 3 days to take the lead, and we urgently need your help, Peter.                                                                                                  ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/X253ab5c9-e275-44e9-a2ac-fa1a4909f2ac/368d17ff-e836-4168-8049-c5f0900fbbf9)| | | | ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/253ab5c9-e275-44e9-a2ac-fa1a4909f2ac/a638be21-8513-42b1-9bfc-5f974022c80e.png) --- | | | | |  --- | _You're getting this message because you’ve supported good causes andDemocratic candidates. We need your support to continue fighting for ourdemocracy. We love having you in our network, but if you no longer wish tohear from us, you canunsubscribe here._ --- |  ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/253ab5c9-e275-44e9-a2ac-fa1a4909f2ac/a428d4c1-6cc9-4698-b4fd-2887414c1a88.jpg) This race is neck-and-neck — and we CAN tip the scales if we have the resources to keep reachingundecided voters with the truth about Hawley’s record of extremism,corruption, and control over the final days of this election.  Will you rush a donation of $10 or whatever you can between our grassrootscampaign and Blue Amp Action right now? --- | | SPLIT A DONATION --- | This is huge, Peter. Lucas has withstood over $6 MILLION in false TV attackads from Hawley’s campaign and billionaire-funded Super PAC since August — andhe’s STILL managed to put this race in a STATISTICAL TIE with Hawley! By now,most Missourians know about Lucas’ unifying vision for our state. They knowthat he’ll fight like hell to protect our freedoms, rebuild our communities,and make real investments into Missouri — all things Hawley has failed todeliver during his six years in the U.S. Senate. But we can’t afford to let upnow… Over these final 3 days, we need to do everything we can to reach theremaining undecided voters with the truth about their choice in this election.We need to keep our positive ads on TV. We need to keep reaching votersonline, at their doors, and in their mailboxes. And now that no-excuseabsentee voting has started in Missouri, we need to keep turning out everyvoter we can between now and Election Day on November 5th. That’s why we’reurgently asking: Will you rush a donation of $10 toward our grassrootscampaign to elect Lucas Kunce and Blue Amp Action right now? Lucas has builtthis campaign without a cent from corporate PACs, so he’s urgently counting onsupport from real people like you to surge ahead over the final days of thiselection. --- | | SPLIT A DONATION --- | We’ve never had a better chance to defeat Josh Hawley or take backMissouri’s U.S. Senate seat — and we can’t afford to waste it. Thank you inadvance, Team Lucas Kunce --- | --- | | | | |  --- | | |  --- | --- | | |  --- | | | | |  --- | | | ![](https://default.salsalabs.org/253ab5c9-e275-44e9-a2ac-fa1a4909f2ac/bdd7c5f5-7de1-4347-b64e-b4284329efec.png)| Cliff Schecter President, Blue Amp Action Amplify Good  ---|--- | | |  --- | | Follow Us | ![](https://blueampstrategies.salsalabs.org/public/images/icons/medium-auto_twitter2.png)| ![](https://blueampstrategies.salsalabs.org/public/images/icons/medium-auto_linkedin.png) ---|---  | **Blue Amp Action PAC** PO Box 8384, Cincinnati, OH 45208 --- | Having trouble viewing this email? View it in your web browser --- | | |  --- | | | About BlueAmp Action: We cannot sugarcoat the current situation. Right-wing authoritarianism, defeated by a worldwide coalition during WWII, was only in hibernation. Over the past decade it has infected democratic societies--including ours. It is as simple as it is terrifying: What we do now will define the future of our country and world. We at Blue Amp Action are dedicated to liberal, open societies, where reason and science are applied to solve our problems; where civil rights--including voting rights!--are protected for all. We fight for these values every day. Speaking up on our platforms, raising the voices and the political prospects of liberal pols and pundits. **And savvy grassroots activists like you know, just like we do, that we can’t stop watching the people we help elect:_ after the elections, we have to keep organizing support for the policies we like and pushing back against the ones we don’t._** **__When the public tunes out between elections and the only people our elected officials hear from are the paid lobbyists of wealthy corporations, our government stops being accountable to the needs of ordinary families.__** **Democracy never sleeps, and neither can we.** So we ask that you support our work, so we can continue to engage in this fight every moment of every day. So our kids grow up in democracy, not dystopia. Thank you for your support for all we do! Please follow Cliff Schecter on Twitter @cliffschecter, or subscribe to The Takedown with Cliff Schecter on YouTube, to keep up to date with this battle for the heart and soul of our country. — _You're getting this message because you’ve supported good causes and Democratic candidates. We need your support to continue fighting for our democracy. We love having you in our network, but if you no longer wish to hear from us, you canunsubscribe here._ --- | Paid for by Blue Amp Action PAC --- | | Unsubscribe or Manage Your Preferences ---

name: Tammy Baldwin
body: We got an alarming polling update today, Peter, and I wanted you to be thefirst to know: Eric Hovde has officially taken the lead for the first time inpublic polling — a brand new poll from Trafalgar shows me down by one point,49-48. This moment has been building up for months. Hovde and his Republicanallies launched a $80 million ad blitz to close the polling gap and buy thisseat, and they've never been closer to succeeding. I don't mean to bealarmist, Peter, but we're running out of time to fight back. Republicans areoutspending us on the airwaves, early voting is underway, and all signs showmy self-funding megamillionaire opponent surging. This incredible grassrootsteam has helped me defy the odds before, but I'm going to need more supporterschipping in and standing with me now than ever in order to defend this crucialSenate seat. So, will you split an urgent donation between EMILYs List and mycampaign to help me close the polling gap between me and my right-wingopponent so we can win this toss up race? Democrats cannot hold the Senatemajority if we lose Wisconsin. SPLIT A DONATION:https://secure.actblue.com/donate/el-tb-split Thanks for being a part of thisteam. — Tammy Sen. name: Peter Hernandez
subject: Wokeism is Not a Latino Value
body: Language matters! View this email in your browser(https://mailchi.mp/e142fe55db0b/watch-now-electoral-forum-campaign-updates-10347609?e=638e6c2751) https://hernandezforcongress.com Wokeism is Nota Latino Value In these final days of this 2024 election cycle, I wanted toshare some thoughts with you. Here's an article that I wrote a couple yearsback explaining that "wokeism" is not a value that Latinos appreciate.https://townhall.com/campaign-voices/peterhernandez/2022/08/31/wokeism-is-not-a-latino-value-n2612437 "Wokeism in its purest forms breaks down clarity, andreplaces truth with new grievance norms that masquerade as justice. Wokeiststry to negate centuries of tradition, culture and science (!) by sociallyshaming opposing views and using coercive tactics on young children to adoptconcepts that go against every grain of common sense and human understandingof the world around us. Woke gender ideology, being so totally antithetical tothe Latino language and culture, plays a huge part of why Hispanics areuniversally turning away from the Democrat party." "Now the left wants toreplace Latino with ‘Latinx.’ It is the woke objective to erase gender bychanging the masculine default of Spanish plural words: canceling the ‘os’ atthe end of words by replacing it with an X. The gender confusion communityseeks to do whatever it can to remove the uniqueness and importance ofmasculine and feminine in our culture, and in our language. Are we to begin tocall our sons and daughters by ninx rather than nina or nino, ourgrandchildren nietx, our students alumnx, our friends amigx, our neighborsvecinx, and our partners companerx? We must end this abuse of language andstop the disrespect of our masculine and feminine natures. Let’s maintain theproud heritage of the Spanish language which has existed for more than twomillennia." Click the image to read the whole article. Let me know what youthink. You can reach me at 831-610-4555. This year we have a historic chanceto make big changes in our government. But first we all must vote for thosechanges. Your vote really matters. Help us get the word out - tell yourfriends, consider donating to my campaign, vote by November 5th! Regards,Peter Hernandez DONATE NOW (https://secure.anedot.com/hernandez/sms)mailto:Peter@peterhernandezforcongress.comhttps://www.youtube.com/@peterhernandez4506https://facebook.com/peterhernandezforcongresshttps://instagram.com/hernandez_for_congresshttps://twitter.com/hernandez_CA18 ** Paid for by Peter Hernandez forCongress. ------------------------------------------------------------Copyright (C) 2022 Peter Hernandez for Congress, All rights reserved.www.hernandezforcongress.com (https://hernandezforcongress.com/) Want tochange how you receive these emails? You can update your preferences(https://hernandezforcongress.us14.list-manage.com/profile?u=314f047675baff18221b82bdc&id;=4f1745826f&e;=638e6c2751&c;=257737edeb)or unsubscribe (https://hernandezforcongress.us14.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=314f047675baff18221b82bdc&id;=4f1745826f&t;=b&e;=638e6c2751&c;=257737edeb)

name: Doug Emhoff
subject: My wife is a badass
body: | | |                                                                                                                                    --- ![Harris forPresident](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/111/764/original/HFP-Walz-SingleColor-HarrisBlue.png) ![](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/950/629/original/kamala_doug_convention_hug.jpg) Peter, we have just three more days to do everything we possibly can to elect Kamala as the 47th President of the United States. Every door we've knocked, every rally we've held, and every dollar we’ve raised has led us to this moment. I can hardly explain how grateful I am. **But the only way we’ll come out on top Tuesday is if we keep fighting until the very end.** **So, I'm personally asking: Will you chip in $47, $94, or anything you can afford to power our final voter outreach efforts and help us win this election?** _If you've saved payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately:_ | | $47 >> --- | $75 >> --- | $100 >> --- | $250 >> --- | $500 >> --- | Other >> ---  I’ll never forget when Kamala officially accepted the Democratic nomination atthe convention. The hope and pride I felt.I remember thinking: _How lucky am I to be married to this woman?_Not because of where she's been.Not because of what she'll do.**But because of who she is.**She's kind, strong, smart, driven. She cares. When she sees a problem, shedoesn't complain about it or find somebody to blame -- she gets to work.Simply put, she's a badass._That's the kind of leader Kamala will be as our next president._**The American people need Kamala -- but first, she needs each of us. I noticeyou haven't yet pitched in to the campaign. Will you please chip in $47 or anyamount to help us reach every last voter, elect Kamala, and keep our countrymoving forward?**Thank you for all you do,DougDoug Emhoff Second Gentleman of the United States![DougE](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/945/636/original/Doug_Headshot.jpg)           * * *| | DONATE --- | TAKE ACTION --- | SHOP ---  * * *This email was sent to **dpwillis67@gmail.com**. name: Rebecca Cooke
subject: The number isn’t as important as the act
body: Peter, In just a moment, I am going to ask you to make a well-timed donationof $3 to my campaign to flip WI-03 blue. But first, you deserve to know whythis request -- especially today -- is so important. Here's the honest truth:Our campaign is outperforming every beltway and establishment pundit’sexpectations. We have received record numbers of individual, small-dollardonations, and I am so proud of that fact. But according to campaign financerecords -- when you factor in super PAC spending -- we are being heavilyoutspen by Derrick Van Orden and his extremist, deep-pocketed allies. They’vealso just doubled their ad buys in our most competitive media markets. It goeswithout saying that if we lose these key communities, we lose the election.The good news is, our message is powerful enough, and the polling is closeenough that with a surge of individual donations we can win. But that is goingto take people who care enough about the outcome to make today the day theydonate to our campaign. Can you contribute today to help flip WI-03? Ouraverage online donation is just over $40. Some give more. Some give less. Butwhat matters the most is that we get as many people donating as we can,because it adds up fast. Donate >>https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cooke-q4-2024?refcode=em-11.2.24-all-a Thankyou for your continued support. When we win in three days, please know yourdonation right now was the difference. name: John Fetterman
subject: Have you heard the good news?
body: [1]Fetterman's Frontline Five Derek, y’all killedit! 🎉 My team informed me that, together, we raised $180k for my mostvulnerable Senate colleagues – the Frontline Five. I am so pumped seeing theenergy heading into Election Day, especially from this team. I’ve alreadyheard back from a few of the Frontline Five who have expressed sinceregratitude to the support we have been able to provide their campaigns. Theyalso shared how tough the races are getting with just a few days untilElection Day. That’s why I am raising the Frontline Five goal to $250K bymidnight on Election Day. We have the rare opportunity to make a huge impactin these tight races and defend our Democratic majority in the Senate. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jf-email-fff-20241102-1?refcode=em20241102-9553&refcode2;=9553_434096_5-zPdh&akid;=9553%2E434096%2E5-zPdh]Derek, will you rush a $5 contribution to the Frontline Five and get us evencloser to keeping a blue Senate? I am confident that we can raise $250,000,get these Democratic candidates over the line, and make a huge impact onElection Night returns! [ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jf-email-fff-20241102-1?amount=5&refcode;=em20241102-9553&refcode2;=9553_434096_5-zPdh&akid;=9553%2E434096%2E5-zPdh]Donate » I know that this is a big goal, but the stakes have never beenhigher. I really appreciate every contribution that comes in. If you can’tmake a donation right now, that’s okay. Will you forward this email to 5friends who want to see Democrats win on November 5th? If we have a shot ofkeeping the Senate blue, we must all come together and put our all towardsmaking this happen. Let’s leave nothing to chance. Here’s to no regrets onNovember 6th. ❤️ John John Fetterman U.S. Senator from Pennsylvania This emailwas sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. Email is the most important way for us toreach you about opportunities to get involved. name: Team Keith
subject: Just three days left
body: Peter, With just three days left until Election Day, our team is gearing upfor one final push. The latest polling shows Donald Trump chipping away atVice President Kamala Harris’s narrow lead in Minnesota, giving Republicanstheir best chance to win the state since 1972. If Trump and his MAGARepublican allies flip Minnesota red, they’ll retake the White House,eliminate our DFL majorities, and implement Project 2025. To protectreproductive freedom and access to health care, funding for public education,the wages and safety of workers, and so much more, we have to stop Republicansfrom gaining more ground. While it won’t be easy to keep Minnesota blue, weknow this grassroots movement is up for the challenge. That’s why we’ve set agoal to raise $5,000 by Sunday, November 3. Every donation we receive thisweekend will be immediately utilized to ramp up our Get Out the Vote efforts.According to our records, you’re still eligible for Minnesota’s PoliticalContribution Refund (PCR) program, which allows people to donate $75 (or $150for couples) and receive a full refund. Peter, will you make your refundable$75 donation right now to help boost Democratic turnout across Minnesota? name: James Carville
subject: GOP Senator and Trump Puppet Rick Scott can and MUST be defeated
body: Tammy Baldwin here — I wanted to make sure you saw this message from James Carville about Debbie Mucarsel-Powell's race in Florida. Debbie is running to defeat Rick Scott in Florida, so I hope you'll read this update and [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2155?c0=tbe-em-dmp.RYg70l&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_TAN_GEN_AC_20241102_AM1_V1_S1&t;=1003&akid;=4380%2E35263%2E4MePko ]chip in if you can. -------------------------------------------------------------------------- [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2155?c0=tbe-em-dmp.RYg70l&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_TAN_GEN_AC_20241102_AM1_V1_S1&t;=1004&akid;=4380%2E35263%2E4MePko ]James Carville I’ve got a question for ya, Peter: If you knew making a grassroots donation would get rid of one of the worst Donald Trump puppets in the Senate, would ya give? Alright — how about if ya knew that donation of yours would retire somebody who was a lapdog to Trump at his criminal trials and debates and just about everywhere? Because that’s Florida Senator Rick Scott, plain and simple. He’s nothing but a puppet to Donald Trump, and Floridians know it too. I just personally reviewed brand-new polling that shows Rick Scott statistically DEADLOCKED with his Democratic opponent, Debbie Mucarsel-Powell. But with Debbie up against her $500,000 midnight deadline, and THREE DAYS until the election, it’s going to take a MASSIVE rush of grassroots donations to help her counter Rick Scott’s millions of dollars worth of attacks. [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2155?c0=tbe-em-dmp.RYg70l&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_TAN_GEN_AC_20241102_AM1_V1_S1&t;=1005&akid;=4380%2E35263%2E4MePko ]Can I count on ya to split $10 or $25 or whatever you can spare NOW between Tammy Baldwin and Debbie Mucarsel-Powell to help Debbie defeat this Donald Trump puppet? If Debbie wins in Florida, it all but guarantees Democrats hold the Senate! If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your split donation to Debbie Mucarsel-Powell and Tammy Baldwin will go through immediately: [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/3664?c0=tbe-em-dmp.a4q02v&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_TAN_GEN_AC_20241102_AM1_V1_S1&t;=1006&akid;=4380%2E35263%2E4MePko ]SPLIT $10 NOW [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/3665?c0=tbe-em-dmp.KIRk9x&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_TAN_GEN_AC_20241102_AM1_V1_S1&t;=1007&akid;=4380%2E35263%2E4MePko ]SPLIT $25 NOW [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/3666?c0=tbe-em-dmp.aCOxBX&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_TAN_GEN_AC_20241102_AM1_V1_S1&t;=1008&akid;=4380%2E35263%2E4MePko ]SPLIT $50 NOW [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/3667?c0=tbe-em-dmp.P6Mv5u&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_TAN_GEN_AC_20241102_AM1_V1_S1&t;=1009&akid;=4380%2E35263%2E4MePko ]SPLIT $100 NOW [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/3692?c0=tbe-em-dmp.yuDprs&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_TAN_GEN_AC_20241102_AM1_V1_S1&t;=1010&akid;=4380%2E35263%2E4MePko ]SPLIT $250 NOW [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2591?c0=tbe-em-dmp.5aazmw&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_TAN_GEN_AC_20241102_AM1_V1_S1&t;=1011&akid;=4380%2E35263%2E4MePko ]ANOTHER AMOUNT If it doesn’t make your stomach churn, I’ve got to be even realer with you about who Rick Scott is and why we’ve got to defeat him. He and Trump have both endorsed each other. He sat in the debate spin room like some sycophant, watching Trump carry on his crazy tirades — and yet he’s too scared to debate his own opponent, Debbie! And look, there’s no shortage of competition for wacko GOP senators. But Rick Scott may take the cake. He wrote the plan to END Social Security and Medicare. He wants to raise taxes on working families to give megamillionaires (like himself) a tax cut. And he voted to overturn the 2020 election and continues to push Trump’s dangerous election conspiracy theories! ENOUGH of extremists like Rick Scott who will hand our democracy over to Trump on a silver platter. I’ve seen the polling. I’ve seen the strategies. Florida is in PLAY and Debbie Mucarsel-Powell can WIN — but only with your grassroots support right now. [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2155?c0=tbe-em-dmp.RYg70l&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_TAN_GEN_AC_20241102_AM1_V1_S1&t;=1012&akid;=4380%2E35263%2E4MePko ]Before the clock runs out on Debbie’s midnight deadline, split a donation of $10 or whatever you can right now. It’s us against Rick Scott — us standing in the way of him flipping the Senate red. Split a donation now to help Debbie stop him! James Carville P.O. BOX 696 MADISON, WI 53701 [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/67?t=1001&akid;=4380%2E35263%2E4MePko ]www.tammybaldwin.com | [ mailto:INFO@tammybaldwin.com ]INFO@TAMMYBALDWIN.COM | [ https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/68?t=1002&akid;=4380%2E35263%2E4MePko ]Privacy Policy PAID FOR BY TAMMY BALDWIN FOR SENATE You can unsubscribe from this mailing list at any time: http://act.tammybaldwin.com/cms/unsubscribe/unsubscribe/?akid=4380%2E35263%2E4MePko

name: Ted Cruz
subject: A full description of what is happening…
body: We’re in real trouble- here’s why We’re in real trouble- here’s why Patriot,Here is the situation. Senator Chuck Schumer (D-NY) the powerful MajorityLeader for the Senate Democrats has directed his forces to inject millions andmillions of dollars into Texas to defeat me and flip Texas brightblue. Schumerhas said they will spend over one-hundred million dollars to defeat me. Otherradical leftwing groups and National Democrat Party committees are jumpinginto the fray as well-just flooding us with attack ads, flyers, and boots onthe ground… But here’s the worst part: The National Party is not coming tosave us. I am standing alone against this massive progressive onslaught. Weare getting almost NO HELP from Mitch McConnell. And the major RepublicanSenate Super PAC has no operations or ads running in Texas… That’s why I’mcalling on all grassroots conservatives from Maine to Marfa for help… RUSHHELP HERE >> The Washington DC Party Establishment doesn’t want a grassrootsconservative like me in the Senate- they never have, and their lack of helpduring the fight of my life is proof! I need YOUR help. Not because ourfundraising hasn’t been successful- we’re doing well, and thousands of Texansand patriots from all over are stepping in to give generously. Many are givingfor the very first time, while others have given every month this year. Butwith no air cover. I'm forced to ask for urgent help. We can’t lose Texas- andright now we’re in real trouble. STAND WITH TEXAS & SAVE AMERICA RIGHT NOW >>Thank you for standing with me. Ted Cruz DONATE >> Paid for by Ted Cruz forSenate 815 A Brazos, PMB 550, Austin, TX 78701 Unsubscribe

name: Ted Cruz
subject: If you care about keeping Texas red…
body: We’re running out of time to close the gap Fellow Patriot, I’m the Democrats’number one target in November. We’re running out of time to KEEP TEXAS RED.So I’m coming to you, Fellow Patriot. My team has prepared a confidentialmemo, just for you, about what we must do to slam the door shut and take Texasoff the map. You can read it below. -Ted Cruz Memo from Team Cruz: First,Kamala Harris and Chuck Schumer hand-picked Colin Allred to run against TedCruz in Texas — and he raised a RECORD amount of money. Then, polls showedhis attack ads were working. He was within TWO POINTS of defeating Ted earlierthis year. Now, thanks to conservatives like you standing with us, Ted is upby FOUR. But that’s still within the margin of error. We’re still beingoutspent. Ted Cruz barely hanging on. With less than 3 days to go, we MUSTslam the door shut on liberal schemes to flip Texas blue. If we don’t, kissthe Senate goodbye for at least a generation. Fellow Patriot, will you rush adonation of any amount to help Ted Cruz keep up the fight, win this race, andcontinue defending our conservative values for years to come? RUSH A DONATION>> If you want to help Republicans TAKE BACK THE SENATE, text WIN to 55404 toreceive mobile alerts! Message and data rates may apply. Text "STOP" to opt-out. T&C;/Privacy Policy. name: Jacky Rosen
subject: Republicans know they're close to flipping NV red
body: I really hope you don’t ignore this email, friend, because I need a chance toexplain to you why I’m desperate for your grassroots support today: In thelast three days of Nevada's Senate race, I'm getting absolutely pummeled bythe GOP's attack ads – and polls show that I've completely lost any lead I hadagainst my MAGA opponent. Quite frankly, I'm really worried we could lose, andthe only way I can pull ahead in this final sprint is with your grassrootssupport. So please, will you rush $5 or more now to help me fight back againstthis barrage of MAGA Republican attack ads?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_email_1124?refcode=jtk5368-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Republicans know they’re close to flippingNevada red – and the Senate and White House right along with it, friend.That's why they've poured $75 million into this battleground to defeat me –including a surprise $6.2 million ad buy the other day to blanket the airwaveswith even more attacks between now and Election Day. My campaign has launchedour own set of TV ads to keep the record straight and reach as many voters aswe can before it's too late. But if we can't raise another $78,910 beforemidnight, we can’t afford to keep these ads on the air. So please, whilethere's still time to make a difference, will you rush $5 or more to help uskeep our TV ads on the air, win in Nevada, and keep both the Senate and theWhite House blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_email_1124?refcode=jtk5368-fr-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Thank you, Jacky -------- This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. name: Jahana Hayes
subject: I am humbly asking for your support
body: https://www.jahanahayes.com/ [https://www.jahanahayes.com/] I am humblyasking: Can you contribute $10 to my campaign before midnight? I am working toturn out voters in all 41 communities across our district.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jh-em-nov2024?amount=10] If you've savedyour payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go throughimmediately: $5 → [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jh-em-nov2024?express_lane=true&amount;=5] $10 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jh-em-nov2024?express_lane=true&amount;=10]$25 → [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jh-em-nov2024?express_lane=true&amount;=25] $50 →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jh-em-nov2024?express_lane=true&amount;=50]$100 → [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jh-em-nov2024?express_lane=true&amount;=100] Other →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jh-em-nov2024] Your $10 of support isincredibly significant at this stage in the race. For the next 2 days, ourcampaign is going door-to-door, making phone calls, and doing everything wecan to increase turnout from Waterbury to New Milford. In 2022, just 2,004votes across this district made the difference between winning and losing.That is why we have to work for every single vote. That is why whether I amspeaking to volunteers at our campaign headquarters, talking to local press,or having conversations with voters one-on-one, I am trying to emphasize thepower of every vote really does decide elections. Over 600,000 Connecticutvoters have already cast their ballots according to the Associated Press —including many in our district. With precious little time left to make adifference, your $10 would go a long way in keeping CT-05 blue so we can takeback the House. So please, will you chip in $10 or more to support mycampaign? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jh-em-nov2024?amount=10] Everydonation, no matter the size, makes an enormous impact this close to ElectionDay. Thank you. With immense gratitude, Jahana Hayes http://jahanahayes.com[http://jahanahayes.com] About Jahana Jahana Hayes proudly representsConnecticut's 5th Congressional district. name: Shelly Tsirulik, Team Cartwright
body: Peter – Election Day is just 3 days away, so I wanted to give you 3 importantreasons to vote for Matt Cartwright : 1. Matt is a true fighter fornortheastern Pennsylvanians. He’s not in this for his own agenda. Mattprioritizes bipartisan solutions that actually benefit the people herepresents, making sure our region gets the support and attention it deserves.2. Control of the House hinges on this race. The balance of power in Congresscould come down to what happens in our district. By electing Matt, you’rehelping shape leadership across the country. 3. Matt isn’t trying to buy thisseat. Unlike his opponent, Matt’s campaign is based on his record of progress,not lies and misinformation. He’s not relying on cheap political tricks – he’sletting his work speak for itself. But we can’t let voters be swayed by thebig-money attacks that National Republicans are throwing our way. body: [https://prod.cdn.everyaction.com/images/van/NGP/NGP30/1/89914/images/dass-logo-transparent.png] Friend,Right now, Donald Trump is spreading baselessclaims that the upcoming election will be stolen—using the same rhetoric thatfueled the January 6th attack. Appalling. We know that if Trump loses nextweek, he’ll use the same playbook from 2020 to create chaos and attempt tooverturn the results. name: Team Benson
subject: Protecting our democracy
body: Friend, We all have differing opinions heading into Tuesday’s big vote. That’sthe beauty of democracy! But one thing we can all agree on is that the stakesthis year are high. And when the elections are consequential, we often see anuptick in misinformation and bad-faith attempts to undermine our democraticprocess. Michigan’s Secretary of State Jocelyn Benson is on the front lines ofthe fight to ensure our elections are free, fair, and secure for everyone —Democrats, Republicans, and independents alike. Recently, Secretary Bensonspoke about the challenges we face heading into Tuesday: “We know that becauseour systems are secure, there are foreign bad actors and adversaries todemocracy on the global scale who will seek to potentially not hack oursystems, but hack voters' minds to spread falsehoods and misinformation — notjust to sow seeds of distrust, but to diminish citizens' confidence in theprocess and in their own voices.” Secretary Benson is on the road answeringquestions, building confidence in the vote, and ensuring all Michiganders canmake their voices heard this year . Will you support her by donating to ourcampaign today? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jbmi-email-20241102?refcode=em20241102] Donate »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jbmi-email-20241102?refcode=em20241102]Here are the keys to ensuring that 2024’s election runs smoothly no matterwhat: *  Protecting the integrity of our elections by combatingmisinformation and ensuring accurate and secure voting processes. * Promoting trusted sources of information so voters can make informed decisionsbased on facts, not falsehoods. * 欄 Standing up to those who seek to sow chaosand distrust, whether they are foreign adversaries or domestic actorsspreading conspiracies. Your support is crucial in this fight. We can’t do itwithout you! Since her election in 2018, Secretary Benson has fought on thefront lines to defend and strengthen our democracy in the critical state ofMichigan. Will you contribute today to show your support for Secretary Benson?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jbmi-email-20241102?refcode=em20241102]Together, we can safeguard our democracy and ensure Michigan’s elections serveas a model of efficiency, fairness, and integrity across the nation. Thank youfor everything you do. Team Benson Donate »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jbmi-email-20241102?refcode=em20241102]Paid for by Jocelyn Benson for Secretary of State Mailing Address: PO BOX21368, Detroit, MI 48221. name: Anne Holton
subject: Virginia is for voters!
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024] Anne Holton here — proud earlyvoter! This is me just after casting my ballot in the 2024 primary election:https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024] And *today* is the final day ofin-person early voting here in Virginia! body: Voter Action Project Logo [http://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-weekly?refcode=110224_1&amount;=25] We're still hard at work registeringvoters, Team: Even though registration has closed in some key states, voterregistration is still open in important places like Nevada, Michigan,Colorado, Minnesota, and North Carolina. Will you chip in $36 or more today tohelp register 12 new voters in these critical states? >>[http://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-voterregistration?refcode=110224_1&amount;=36] GIVE $36 NOW ➜[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-voterregistration?express_lane=true&refcode;=110224_1&amount;=36] It's simple:It only costs about $3 to register a new voter. Help us bring in as many newvoices as possible and make all their votes count by supporting us right now>> [http://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-voterregistration?refcode=110224_1&amount;=36] If you've saved your paymentinformation with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately:GIVE $15 NOW ➜ [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-voterregistration?express_lane=true&refcode;=110224_1&amount;=15] GIVE $25 NOW➜ [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-voterregistration?express_lane=true&refcode;=110224_1&amount;=25] GIVE $50 NOW➜ [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-voterregistration?express_lane=true&refcode;=110224_1&amount;=50] GIVE $100NOW ➜ [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-voterregistration?express_lane=true&refcode;=110224_1&amount;=100] GIVE $250NOW ➜ [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-voterregistration?express_lane=true&refcode;=110224_1&amount;=250] OtherAmount [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-voterregistration?refcode=110224_1&amount;=35] Voter participation has beenincreasing, and young people -- a major target of opponents of voting rights-- see the importance of voting now more than ever. Voting quickly becomes ahabit -- a habit our democracy sorely needs to fulfill the promise of theAmerican dream. Overwhelming key states with new voter registrations can helpturn the tide against the voter suppression laws we've seen passed the lastfew years. This next election will determine whether our democracy goes backto the darkness and conspiracy theories of the recent past or if we canreclaim our rights -- from voting to choice and more -- and march forward to abetter future. New voter registration -- at just about $3 per new voter -- canmake a huge difference. Pitch in with $36 or more right now >>[http://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-voterregistration?refcode=110224_1&amount;=36] Onward, Voter Action Project'sRegistration Team http://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-weekly?refcode=110224_1&amount;=25 [http://secure.actblue.com/donate/ifvap-weekly?refcode=110224_1&amount;=25] https://www.facebook.com/[https://www.facebook.com/] https://twitter.com/ [https://twitter.com/]https://instagram.com/ [https://instagram.com/] https://www.linkedin.com/[https://www.linkedin.com/] Integrity First Voter Action Project is dedicatedto expanding ballot access and increasing voter participation across thecountry. Since the Supreme Court gutted key provisions in the Voting RightsAct, extreme politicians have taken advantage to pass harsh laws that restrictaccess to the ballot box. These restrictions particularly affect disadvantagedcommunities and people of color. It’s our goal to bring awareness to theselaws wherever they may crop up and organize voters to take action to ensurethe right to vote is available to everyone in their states and communities.Your support is crucial to our efforts. Will you donate today to help usprotect voting rights? name: Team Grothman
subject: Are you on the sidelines?
body: Friend, In January of next year, you will either be looking back with joy -knowing that you helped push Republican candidates across the finish line - orwith regret that you sat on the sidelines for our nation's most crucialelection in a generation. This is our final weekend before Election Day. Ourvolunteers are out in full force. Can Glenn count on you to donate just $5 tohelp us k nock on doors, make last-minute phone calls, and contact as manyswing voters as we can this weekend? Every single swing voter contacted couldbe the one that helps President Trump and Republicans up and down the ballotwin. Thank you in advance for your support. Team Grothman P.S. President Trumpand Kamala Harris are deadlocked in the polls. If you can't donate even $5 dueto Joe Biden's awful economy -will you consider even a $1 donation by clickinghere? Everything helps in these closing days. FOLLOW GLENN ON SOCIAL MEDIA!Glenn Grothman for Congress P.O. Box 1215 Fond du Lac, WI 54936 You arereceiving this email because you expressed an interest in Glenn Grothman.Click here to unsubscribe. Paid for by Glenn Grothman for Congress

name: Sen. Barbara Boxer
subject: Hi there, it’s Barbara Boxer
body: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-nov24?refcode=&amount= [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-nov24?refcode=&amount=]Hi there, it’s former United States Senator Barbara Boxer. I know a few things about winning elections here in California, so I want to give you a peek behind the scenes on where things stand: First, here’s what’s at stake: Political analysts, the media, and even *Republicans* themselves agree that control of the U.S. House is likely to come down to California in this election. And now, new polling shows Democrats taking the lead in the “must-win” swing seats . But the one thing that can trip us up now, is not having the resources needed to seal the deal and flip these districts. That’s why I’m asking you to make a special donation to the California Democratic Party’s Swing Seat Fund so that we can deploy organizers, keep regional offices open later, print more literature, organize more canvases, and more. Will you pitch in? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-nov24?refcode=&amount;=] CHIP IN $ >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-nov24?&refcode;=&amount;=] CHIP IN $ >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-nov24?&refcode;=&amount;=] CHIP IN $ >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-nov24?&refcode;=&amount;=] CHIP IN $ >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-nov24?&refcode;=&amount;=] CHIP IN $ >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-nov24?&refcode;=&amount;=]Just this past week, The Cook Political Report revealed their analysis that there are FIVE Republican-held seats in California that are pure tossups: CA-27, CA-41, CA-22, CA-13, CA-45. This is more tossup seats than ANY other state in the country. And across these seats, polling shows Democrats taking the momentum . With these swing districts in California *alone*, Democrats can retake the U.S. House and fire Speaker Mike Johnson. But the problem is that because the media has been so focused on the buzzy swing states in the presidential contest, Democrats have not been paying attention to California and our make-or-break role in the battle for U.S. House control. We need to shift into high gear and ensure all these competitive districts have the resources needed to flip blue next week. That’s why I am personally asking you to make a special gift of $ or more. Will you help? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-nov24?refcode=&amount;=] CHIP IN $ >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-nov24?&refcode;=&amount;=]Thank you! - Former United States Senator Barbara Boxer DONATE » [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-footer?refcode=footer&amount;=5] Our Democratic leaders are working hard to make California a better place to live. From fighting for good-paying jobs, combating climate change, to expanding healthcare access so all Californians can lead safe, healthy, prosperous lives — California’s Democratic leaders turn progressive ideas into meaningful action. If this email was forwarded to you, please sign up for our email list here. [https://secure.ngpvan.com/zWMh-KAhmUiJYxMzOxKADQ2] We rely on email to communicate with supporters like you and conduct the business of the California Democratic Party, but if you wish to receive only our most important emails, let us know here to sign up for fewer emails. [https://secure.ngpvan.com/60txJAHUg0OznGGaWVwO_A2] And if you no longer wish to receive emails from the California Democratic Party, click here to unsubscribe: https://act.cadem.org/p/BZcF64X0Zkie6fv4FEU9PQ2?unsubscribedata=XRNpA5AjtQ5bW6AZmBVWIXs4UjyojGpOps01s1BWxr9j8q%2BJYHJHKXUJPErS0oZjTWOTfXH%2BNR1TJpDpMYdoZJYe1CGUwwcPixvtrHXQ4sV1%2BsWlLvYjDsRUN3D4KVTtmZmUSYuOGe3AZBx8TL1t%2F7pI6HSjGXhtjgqSgr2VhRs2Ry9TNrfyvb8vS8c7dWAP2Ko9A0CrirkJa5QltXtQj56DrvSwO5%2BucsyOoyWYmxEouY8GkUFRLxKmZonS6%2FqMnh3gZBApUgaK54oe%2FUmZZZqAivHQlFJWKe8xd0rDuctP%2BWiy3POLWTTL5EF0S%2BKr%2FAdp28aFppHSdYXq4TLNF%2BzrfMQfdsguo61g55Ep4X%2FEDz%2FZ18%2BjLuh1%2FO1jfcP3pWt2Z5PsYvtUHMCW4%2FkPTcdW%2FNfAVNlVhWd89GTpNe4%3D . https://www.facebook.com/cadems/ [https://www.facebook.com/cadems/] https://twitter.com/ca_dem [https://twitter.com/ca_dem] https://www.instagram.com/cademocrats/ [https://www.instagram.com/cademocrats/] https://www.cadem.org/?utm_source=Email%20footer [https://www.cadem.org/?utm_source=Email%20footer] Paid for by the California Democratic Party | www.cadem.org California Democratic Party 1830 9th St Sacramento, CA 95811 United States

name: Eric Sorensen
subject: Charting the course
body: https://go.sparkpostmail1.com/f/a/dx_AHJxxgvGVMGTKfKoTgw~~/AAUS1gA~/RgRpCMXzP0QgaHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZXJpY2ZvcmlsbGlub2lzLmNvbS9XA3NwY0IKZxIMQSZn-clJm1IUZHB3aWxsaXM2N0BnbWFpbC5jb21YBAAAABs~ I'll be blunt, Peter: What happensin less than three days will chart the course for whatever happens next.Political handicappers are saying Illinois could predict what happensnationally, and everyone agrees that voter turnout will be key. We’ve workedso hard, but it’s clear we need to keep pushing through these final hours. Wehave a real chance of winning, but we can't take anything for granted – notright now. Here's how your donations can still make a big impact: * Fundingpostage and mailers to get our message to undecided voters * Keeping our TVads on the air to counter the ugly and unfounded attacks against me. * Feedingvolunteers and paying for gas to help our team knock doors across IL-17. Thisrace could swing either way in the final hours – and the more grassrootssupport we can muster to get every last voter engaged, the better our chancesof victory on November 5th. We still need support to make sure our voicesaren't drowned out by the dark money attacking us. If you can, please chip in$5 to keep our momentum going. name: Team Gloria
subject: In 3 days…
body: In 3 days, we have a chance to flip Tennessee blue and make history withGloria Johnson. Today, we’re asking for just $3 to support our final GOTVefforts — we’ll even give you 3 ways your contribution will power us tovictory: [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?amount=3] ONE: VoterOutreach. From texts to calls, every dollar fuels outreach that connectsdirectly with voters. Your $3 helps us reach every corner of Tennessee toensure folks know what’s at stake and get out to vote. TWO: Keeping our adsup. We’re up against some powerful special interests, and they’re spending bigto drown us out. Your $3 helps keep our TV ads on the air so our message forreal change reaches everyone before they head to the polls. THREE: SustainingOur Momentum. We’ve come this far, and our movement is stronger than ever.Every dollar keeps this grassroots effort charging forward to defeat one ofthe most unpopular, self-serving, and corrupt politicians in the U.S. Senate —Marsha Blackburn. These are just 3 ways your contribution will make a realimpact on the success of our GOTV efforts. Chip in $3 — or whatever you can —to help us hit our $100,000 goal and cross the finish line strong on November5 >>> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?amount=3] DONATE $3[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?amount=3] DONATE $30[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax?amount=30] DONATE ANOTHER AMOUNT[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/gj_em_bax] Thank you for everything you’redoing to help make this happen. With gratitude, Team Gloria-------------------------- Gloria Johnson is running for the U.S. Senatebecause Tennesseans deserve leaders who care. For too long, elected officialslike Marsha Blackburn have done absolutely nothing to make Tennesseans’ livesbetter. The only interests they’ve cared about are special interests. The onlypeople they’ve championed are their donors. Gloria will advocate for realsolutions to protect our communities from gun violence, make health care moreaffordable and accessible for all of us, secure access to the ballot box, anddefend reproductive rights. name: Ashley Ehasz
subject: The choice we had to make today:
body: There are 2 things every candidate HAS to do: (1) Talk to voters and (2) Raisethe money to win. For a House race like ours, the money needed to win ismillions – in fact, together we've raised over $3.6 million! Usually, my timeis pretty evenly split between both those tasks. But with just 3 days left inthis election, the team at HQ and I agreed: My time is best spent talking tovoters at their doors and on the phone. That means I'm not fundraising, eventhough we still have goals we need to hit. I'm counting on grassroots donorslike you giving to emails like this to hit our $20,000 grassroots fundraisinggoal by Election Day. Can you help cross this simple item off our finalcampaign to-do list? Pitch in $10 or more right now >> DONATE[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/eha-email-nov2024?refcode=em_fl_eha_20241102_fr_last2_cand_mf_30da_s1_pt] Thanks forbeing in this fight with me as my co-pilot, Ashley 🚁 Paid for by Ehasz forCongress Ehasz for Congress 1800 Byberry Road #1336 Bensalem, PA 19020 UnitedStates Ashley Ehasz is a former member of the U.S. Army. name: Eugene DePasquale
subject: we need to dig deeper
body: https://www.depasqualeforag.com/ [https://www.depasqualeforag.com/]It’s officially GOTV weekend — and our entire team is working hard to get outthe vote throughout Pennsylvania. But my team says that we need to raise$6,049 more this weekend to continue our efforts. name: Gretchen Whitmer
subject: Elon Musk is spreading lies
body: Fight Like Hell PAC [https://nvlupin.blob.core.windows.net/images/van/NGP/NGP59/1/106462/images/FLHP_Primary-Logo_RGB_Full-Color.png] Hey team — I have some disturbing news to share today. After giving nearly $75 million to a super PAC supporting Donald Trump, Elon Musk has been using me to spread right-wing misinformation about elections in Michigan. He invoked my image to stoke his conspiracies and lay the groundwork to disenfranchise Michigan voters if he and other Trump Republicans don’t like the result of this election. Look, we know exactly what Elon is trying to accomplish. The road to the White House runs through Michigan, and he’s doing whatever he can to confuse voters and muddy the waters to give Donald Trump a better chance of winning our 15 electoral votes. Michiganders are voting right now, so we need to act fast to combat this right-wing misinformation. I’ve always done everything I can to keep our elections free, fair, and accessible to everyone who is eligible to cast a ballot. And I won’t stop now. Will you help make sure my team and I have the resources we need to counter Elon Musk’s disinformation and continue getting out the vote? subject: The difference
body: Paid for by Nikki Budzinski for Congress [https://nvlupin.blob.core.windows.net/images/van/NGP/NGP12/1/92407/images/Budzinski_Logo_AAA.png] Two closing arguments show the stark choice between Trump and Harris — AP News, October 30, 2024 “Donald Trump has spent a decade trying to keep the American people divided and afraid of each other. That’s who he is. But America, I am here tonight to say: That’s not who we are,” Harris said. “I pledge to be a president for all Americans — to always put country above party and above self.” The difference couldn’t be any clearer, team. One candidate who uses inflammatory rhetoric, who has sworn revenge on his political enemies, and has vowed to defund entire departments of the executive branch to pay for tax breaks for his wealthy friends. And another who is choosing hope over fear, country over party, and is leading a way forward based in hope and fighting for our freedoms. Vice President Harris has a plan that invests in America’s future and builds our economy from the bottom up and the middle out. name: Steve Daines
subject: Seven Seats
body: Steve Daines for Senate The fate of the Senate majority and White House willcome down to these seven races. Fellow American, the Senate majority will comedown to just 7 races: Montana Ohio Michigan Nevada Pennsylvania WisconsinArizona Here's the bad news, Fellow American. Our candidates are beingoutraised by millions in these states. TAKE BACK THE SENATE ⇒ HELP 7 RACESBut this isn't just about the Senate. These states will also be CRITICAL forPresident Trump to win back the White House. President Trump is polling neck-and-neck with Kamala Harris in battleground states. If our Senate races aresuccessful, it will help Donald Trump DEFEAT Kamala Harris where it mattersmost. I know what we're up against, Fellow American. Democrats are raising andspending millions more than us, but we have a better message. Kamala Harrishas done NOTHING to secure our border as Vice President. Donald Trump and aRepublican Senate will BUILD THE WALL. Joe Biden and Kamala Harris wereresponsible for our disastrous Afghanistan withdrawal.Republican candidateslike Tim Sheehy, Sam Brown, and Dave McCormick actually have SERVED overseas.Kamala Harris and Senate Democrats want to PACK our courts with liberaljudges. As President, Donald Trump and a Republican Senate confirmed moreconservative judges and Justices than ANY OTHER PRESIDENT IN HISTORY. It'sclear that we need a Republican White House and Senate, but we also need yourhelp to make that a reality. The map is on our side, but the financials arenot. Will you make a split donation to help President Trump, Tim Sheehy (MT),Bernie Moreno (OH), Mike Rogers (MI), Sam Brown (NV), Dave McCormick (PA),Eric Hovde (WI), and Kari Lake (AZ)? There's too much at stake to sit on thesideline with 3 days left. Thank you, Steve Daines TAKE BACK THE SENATE ⇒HELP 7 RACES Steve Daines is a fifth-generation Montanan, life-long sportsmanand father of four serving the people of Montana as their Senator. Steve iscommitted to always putting Montana first as he works to bring real change toWashington and fights for more jobs, less government and common sensesolutions to get our country back on track.Chip in $10 or more to help Stevetoday! <> Senator Steve Daines Paid for by Steve Daines for MontanaUnsubscribe

name: Kevin Lincoln
subject: Worried about you
body: Kevin Lincoln for Congress We can take back the White House and the Senate,but if we lose the House – which we only hold by a handful of seats – we can’tget anything done. I’m worried you’re sleeping on this, Peter. Democrats havebeen leading in the Generic Congressional Ballot for three months now, meaningmore Americans would rather send a Democrat to represent them in Congress thana Republican. We can take back the White House and the Senate, but if we losethe House – which we only hold by a handful of seats –we can’t get anythingdone. Our borders won’t be secured, inflation won’t go down, communities won’tget safer, and government overreach won’t be reeled in. That’s why yoursupport for Republican victories in target battleground seats is so critical.We can’t miss out on real chances to flip vulnerable Democrat-held seats likethis one in CA-9. SEND A MARINE TO CONGRESS ➞ I’m fighting tooth and naildown the home stretch, and I need your help to close the deal. As a MarineCorps veteran, former pastor, and current Mayor, I’m ready to bring serviceand leadership to Congress to get our country back on track. But I need yourhelp. Don’t sleep on this. Flip this seat, protect our Republican HouseMajority, and secure the future of our country by chipping in to support mycampaign today. For America, Kevin Lincoln Veteran, USMC SEND A MARINE TOCONGRESS ➞ Meet Kevin Lincoln My name is Kevin Lincoln, and my story, is theValley’s story. I am a 3rd generation Stocktonian, raising a 4th generation inthe city I love. I’m the grandson of Mexican immigrants, and my stepfather isan Army veteran. Like many Stocktonians, my family has overcome economicsetbacks. My own father struggled to survive on these streets, and was at onetime, homeless. But I never let adversity define me. I joined the Marines andserved in the White House Military Office, assigned to Marine One. I graduatedcollege while working full-time and raising a family. I’ve worked in corporateAmerica and served our community as a pastor, and as a non-profit leader. I’mblessed with a beautiful wife, Bonnie, and two amazing children. I’ve lived alife of service, but the greatest honor of my life has been giving back to mycommunity, through serving as Mayor of my hometown, Stockton. SEND A MARINE TOCONGRESS ➞ Like, Follow, and Subscribe! Kevin Lincoln is a former member ofthe U.S. Marine Corps. Use of his military rank, job titles, and photographsin uniform does not imply endorsement by the Marine Corps or the Department ofDefense. PAID FOR BY KEVIN LINCOLN FOR CONGRESS We'd hate to see you go but ifyou'd like to unsubscribe, click here.

name: Tim Sheehy
subject: You need to know what happened
body: Tim Sheehy for Montana Honestly, the money gap is so large that there is adistinct possibility that my opponent will block us on the airwaves. We'regoing dark, Peter - And it couldn’t come at a worse time. A new poll has meTIED with my opponent less than a week out from Election Day. If you don’talready know, here’s what happened. WHETHER IT WAS IN WAR OR BUSINESS, I SEE PROBLEMS AND SOLVETHEM. AMERICA NEEDS CONSERVATIVE LEADERS WHO LOVE OUR COUNTRY. name: Ritchie Torres
subject: I lived next to one of Donald Trump's golf courses
body: Peter, I grew up across the street from one of Donald Trump's golf courses inNew York. This one, in fact: ↘↘https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3]Yes, really.But it was not the way I think you're picturing it in your mind — let meexplain. I didn't live in a skyrise apartment or a mansion with luxuries at myfingertips. I grew up in the Throggs Neck Houses, a crumbling public housingproject among vermin, lead, and mold, across from Trump's Golf Course in TheBronx. https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3]My mom was asingle mom, working multiple jobs to keep food on the table. I'm so gratefulfor how much she sacrificed to provide for our family. Living across fromTrump's Golf Course, I had to see a reminder every day of how easily and oftenour government supports and enables the ultra-wealthy at the expense ofworking families. You see, the New York City government shoveled over $100million in government aid to develop this golf course with Donald Trump andthe corrupt Trump Organization. They did this while New York families likemine lived in hunger and poverty across the street. But, I always try to lookat the positives — growing up smelling the stench of Donald Trump (even beforehe became president) has led me to where I am today: Fighting in Congress forjustice for real working families. When I work on legislation, I always thinkabout the families who are struggling just like mine did. I lived thatexperience — it is not abstract to me. And I'll never forget it. I hope youfeel like you have a better sense of who I am and what my values are. I swearthat I'm fighting for those values every day in Congress. Right now, theshadow of Trump and his MAGA cult looms large. They're determined to strip ourright to vote, give tax breaks to people like Trump, and put special interestsahead of working families – and they’re raising millions to pull it off. Butwe have something they don’t, Peter: A powerful grassroots movement made up ofworking people, not faceless corporations. Can I count on you to join ourcoalition today by chipping in $3 toward our $10,000 election goal? Ifthousands of people like you each chip in what they can afford, I know we cantake on their dark money and reclaim our House Majority. »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3] If you'vesaved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will gothrough immediately: CONTRIBUTE $3 »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=3&express;_lane=true]CONTRIBUTE $7 »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=7&express;_lane=true]Or a custom donation »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_torres_q42024_df?amount=10&amounts;=3,7,10]Thank you, Ritchie ---------------------------------------- Paid for by TorresFor Congress PO Box 580303, Bronx, NY 10458 www.torres.nyc Ritchie Torresrepresents the future of the Democratic Party. Raised by a single mother inpublic housing, Ritchie personally understands the hardships that workingfamilies endure. At age 25, Ritchie made history as the youngest electedofficial to serve on the New York City Council. He fought tirelessly for theworking families of The Bronx, and now, he's fighting for those families andfor progressive values in Congress. He is the first openly gay Afro Latinoever elected to Congress. Ritchie is a champion for progressive policies tofight poverty and to improve the lives of families just like the one he wasraised in. Click here to receive fewer emails:https://secure.ngpvan.com/wWSqTnXRfEul9oH2NSObtA2 Click here to unsubscribe:https://go.torres.nyc/p/laK8o_Kc50iR9tBbFwhZxw2?unsubscribedata=I9ckwtBOOcTddP3WoEXTXjBsRH77iIi6AdSKHzBjPiX2c6wTbW91mn7AZAX8y6ah%2BEXKC6PPNmGipIr%2F6cQRnCZHg2Mrm6VSVOC9AZx%2F5zXdMETKF8D7r8NqTU4Dn57Sgz5z6pB65jESlaJFiBvpIqucyzRjouzvPjEzi2sZnsqpqBABJn5c14Bq7VSak2AO8Ts4uu4FlT87MyU99HFX3ejm7r5U4lfujNKn3DKhyZYRw%2FbyKSDxtnHK29JbAtsg3jcj%2FUPML1XxFdyB2gqH4oSBjbb4wnyzrMPSE4kWmtDHEFSimWTGwJKNcnfcKLxZmAvXfiQ7Wv%2FLdXs3DBJi3wOug2J8bQ8ipqoOVTIRwcaAUaxmdC%2F%2FZ5VGPCPBChJlD1yniza5cz0NotRa87lU4SobkrK8tGQ0tboc13qjNg%2FwayiQ7OxpcgqTFV%2FHq0Y%2F.

name: Alma Adams
subject: We’re facing a bigger challenge
body: 🚨 GET OUT THE VOTE FUND 🚨 Goal: $8,000 Deadline: Nov 5th NC can sway in eitherdirection, so we need to make sure we’re reaching as many eligible voters aspossible in the next 4 days. This is our best chance at flipping NC blue. CHIPIN (https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-alma-q4-2024-em?refcode=BLU_EM_ALMA_2024-11-02_1&amount;=25) Peter, You’velikely heard of Mark Robinson-–the GOP candidate for governor with a long listof bigoted remarks, controversial opinions, and wild conspiracy theories. Thisis the man who told women they should “keep their skirts down,” self-identifies as a “Black Nazi,” and suggests transgender people should “find acorner outside somewhere.” You’d think statements like these would disqualifyhim. But he still has a strong base of supporters. If someone with a historylike Robinson’s can still be in the running, we’re facing a bigger problemthan just one election. Robinson winning could set North Carolina backdecades, empowering hate and divisiveness in our state. I want young people toknow that the path to power isn’t paved by discrimination and inflammatoryrhetoric. name: Debbie Mucarsel-Powell
subject: the good, the bad, and the ugly
body: Hey, friend — I have some good and not-so-good news to share. Thanks to thisgrassroots team, we've been running ads across Florida in English and Spanish— and based on the numbers shared in our team meeting this morning, they areworking. The first week they aired, I shot up 3 points in the polls. Now, I'mLESS THAN 2 POINTS AWAY from taking Rick Scott's dwindling lead altogether.But actually clinching the lead means not only keeping my ads on the air butalso launching new ones — and based on the metrics shown in that same meeting,our fundraising numbers just hit a 30-day low: Without your help to close the52% gap on my LAST $4 million goal and keep funding my ads until Election Day,we risk losing all the momentum we've gained so far. Will you please give $5now to keep me on track to flip Florida blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2481-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 With just 72 hours until voters head to theballot box — amid reports that Rick Scott dumped another $10.5 MILLION tofurther blanket the airwaves with his own ads — this slowdown couldn't havecome at a worse time: * If grassroots donations stay on a downward trend, Iwon't have the funds to keep the ads we're airing on TV. * If I can't affordto keep my ads in front of Florida voters, my filthy-rich opponent will easilybuy up all the slots we'd be leaving on the table. * If Scott drowns out ourmessage with ads smearing me in this last leg of the race, there's no chancewe'll make a comeback in time for Election Day. That is, friend, unless I cancount on your help to stop the bleeding and meet my final $4 million goal. Inever would've entered striking distance of Rick Scott without your help, andI won't be able to overtake him in these final hours without you. Please,friend, will you rush $5, $25, or anything you can spare now to keep mecompetitive in the race to retire Rick and flip this Senate seat blue?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2481-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Thank you for everything, Debbie -------- Thisemail was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com.
